Description:
Welcome to psu.social

This is an independently-operated site focused on the Penn State community, both in Pennsylvania and beyond. Registration is open.

About

The intent of this Mastodon server is to build a network of people with some connection, interest, or support for Penn State University. This spans any use case from academic to research to topical collaborations to the very best collegiate sports teams in America.

There is no monetization model, we don't sell your information, and we don't advertise to you. A detailed privacy policy stating this is available here.

Staff

The site operators are @rob and @cyn. You can also email sysadmin@psu.social for help or questions.

Tech Information & Details

The server is hosted in Los Angeles, California.

  • "Bare metal" 64-bit ARM server
  • 16 dedicated CPUs
  • 64GB memory
  • 6TB local disk storage
  • Cloudflare for security and acceleration
  • AuthSMTP for email delivery
  • Permanent status page at Railgun

This site is committed to the Mastodon Server Covenant. In a nutshell, this means:

  • We will actively moderate against racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia.
  • We maintain daily backups.
  • At least one other person has emergency access to our infrastructure.
  • A minimum of 3 months of warning will be provided should we ever shut down the site.

Donations

This site is operated and paid for by Robert Brown, via our husband/wife California small business Chic 42 Enterprises. We plan to continue to support it financially and otherwise indefinitely.

We are not seeking contributions, but if you would like to give back we would appreciate donations to the Robert J. Brown Award for Excellence in Finance. This is a scholarship established in memory of your site operator's father Dr. Robert J. Brown, a long-time professor at Penn State Harrisburg.

Moderated Servers

Mastodon generally allows you to view content and interact with users from any other server in the "fediverse". Exceptions and blocked sites will be listed towards the bottom of this page, and at this early state there are no blocks in place.

DMCA Policy

The Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), and specifically the provisions located at 17 USC 512, set forth the steps an online service provider such as psu.social must follow in the event of copyright infringement on their servers.

Notification of Infringement

If you believe that someone on psu.social has violated your copyright, you may send us a Notification of Copyright Infringement. For us to process such a notification, it must substantially comply with the requirements set forth in United States law. To speed our handling of your notification, please make sure it complies with the following criteria:

  • Notifications may be submitted to our Registered Agent in one of two ways. You may send it via email (no attachments, please) to sysadmin@psu.social, or you may send it via physical mail to 1223 Wilshire Blvd #213, Santa Monica, CA 90403. We prefer to receive notification via email.
  • Notifications must be signed by the copyright holder or the copyright holder's designated agent. Signatures may be a physical signature or a digital signature in a recognized industry-standard format such as PGP. Unsigned notifications will not be processed.
  • Notifications must specifically identify the copyrighted work being infringed upon. For instance, if the work is a published book, provide the title, author, and ISBN; if the work is a magazine article, provide the title, author, magazine name, and magazine issue; if the work is available on the Internet, provide the URL of the work.
  • Notifications must specifically include the URL where the work is being infringed upon our servers. For us to be able to reasonably identify the material, you must provide us with the complete URL, not a link to the entire journal. For instance, instead of https://psu.social (a link to the entire journal), provide https://psu.social/123.html (a link to the specific entry).
  • Notifications must include sufficient information for us to contact you, including your address, your telephone number, and your email address.
  • Notifications must contain a statement that you have a good faith belief that the use of the material in this manner is not authorized by the copyright owner(s), their agent, or the law.
  • Notifications must contain a statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright that is allegedly being infringed.

Takedown Process

When we receive a properly-formatted notice of copyright infringement, we will forward it to the account owner and provide a limited amount of time to disable access to the allegedly-infringing content.

If you have received this notice from us, this disabling can generally be done in one of two ways: you can delete the entry, comment, or image in question, or you can allow us to set the entry, comment, or image in question to non-viewable. Setting an entry's security to Private or screening a comment is not sufficient to qualify as 'disabling access' under the law, as this can be undone at any time.

If we do not hear back from you with information about which option you'd prefer within the length of time we provide for you to select an option (usually between 24-48 hours), we will assume that you would like for us to set the entry, comment, or image in question to be non-viewable, and we will do so. This will not affect the rest of your account.

You then have one of three choices:

  • You can accept the allegation of infringement, and state that you will not restore the content, file a counter-notification, or make further infringement upon the work in the future. If you choose to do this, you must delete the entry, comment, or image, if you have not already done so. This will count against you for determination of 'repeat offender' status. If you do not reply to any of our contact about an alleged infringement within 10 days of our forwarding the notification, we must assume that you have chosen this option.
  • You can state that you do not accept the allegation of infringement, but you do not want to file a counter-notification or have us restore access to the allegedly-infringing content. If you choose to do this, we will not restore access to the entry, comment, or image. This will not affect the rest of your account. This will not count against you for determination of 'repeat offender' status.
  • You can state that you do not accept the allegation of infringement, and let us know that you want to file a counter-notification under the provisions of law. If you choose to do this, please see the section below. This will not count against you for determination of 'repeat offender' status.

If you have received a notice of alleged infringement, you may not re-upload or re-post the allegedly-infringing material, unless you have gone through the counter-notification process. This applies whether you have deleted the material yourself, or you have chosen to allow us to disable access to the material. If you do re-upload or re-post the material, we will be forced to entirely disable your account.

Counter Notification

A counter-notification is a statement, under the provisions of 17 USC 512(g)(3), that you do not believe your content infringes on another person's rights, or that your use of another person's copyrighted material falls into one of the protected categories under law.

By filing a counter-notification, you are indicating that you are willing to defend your use of the material in court, if the copyright owner chooses to bring a lawsuit against you for your use of the material. This may involve civil and/or criminal penalties. We strongly suggest you contact an intellectual property lawyer licensed to practice law in your jurisdiction before you do this, so that you are aware of your rights and obligations under the law.

There are groups that may help you understand your rights and obligations, including the Chilling Effects Clearinghouse, the Electronic Frontier Foundation, and the Organization for Transformative Works. We are not affiliated with any of these organizations, and they may not be able to help you, but their mission and mandate involves educating people about their rights and obligations under intellectual property law.

A counter-notification must contain the following items:

  • Your signature. Signatures may be a physical signature or a digital signature in a recognized industry-standard format such as PGP.
  • The URL of your entry, comment, or image that has been called into question. A statement, under penalty of perjury, that you have a good faith belief that the material was removed or disabled as a result of mistake or misidentification of the material. This should include any reasons why you believe your use of the material is not infringing.
  • Your name, address, and telephone number.
  • A statement that you consent to the jurisdiction of Federal District Court where you reside, or (if you live outside the United States) that you consent to the jurisdiction of Federal District Court where Chic 42 Enterprises, Inc. is located (currently Santa Monica, CA).
  • A statement that you will accept service of process from the person who provided notification of infringement, or that person's designated agent.

Your counter-notification will be provided, in its entirety, to the person who provided notification of alleged infringement.

Restoration Process

When we receive a counter-notification, we will forward it to the person who made the original notification of alleged infringement. From that point, the original notifier has 10 business days after receiving the counter-notification to file an action in court, seeking an injunction against the use of that material.

If you have provided us with a notification of infringement, and the user of our service has chosen to file counter-notification, you must inform us that you have filed court action no more than 14 days after we forward the counter-notification to you. If you do not, we will re-enable access to the allegedly-infringing material no less than 10 days, and no more than 14 days, after we forward the counter-notification.

If you have received a notification of infringement, and you have provided us with your counter-notification, we will re-enable access to the allegedly-infringing material, or let you know that you can re-post the allegedly-infringing material, no less than 10 days, and no more than 14 days, after we have forwarded your counter-notification to the original notifier.

If you have filed a counter-notification, you can not re-upload or re-post the allegedly-infringing material until we notify you that the waiting period has expired. If you do, we will be forced to entirely disable your account during that time period.

Repeat Offenses

US law requires us to disable the accounts of repeat offenders of others' copyright. What constitutes a repeat offender is not defined by law.

We currently define a repeat offender as anyone who has received five valid notifications of copyright infringement. Instances where you have filed a counter-notification, or instances where you have indicated that you do not accept the allegation of copyright infringement but do not wish to file a counter-notification, will not count against your account for purposes of determining 'repeat offender' status. We reserve the right to alter this definition in the future, at our sole discretion.

We also reserve the right to terminate the accounts of those who, in our opinion, misuse or abuse the DMCA notification process against other users.
Short: Independent site for Penn Staters, not operated by the University. Click "Learn More" below to learn more about this service or click "create account" to get started.

Description:
We're a small group of friends and friend of friends using mastodon wanting a stable, fast & transparent instance. As of writing, we have a 99.88% uptime

Moderation policy

As we're a small instance, We do not feel the need for a complete Code of Conduct or a complete definition and expanded list of rules.

If the rules are not clear, please ask us. We will be happy to explain them to you. We will also be happy to explain why we have chosen to enforce them.

As well, If the need arises, we will define a more complete Code of Conduct and rules.

Local accounts

Local users have to abide by our rules, failure to do so might result in moderation actions. The severity of the action depends on the severity of the rule broken. For example, Posting illegal content will result in a ban, while posting a NSFW image without a CW will result in temporary forced sensitive marking.

Federated accounts

Federated accounts are moderated slightly differently, as we have less tools for those. Initially, our moderation policy is to: Mark sensitive > Limit > Suspend. If reasonable percentage of the accounts of a instance is moderated, We will look into applying moderation to the instance itself.

Exceptions

Things will always be a bit complicated, and we will always try to be reasonable and fair. We reserve the right to skip moderation steps if we feel it is appropriate.

Transparency

We try to be as transparent as possible, and will always try to explain our moderation actions. If you feel we have been unfair, please contact @beep. We are always open to discussion, and will always try to be reasonable.

Expected response times

We will try to respond to moderation requests as soon as possible, but we are all volunteers, and we have lives outside of this instance. We will try to respond within 24 hours, but we can't guarantee it. Feel free to ping us if you feel we have been too slow, We love to work with other instances.

Extra Credit

This is the shilling corner, Here I shill other companies that I use for things

[ Last updated on Mar 8 2023 ]
Short: A small instance for a small group with big dreams

Description:
Dieser Mastodon-Server wird von der LAAW.nrw betrieben.

Dieser Server steht den Mitgliedseinrichtungen der LAAW.nrw und den Mitarbeitenden dieser Einrichtungen zur Verfügung. Die Instanz dieses Servers dient überwiegend dem beruflichen Austausch von Einrichtungen und deren Mitarbeitenden im Umfeld der LAAW.nrw.

Konten können für die Einrichtungen (Organisationskonto) und für Mitarbeitende (Personenkonto) erstellt werden. Die Registrierung eines Kontos auf diesem Server kann über den Link "Konto erstellen" auf der Startseite erfolgen. Registriert euch dazu mit einer E-Mail-Adresse eurer Einrichtung und schreibt in das Feld "Warum möchtest du beitreten?" zur Sicherheit nochmal euren richtigen Name und Eure Einrichtung rein (für Rückfragen, werden nicht veröffentlicht).

Wir werden euer Konto dann so schnell wie möglich frei schalten.

Bei Rückfragen könnt ihr euch an die Geschäftsstelle wenden: https://laaw.nrw/kontakt

Der Server wird betreut von Frank Wittemeier (frank.wittemeier@laaw.nrw).
Short: Der Mastodon-Server der LAAW.nrw für das fediverse

Description:
Hello! Thank you for visiting our Mastodon instance :)

About

This instance is part of goose.rodeo and you need to be a member to be able to sign in to it. goose.rodeo aims at building and maintaining a community where everyone feels comfortable. In order to achieve this goal, we have decided to limit our registrations to invite-only. This means that in order to be able to join, you first need to find a current goose.rodeo member who is willing to invite you.

Rules

We aren't a "free speech zone" where you're free to disrespect and discriminate others - we firmly believe in inclusivity and basic common sense. We enforce a basic set of rules to aid us in this purpose.

Please note that in the end every dispute will be handled on a case-by-case basis. If you do not understand why you got punished for an action, feel free to ask and/or create an appeal!

To other instance admins

We are always open to communications! If you encounter issues with accounts hosted on our instance, please contact us. We do our best to ensure that we don't cause any issues or increased moderation demands on other instances, but it is possible for some things to slip through. We are sorry about potential inconveniences caused by us!

You can reach us by messaging @gus, @lus or @max or by sending an email to hi@kas.lu.

Credits

Parts of our instance were inspired by the cool people at chaos.social.
Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

Short: A Social Media instance for people who wish to escape the oligarchy

Description:
About the server

Run by Tillwoofie, currently hosted in Canada.

Running on 3 servers:

  • 1 Proxy machine (1 shared core, 1GB memory)
  • 1 App machine (1 shared core, 2GB memory)
  • 1 DB machine (1 shared core, 2GB memory)

It is currently not a high-performance or high-storage infrastructure, so it may occasionally have issues. I am reachable by the same username most places if there are issues. It will be upgraded and scaled as required, which may occasionally introduce issues, but I can work through them.

Backups will be added soon.

Joining

If you would like to join the server, please apply, and I will look over your application.

Content policy

Content following the rules will stay up, unless you elect to (re)move it. Content not meeting the rules will receive warnings, and severe content infractions may result in total removal (these will get warnings first).

Repeat issues may result in the account in question being removed from this instance.

Server roles

Admins

  • @Tillwoofie

Moderators

  • Will be added when needed.

Official Accounts

  • @Tillwoofie for now, may add more the future.

Furry Mastodon server for art, 3D animations, and general furry stuff! NSFW content allowed! Anyone welcome!

Description:
En varm velkomst til det virtuelle musikfællesskab ballhaus.community! Ballhaus.community er en medie-platform, der er oprettet og varetaget af Foreningen Ballhaus . Vi har skabt platformen med tanke på kunstmusikkens økosystem, dvs. som et fælleskab mellem professionelle musikere, undervisere, musikologer, publikum, arrangører, kulturjournalister og andre ildsjæle der får musikken til at leve. Vi byder også gerne professionelt arbejdende kunstnere fra andre felter ind i fællesskabet.

Ballhaus.community er bygget på applikationen Mastodon. Mastodon minder på mange måder om Twitter, med elementer fra andre sociale netværk. Men der er væsentlige forskelle. Denne lille video forklarer det hele på få minutter:

+--------

A warm welcome to the virtual music community ballhaus.community! Ballhaus.community is a media platform created and maintained by the Ballhaus Association located in Denmark. We have created the platform with the art music ecosystem in mind, i.e. as a community between professional musicians, audiences, organisers, cultural journalists and other enthusiasts who make the music come alive. We are also happy to welcome professionally working artists from other fields into the community.

Ballhaus.community is built on the application Mastodon. Mastodon is in many ways reminiscent of Twitter, with elements from other social networks. But there are significant differences. This little video explains it all in a few minutes:
Short: Et virtuelt fællesskab med fokus på den klassiske og akustiske musiks økosystem. - A virtual community with a focus on classical and acoustic music.
A barebones instance primarily used for testing. Has a few real accounts on it.

Description: MacGeneration offre un traitement sans concession de l’actualité informatique avec les services de presse en ligne MacGeneration (dédié à l’actualité Apple et Mac), iGeneration (dédié à l’actualité iPhone et smartphones), et WatchGeneration (dédié à l’actualité Apple Watch et objets connectés). MacGeneration publie l’application iGeneration, édite une collection de livres numériques, et propose divers services à ses lecteurs : un forum d’entraide, le guide d’achat Je veux le top, le site de petites annonces iOccasion, et le moteur de recherche de produits reconditionnés RefurbGeneration. MacGeneration emploie onze personnes à plein temps, dont sept journalistes.
Short: Instance Mastodon créée et gérée par MacGeneration.

Description:
I want to keep this small and simple, so I'm only allowing people I know to join the server. If I don't know you, with all due respect, don't bother asking, you won't get a response. Not that I expect anyone I don't know to even know about the server, let alone want to join, but I figure I should at least mention it.

To the people I do know, I'm not looking for administrative headaches, so keep it civil and don't do anything stupid. If it becomes a pain to deal with for some reason, I'll be shutting it down.

If you run into other Mastodon instances that are causing problems for some reason, let me know and I will block them.
Short: A small server of IRL friends.  We aren't antisocial, just not very social.

Description:
CORRECTIV

CORRECTIV wurde 2014 gegründet und ist das erste spendenfinanzierte Recherchezentrum in Deutschland. Als vielfach ausgezeichnetes Medium stehen wir für investigativen Journalismus. Unsere Redaktion bringt systematische Missstände ans Licht und will Veränderung anstoßen. Mit unabhängigen Recherchen und Faktenchecks wollen wir das informative Fundament für Debatten und Meinungsbildung schaffen und mit Bildungsangeboten eine demokratische und offene Zivilgesellschaft stärken. Hier teilen wir unsere kostenfreien Inhalte und ermöglichen Menschen aus unserem Netzwerk dies ebenfalls zu tun.

Impressum

CORRECTIV – Recherchen für die Gesellschaft gemeinnützige GmbH
Huyssenallee 11, 45128 Essen
Handelsregister Essen HRB 25135
Geschäftsführer: David Schraven
Inhaltlich verantwortlich i. S. d. § 18 Abs. 2 MStV: David Schraven

Regeln

Für den Austausch auf dieser Instanz, die CORRECTIV als Admin verwaltet, gelten bestimmte Spielregeln. Nur so schaffen wir Räume, in denen sich viele Menschen gerne, konstruktiv und fair miteinander austauschen. Bei den folgenden Regeln handelt es sich um eine (nicht erschöpfende) Liste von Verhaltensweisen, die nach dem Ermessen der Instanz-Admins zur Löschung von Toots oder zur Sperrung von Konten führen können, wie in unseren Nutzungsbedingungen beschrieben. Bitte melden Sie Verhaltensweisen, die Sie stören. Wir werden Ihre Meldung vertraulich behandeln.

  • Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zu einer sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.
  • Wir dulden kein diskriminierendes Verhalten und keine Inhalte, die die Unterdrückung von Mitgliedern marginalisierter Gruppen fördern oder befürworten. Diese Gruppen können sich durch eine der folgenden Eigenschaften auszeichnen: Ethnizität, geschlechtliche Identität oder Ausdruck, sexuelle Identität oder sexueller Ausdruck, körperliche Merkmale oder Alter, Behinderung oder Krankheit, Nationalität, Wohnsitz, Bürgerstatus, Vermögen oder Bildung, Religionszugehörigkeit, Agnostizismus oder Atheismus und weitere.
  • Wir dulden keine Drohungen, kein Stalking und kein Doxxing. Wir tolerieren kein Mobbing und keine Belästigung.
  • Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolik oder die Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
  • Wir dulden keine Verschwörungserzählungen oder andere reaktionäre Mythen, die das oben genannte (und/oder ähnliche) Verhalten unterstützen oder dazu führen.
  • Handlungen, die darauf abzielen, diese Instanz oder ihre Leistung zu schädigen, können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Accounts führen.

Was wir hier gern sehen

  • Gehen Sie aufeinander ein, auch wenn Sie unterschiedliche Meinungen haben. Pflegen Sie auch bei unterschiedlichen Sichtweisen immer einen freundlichen und respektvollen Umgangston. Beachten Sie, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksweisen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.
  • Im Allgemeinen sollten Sie die zur Verfügung gestellten Mittel nutzen, um eine rücksichtsvolle und zugängliche Atmosphäre zu schaffen. Dazu gehört die großzügige Verwendung von Inhaltswarnungen (insbesondere bei potenziell beunruhigenden oder kontroversen Themen) und die Angabe von Untertiteln bei Mediendateien.
  • Wenn möglich, sollten Sie in Ihren Beiträgen bei kreativen Werke, die nicht von Ihnen selbst stammen, die Urheber erwähnen.
  • Unaufgeforderte Kommentare über die persönlichen Entscheidungen, den Lebensstil oder die Familie eines anderen Benutzers sind strengstens untersagt und können als Belästigung angesehen werden. Unangemessene sexuelle Aufmerksamkeit, Kommentare über das Aussehen und die Andeutung von Körperkontakt werden gegenüber nicht einwilligenden Benutzern nicht geduldet.
  • Bots dürfen nur dann mit einem Benutzer interagieren, wenn sie von diesem dazu aufgefordert werden.
  • Die Benennung von Accounts mit “correctiv_” ist dem Instanzbetreiber vorbehalten.

Credits

Diese Spielregeln sind inspiriert von chaos.social & bsd.network. Vielen Dank!

Dieser Text darf unter den Bedingungen der CC-BY (Attribution 4.0 International) Lizenz angepasst und neu gemischt werden.
Short: correctiv.social – betrieben vom gemeinnützigen Recherchezentrum CORRECTIV

Description: Yet another personal mastodon instance.

Privacy

All social media platforms require some data storage, and Mastodon is no exception. However, with more people switching to Mastodon from Twitter, it's important to note some of the privacy concerns. The main concern is that private messages are stored. This is necessary to enable conversations, but it's important to recognize that the operators of the server, as well as any receiving server, may be able to view such messages. Additionally, recipients may screenshot, copy or otherwise share them.

As Mastodon's privacy policy indicates, there are some instances where privacy may be compromised. Some media outlets have used this as an argument against Mastodon, but the level of privacy depends on the instance you use. At billys.mom, we take privacy seriously and only read personal messages if they are reported by a user or if law enforcement issues a reasonable notice.

Can I trust billys.mom?

As with any Mastodon instance, we cannot guarantee 100% privacy. You should always be cautious about what you share on any website. However, we are committed to privacy and will not engage in voluntary surveillance programs. Moreover, governments cannot legally force services to implement blanket spying programs.

If you want to ensure a higher level of privacy, use PGP.

Status

To view the status of billys.mom, please visit status.billys.mom.

Staff

Our moderators and administrators are volunteers who dedicate their spare time to managing the platform and enforcing the rules when necessary. If you would like to support a specific staff member, please reach out to them directly.

Donations

While billys.mom is and will always be free, hosting the platform comes with costs. As such, any donations are greatly appreciated. Even a small amount can make a difference. To donate, please visit me on Liberapay.
Short: Billy's Mom, an privacy-focused instance hosted by Billy (not his mom).

Description:
Welcome to Snowmansland!

Do you want to build a snowman?

About

We're here for all, who like it cold... or warm in a cozy hut. For fans of hot chocolate (or tea/coffee), hot baths or hot springs. If you like Ice and Snow... bad puns or a new story to tell: You're welcome!

Languages: Mostly Ger/Eng
Please read the Server-Rules first, so you'll know what you get! If you have any Problems, Bugs and Complaints, please let me know! We have Daily Database backups!

Disclaimer

This instance currently is open for registration on a approval-basis!

I will open or limit registration again if I see fit. I want to grow this place as organically as possible. While keeping everything manageable.

To Imprint, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy (English-only- German Version is in build)

Rules

  1. Be yourself, but stay decent and mindful towards others!
  2. The Netiquette exits! Please look it up!
  3. Please do these elsewhere:
    • Sensitive content without CWs (Examples: Violence, Trauma, ...).
    • Sexual content in general. There are more suitable instances for this.
    • Hate-Speech, including derogatory use of language for Hate-Speech purposes.
    • Harassing or threatening users in any form (including DMs).
    • Promoting Violence or self-harm
    • Trolling
    • Aggressive advertising
  4. Please leave your Twitter-Snark at the doormat.
  5. Make use of CWs for context clues, whenever useful. You'll lose nothing by being helpful to others and respecting their boundaries!
  6. Use image descriptions whenever possible. They hurt nobody.
  7. When Interacting with users from other instances, their Server rules apply in addition to ours. It's basically like visiting other peoples' homes.
  8. If you have a problem, don't hesitate to contact a Mod or Admin. You don't have to solve it alone!
  9. "Take care of yourself! And be well!" - (Dr. Bernard - "Chubbyemu")

Resources

Blocking Lists

None, Only manual Blocks/Mutes at the moment. (Blocklists or similar might be used when found useful)

Artwork/Banner/Emojis

Emojis:

  • Blobhaj by @heatherhorns@plush.city (CC BY-SA 4.0)
  • Blobcat (citation needed!)
  • Sources for misc Emojis?!?!?

Artworks:

  • Banner: Snowy Plains by @Weirdaholic@snowmans.land (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0)

Things, that have to be implemented

  • DSGVO/DSA Compliance
    • Updating the Privacy-Policy(!!!),
    • reconfiguring Data Storage (eventually changing Storage Server Provider) to be better compliant with the European GDPR.

Description:
Goals

Our goal is to provide a friendly space for people who love FFXIV and want to show that with the Fediverse.

We want members to be able to share their adventures and congratulate/encourage others.

This is by no means a FFXIV-only instance! Feel free to share your real life adventures as well if you feel comfortable doing so, and anything else that brings you joy (other games, movies, books, crafts, etc!).

If you'd like to join a larger general gaming instance, mstdn.games is run by some great people!

Server Info

Currently invite-only to ensure server performance remains stable. Feel free to request an invite if you're looking for an instance to join and you identify as a fellow Eorzean.

Instance currently running on a Linode 2GB vm and I'm closely monitoring performance/capacity to migrate to a larger instance when necessary.

Monthly costs are currently only $12.50/month so I'm happy covering everything for now. I'll let you all know if we ever open up donations so anyone can chip in.

Always open to suggestions/ideas/feedback/etc!

Contact

  • Kadaan Wroth@Gilgamesh
  • Discord: Kadaan#1605
  • 📧kadaan@eorzea.social

      • Server status page: https://status.eorzea.social

Description:
We’re a general server that’s invite only.

Social media is just enough human contact to push off a constant feeling of disconnection. But it will never fully address our existential loneliness, boredom, and dread*. We are isolated and floating around in a sea of disingenuous bullshit. Connection comes through vulnerability and we’re so afraid of being vulnerable we can’t even stand to show strangers the texture of our skin. Social media objectifies us. Our likes, web history, purchases, psychological profiles, attention, etc. are a commodity. Our information is used to manipulate us into bizarre beliefs, consumerism, and discontent. No wonder depression is on the rise. All this doom and gloom leads me to ask, are we social?

*Ok, I do believe that people can form genuine connection over the internet but it usually takes more effort that casual scrolling.
Short: This is a general server for our friends.

Description: help

Kulturfront drivs av ett kollektiv av demokratiska socialister, fackmän och andra aktiva i arbetarrörelsen.

kulturfront skapades som instans för att bära vidare på arbetarrörelsens principer i det digitala, baserat på arvet från Henry Matthis (Social-Demokraten, kulturskriben) organisation med samma namn som bildades 1935.

Delar av den här sidan växlar mellan svenska och engelska för att underlätta för våra användare men även för moderatörer och administratörer från andra servrar utifall att det uppstår dispyter.

Code of Conduct

Prior art

  • Mastodon.social guidelines

The short version

  • Don't harass anyone
  • If someone is harassing you, report it to a moderator
  • Have fun
  • Pay it forward
  • Be excellent to each other


Administrator

Current

  • Coeur66

Moderators


Handling harassment

If you are being harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report." For urgent concerns, please DM a moderator.

If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators' judgment.


Privacy policy

What will we do with your data? Nothing. How will you be influenced by advertisers? You won't; brands and non-humans (other than fun/useful bots) are banned. How will we aggregate your data in order to improve your service… none of that.

We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests if it comes to that. (Hopefully it won't come to that!)

More privacy measures on Kulturfront:

  • EXIF data (GPS location, date, camera type, etc. etc.) is stripped from images and never stored.
  • All crawlers are blocked in robots.txt for accounts.
  • HTTPS is used everywhere thanks to Let's Encrypt.
  • No ads or trackers.
  • Links are direct URLs rather than tracking redirects.

Understand though that this instance is run by me and my friends, and (as is the case with all Mastodon servers) we potentially have access to your data, including DMs. The back-end is also not encrypted. If this is not okay with you, this might not be the instance for you.

Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no E2E encryption. So use Signal or Wire for the things you really want to be private.


GDPR

Huruvida nätverkstjänster såsom Kulturfront, till ytan, är inom scope för regleringar såsom GDPR och dess avarter och andra pga hur tjänsten hanterar personlig data. Som med många juridiska koncept, är verkligheten mer suddig. GDPR reglerar hur aktörer inom och utom EU hanterar personlig data som tillhör EU -medborgare. Det är inte det enda kriteriet. En tjänst måste specifikt sikta in sig på EU -medborgare. Det har prövats i diverse EU-mål före introduceringen av GDPR och GDPR har inte ändrat applicerbarhets-standarden. I praktiken så är det svårt att avgöra vad som kan hända om en Mastodon-instans hamnar i siktet för EUs Data Protection Authority. Det går därför inte att säga något definitivt om dne juridiska situationen, de som nu uttalar sig i definitiva termer om Mastodon och hur tjänsten relaterar till GDPR, säger mig att de inte förstår helhelten av regleringen. Det sagt så är andan och kärnan i GDPR är fullt rimlig, här nedan kommer jag att specifikt prata om vilken data vi samlar, vad vi gör med den och vad vi inte gör med den.

Personlig information som samlas in:

  • Som del av registrationsprocessen, så måste användare av tjänsten ge ett visningsnamn, ett användarnamn, ett lösenord och en giltig mail-adress. Tjänstens användare kan även välja att posta information i kontots profil-område, inkludera hypertext-länkar, och annan telemetri som definierats på (tjänste)användarens egna initiativ.
  • Tjänstens användare kan posta meddelanden genom tjänsten. Sådana meddelanden innehåller visningsnamnet, användarnamnet och text-innehållet i meddelandet. innehållet i meddelandet är ensamt definierat av tjänstens användare.
  • IP-adress information i webbserverns loggar.


Vad vi inte gör.

  • Kulturfront existerar i Sverige (ceph-bucket) och Finland (övrigt), vi vidhåller ingen juridisk mekanism för data-överföringar utanför EU, som t.ex standardiserade kontrakts-klausuler, affärsjuridisk policy eller den nu trasiga Privacy Shield.

  • Kulturfront är inte en juridisk person och har därför ingen juridisk representation i EU, som följd av detta har vi inte utsett en EU DPA.

  • Vi har inget Supplier Management Program för att utvärdera säkerheten hos vår leverantör av virtuell infrastruktur, GleSys, som tillhandahåller fysisk säkerhet, ström, hårdvara och nätverksanslutning. Vi har heller ingen robust process för att utvärdera säkerheten i den, nästan exklusivt, Open Source -mjukvaran som tjänsten använder.

  • Vi utför inte innehålls-analys eller data-mining av användare inskickad information, förutom i de fall av publicerade inlägg som krävs för att informera användare av tjänsten, andra tjänste-användare, andra "fediverse"-instanser, när Tjänste-användaren väljer att göra sina inlägg synliga offentligt.

  • Vi övervakar inte data som tjänste-användarna publicerar för att identifiera potentiellt känslig information. Typen av data som skickats av tjänste-användarna är efter eget gottfinnande av tjänsteanvändaren.

  • Vi utför inte eller lägger till ytterligare säkerhets-processer för olika typer av data, som t.ex känslig personlig information eller speciella kategorier av information.

  • Vi utvärderar inte påverkan på integriteten baserat på vilken av användaren valfri personlig information som denne tjänsteanvändare tillhandahåller, eller publicerar på Kulturfront

  • Vi har ingen formell Data Subject Request -process för att hantera right-to-be-forgotten begäranden, begäran om att tillhandahålla kopior av personlig information, eller att rätta inkorrekt information, eftersom att dessa är självaktiverade åtgärder.

  • Vi har inget tekniskt sätt att förhindra att data som skickas till tjänsten, inklusive profilinformation, inlägg eller följeslagare, eller följare som inte på annat sätt konfigurerats av tjänsteanvändaren för att vara privat, fångas upp och indexeras av sökmotorer eller andra internet-baserade applikationer som inte respekterar de vanliga HTML-flaggorna (robots) för opt-out.

Vad Kulturfront är ansvariga för:

  • Ger registrerade självbetjäningsmöjlighet att radera information som lagts upp om tjänsten. Webbserverloggar rensas från produktionssystem inom en vecka och inom 90 dagar från säkerhetskopiering.
  • Samla in den minsta mängd personlig information som krävs för att tillhandahålla tjänsten
  • Driva Kulturfront på ett sätt som är utformat för att skydda den personliga information som behandlats av den, enligt beskrivningen nedan.
  • Att applicera och agera på de regler som Kulturfront -servern har.
  • Vi tillhandahåller lämpligt säkerhetsskydd som rimligen är tillgängligt för en frivilligdriven, donationsfinansierad nätverkstjänst, inklusive:
    • restriktiv brandvägg
    • uppdateringar per vecka
    • automatisk blockering av vissa attacktyper
    • multifaktorautentisering till administrativa system och applikationsfunktioner
    • datakryptering under överföring över internet
    • lagra lösenord i en för attacker hållbar, hashad form, såsom bcrypt


Vad användare av tjänster får sträva efter:

  • Att välja ett starkt och unikt lösenord vid registrering
  • Att slå på multifaktor-autentisering
  • Välja lämplig målgrupp för ett inlägg (t.ex. offentligt, olistat, endast följare, endast nämnda personer)
  • Bedöma den potentiella påverkan på tjänstanvändarens integritet för all personlig information som publiceras via Kulturfront
  • Att radera innehåll (dvs. rätten att bli glömd) som tjänstanvändaren vill ta bort från Kulturfront
  • Nedladdning av kopior av profildata som tjänsteanvändaren vill skaffa eller behålla för personlig säkerhetskopiering
  • Redigering (i den utsträckning det medges av Mastodon-programvaran), eller radering och återpublicering av innehåll som tjänstanvändaren vill korrigera
  • Att ställa in användarprofilens synlighet till privat, vilket begränsar möjligheten för icke-följare att se viss information om tjänstanvändarens konto.
  • Ställa in kontoprofilen för att motverka webbserverindexering av kontoprofilen.
  • Att följa reglerna för Kulturfront -servern

Användare, tjänsteanvändare och tjänste-användare är personer som registrerat sig på och använder Kulturfront -tjänsten.


Blocked instances

We block some other instances. The full list is below. For disputes, please contact the admin via DM or email.

The purpose of this list is to be transparent to our users. Our rules are based on the example set by mastodon.social.

This list is for informational purposes only. It should not be considered the one definitive list for all-time of instances full of bad people who are bad and should feel bad about themselves. This is a list of instances blocked by Kulturfront based on the judgment of our moderators, our Code of Conduct, and the laws of the European Union, Finland and Sweden.

Said list is published down below.


Notes on our instance

  • We don't accept hate speech.
  • We don't accept violent nationalism or National Socialism.
  • We are not a "free speech zone."
  • We come from a different cultural heritage than many of the Mastodon/GNU Social instances.
  • We pass no judgment on those that do, but our users may not want to engage with such content. This is what alt accounts are for.

This instance if for all those guys that love a great pair of underwear, be it wearing them and showing them off or to simply admire those who do. We are LGBT friendly and inclusive to all.

==Underwear brands== Underwear brands are welcome to join and promote themselves, we encourage you are friendly and interact with your fans and be respectful to your potential customers. We also as that you self verify your accounts using the rel="me" as shown in your profile.

Content warnings

We fully understand you are here to share your underwear collection and anything that can be seen on a public beach or catwalk is allowed on this instance, marking your media as sensitive is your choice.

As we wish to Federate with others, should your toots be lewd, include nudity, or sexual depictions, content warning should be used.

Profile & header images

All public facing images that are displayed in our profile directory and shared with other instances should be appropriate, therefore kindly refrain from nudity or sexually explicit imagery.

Connected relays

  • https://relay.gay/
  • https://relay.gayfr.social/
Short: Instance dedicated to those who love underwear or admire those that wear them, from brief to boxers, jockstraps to something a little more titillating.

Description:
Purpose

This server is intended from human scientists for human scientists of all disciplines. The intention is to provide a professional and structured platform to present & discuss research and scientific views.

This server is new and started on Nov. 25th 2022

Registration

Individuals

This server is open for publishing scientists. We warmly invite you to join. Please sign up with the

  • email address you are using as corresponding author
  • link to your publication list to get approved - the email in corresponding authors section of at least one publication should match the email address you are signing up with.

Organizations

This server is open for scientific organizations.

  • you have to register from an email address of your organization.

We will get in touch which officials from your organization before approval. Therefore please allow a time span of at least 4 working days until your account will be approved and online.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behavior, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment.

Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Persistence of this server

We will announce a possible shutdown of this server 3 months in advance. A full transfer to other administrators will be announced 3 months in advance.

Storing data on this service

Please do not intend to use this service for storing your data. This server is aiming at timely public communication for scientists. However, we cannot and will not guarantee that whatever you post will stay online forever.
Short:
The server mainly for human scientists of all disciplines to discuss their views & latest findings.
This server is also open to scientific organisations.

No specific topics are the focus, but we hope that conversations naturally evolve from the personalities we're able to gather.

Description:
SEE ALSO
LEMMY: https://lem.clinicians-exchange.org
EMAIL LIST: https://www.clinicians-exchange.org

WHO WE ARE
Clinicians Exchange provides a forum for mental health professionals to exchange ideas, resources and expertise including but not limited to ethics, politics, practice building, and clinical issues. It is designed to be a place where practitioners of many disciplines and settings can receive camaraderie and support in our rewarding but challenging work.

PLEASE JOIN OUR EMAIL LIST DISCUSSION
We also have an email listserv with slightly higher confidentiality where professional emails are presumably not subject to being read by the world. Please consider joining us there too at clinicians-exchange.org.

STAFF
@admin -- Michael Reeder LCPC: Owner
@jason -- Jason Hobbs LCSW, M.Div: Owner

CODE OF CONDUCT
Also note SERVER RULES below.

This is a place for professional conversations not for personal psychological help or referrals.

Posts should be related to the practices of professional psychology, counseling, social work, neuroscience, and allied professions. Peer support is allowed.

We intend to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible regardless of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristics.

We wish to create a supportive community where people freely share their passions and are excited and optimistic about each other's successes.

We also work to protect our community from harassment, malicious or illegal content, and individual members whose goals are to disrupt our community and promote their own self-interest at the expense of the community.
Short: This is a Mastodon instance for mental health professionals of all professions, graduate students, and retirees.  See also https://lem.clinicians-exchange.org and https://www.clinicians-exchange.org .

Alpaka-Garden ist eine rein privat betriebene Instanz, welche sich nur an Personen richtet, welche @HyggesAlpaka kennen. Die Instanz wird derzeit rein privat finanziert.

Hosting

Die Instanz läuft einem V-Server bei der netcup GmbH in Nürnberg und ist daher aktuell noch nicht redundant ausgelegt, da die Useranzahl dies noch nicht rechtfertigt.

Um eine spätere Skalierung und Datensicherheit sicher zu stellen, werden Medien-Daten und Datenbank Backups im Google Cloud Storage abgelegt.

Kosten

1) Server: 6,03€ pro Monat

2) Domain: 3,42€ pro Monat

3) Speicher: ~1,50€ pro Monat (stand 01.02.2023)

Spenden

Derzeit werden keine Spenden angenommen.

Description:
Welcome

Welcome to the PHP community on Mastodon! We provide a place for PHP programmers & friends to discuss topics related to the PHP programming language, frameworks, packages, tools, open source, tech, life, and more. First and foremost, we're about building community, and that doesn't always involve technical discussion, so feel free to go off-topic and have fun.

Who's Behind This?

phparch.social is an official Mastodon instance for PHP Architect LLC, the great team behind php[architect] Magazine, php[tek] Conference, and many other efforts within the greater PHP Community.

Code of Conduct

If you believe anyone is in physical danger or doing something that is against the law, please notify appropriate emergency services first by calling the relevant local authorities.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of phparch.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Flooding the public timeline with excessive automated posts
    3. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    4. Untagged nudity, pornography, and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    5. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox)
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling)

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Reporting Harassment

To report harassment, click the three vertical dots (⋮) on a user's profile and select "Report @user." For urgent concerns, you may contact us at hello@phparch.com.

Policies

Your continued used of phparch.social implies your agreement with our policies. If you disagree with our policies, please discontinue the use of our services.

We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant. A number of instance blocks are implemented to comply with the principles of the covenant and to prevent our users from being exposed to content that does not comply with our instance rules.
Short: Mastodon server for PHP Architect LLC

👋 Hello and welcome to DORSET.social

The place for News, Events and anything else related to Dorset.

Please keep it clean, polite(ish). If you must look down on someone, only do it with the intention of helping them back up.

🤗 How to Join

DORSET.social is for anyone living in Dorset (UK) or for any Groups, Businesses, Services and Charities that operate in Dorset.

Signup is currently invite-only at the moment, if you would like to join or for more information, please send an email to contact@dorset.social briefly explaining who you are and what you do and we'll get back to ASAP

🎁 Funding and Support

Can you help? We are looking for sponsors, big or small — if you would like to help support dorset.social, please email funding@dorset.social 🙏

🚨 Reporting and Moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please bear in mind that you are not normally notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offences, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offences.
Short: A Mastodon community for people and businesses in Dorset, UK.

Description:
Ein Ausschnitt aus den Regeln, an die wir uns auf dieser Instanz halten:

Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen. Respektvoller Umgang. Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, transphobe, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten! Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden. Keine übertriebene Werbung. Accounts mit sehr viel oder ausschließlich Werbung werden suspendiert. Sexuelle oder gewalttätige Medien müssen bei der Veröffentlichung als sensibel gekennzeichnet werden. Keine Fake News oder Anti-Impf Spam

Wichtig Ungeachtet dieser Regeln behält sich die Moderation das Recht vor, aus beliebigen Gründen Posts zu löschen oder einen Account zu blockieren. Dabei werden auch Inhalte auf anderen Webseiten (verlinkter Twitter/Blog) einbezogen.

Wenn du Verstöße gegen die Regeln feststellst oder dir nicht sicher bist, nutze die Melden Funktion, oder sende uns eine Email.
Short: Kleine Instanz für jegliche Entitäten aus Fürth.

Description:
Colloquium is for people interested in the Classics, and Latin and Ancient Greek, of any time period. Posting can be in any language we are capable of reading or machine translating. Off topic is fine, but please do have an interest and post about these topics and in these languages. If you show no interest in them, we may ask you to choose a different server.

Medievalists, Classists, Renaissance and New Latin scholars and readers welcome. Living Latin and Living Greek speakers and learners welcome.

We abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant https://joinmastodon.org/covenant This mean that we will * Back up user data daily * Give you three months notice if we decide to close the project

Description:
spartanburg.social is a social media site based on Mastodon designed for the use of current and former residents in and around Spartanburg, S.C. It's part of the Sparkle City Media Hub, an effort to establish nonprofit local media in Spartanburg, including local social media, a website for long-form journalism, a daily newsletter, podcasts, videos, etc.

Keeping the lights on

There's no advertising on spartanburg.social. Neither is your activity tracked and sold to Big Data. But of course there's no such thing as a free lunch. Those who can afford it are encouraged to contribute at the spartanburg.social Patreon site. Your money will support this site as well as our effort to establish other forms of local media in Spartanburg. Our purpose is to establish a place for conversations by and about Spartanburg.

What is Mastodon?

Mastodon is a micro-blogging site similar to Twitter or Tumblr. The difference is that it's based on an open standard called ActivityPub that anyone can use. Mastodon is developed by a German non-profit, Mastodon gGmbH, and it is used by hundreds of instances (servers) around the globe. These sites each set up their own rules, moderate the posts of their own users, and decide which other sites they will exchange posts with.

No one person in control of Mastodon as a whole, just people or groups who run individual instances. There are no ads nor algorithms that determine what you see. Unlike Twitter, Facebook, or Tik-Tok, there is no corporate surveillance of what you do. Data stored on spartanburg.social is kept on servers within the United States, and is only available to law enforement with a subpoena.

You can access Mastodon from any web browser or from dedicated phone apps from Mastodon and other developers.

Moving from another server?

This guide may be helpful.

A note about direct messaging on Mastodon

Just as with Twitter, any DMs you send on Mastodon are unencrypted and potentially visible to server administrators. We recommend you always use an encrypted messaging service like WhatsApp or Signal. Even then, your messages are available to anyone with access to your phone.

Who the heck are you?

The co-founders of the Sparkle City Media Project are Walt Wooton and Chandra L. Pierce.

@waltwooton was the systems editor at the Herald-Journal from 1995 – 2013. Prior to that he was the operations manager at the The Independent Florida Alligator (Gainesville, FL). He has also been a freelance magazine writer published in The Floridian (former Sunday magazine of the St. Petersburg Times) Florida Trend, Florida Sportsman, Florida Audubon, and elsewhere. He was involved in the startup of online news sites both at the Herald-Journal and at the Alligator. In 2005, he won first place in enterprise reporting from the South Carolina Press Association.

@chanlp was the news research manager at the Herald-Journal, from 2000 to 2006. In 2004, she won the Judson Chapman award from the South Carolina Press Association for uncovering failings in the state sex offender registry. She has an M.L.I.S. from the University of South Carolina and is the Director of Learning Resources at Sherman College of Chiropractic.

How you can help

Want to help? We need writers, activists, business gurus, coders, and others. Email us at Walt Wooton or Chandra L. Pierce.
Short: A Mastodon instance maintained by @waltwooton for residents of Spartanburg, South Carolina, and the surrounding area. With enough support, it will become part of a nonprofit local media cooperative.

Description:
It's a collective of Northwest web builders, artists, developers, producers and writers allied to create a community of respected, highly skilled web professionals. Our aim, goal, mission, purpose, and calling stems from our original manifesto: mousecontrol = web geeks talking shop and talking shit.

A couple of years before the turn of the century, a statup group of non-conformists in Seattle launched mousecontrol. Although they were embracing electronic media to its fullest and being paid handsomely by some of the busiest corporate web houses around, the artists and develpers at mousctontrol were searching for something "more".

What was develpoped was mousecontrol.
Short: We are mousecontrol.  A global group of cyberati, founded in the mid-early 90s

Description:
Hi 👋 Welcome to AdInfinitum.Social

We're a fun little Mastodon instance of IRL friends and acquaintances who flocked away from that birdsite to a happier and friendlier place. You don't necessarily need to know a moderator to join, but if want to be part of our instance and don't know one of us, make sure to let us know why you want to be on our instance when you sign up.

Federated Community

This service is community-driven and runs on the Mastodon open-source platform. If you just stumbled here and are new to Mastodon, check out Mastodon's main website or Buffer's excellent Beginner's Guide to Mastodon.

We take a proactive approach to managing our federation with other instances. This approach is an attempt to foster a safe and welcoming space for all. Our block list is only available to logged in users.

Other Stuff

Server

This instance is backed up regularly with the backups being stored locally and offsite. We use HTTPS everywhere. Maintenance is announced via server announcements.

Copyright & DMCA Notices

All users are expected to respect copyrights and error on the side of caution when making judgements about fair use. If you believe a user on our instance has violated your copyright, or a copyright that you are authorized to enforce, you may fill out our DMCA takedown notice form. Our DMCA Registration Number is DMCA-1044104. DMCA Section 512 notices may be submitted using this form. The content identified in the form as infringing on your copyright will be removed and the submitted form will be forwarded to the user so that they can decide of they wish to appeal the decision.
Short: We're a small (but mighty) Mastodon instance primarily created for IRL friends and acquaintances. However, you don't need to know a moderator to join if we seem like your people.

Description:
El objetivo de este servidor de Mastodon es servir de foro abierto y punto de encuentro para las personas que formen o quieran formar parte del ecosistema digital de Córdoba.

Hablaremos de tecnología, innovación y cultura y humanismo digital. Si bien la línea principal es esa, este foro no está limitado ni a esa temática, ni a la localización geográfica de Córdoba y provincia, por lo que siéntete libre de unirte y participar para hablar de lo que quieras.

Corduba Tech es una asociación sin ánimo de lucro que trata de favorecer la evolución del ecosistema tecnológico de Córdoba y entorno. Uno de sus objetivos es favorecer el uso de tecnologías habilitadoras, abiertas y distribuidas, por lo que la adopción de Mastodon como herramienta de comunicación y comunidad nos parece acertada.

La forma de unirte a Corduba Tech no es mediante inscripción, sino mediante tu participación. Cuanto más participes y más aportes, más relevante será tu pertenencia. Este foro puede ser una buena forma de empezar y darte a conocer.

También, si crees que evolucionar el ecosistema innovador, creativo, tecnológico y digital de Córdoba puede reportar beneficios a tu desarrollo, puedes apoyarnos económicamente a través de una suscripción de patrocinio de colaboración.

Seremos tan fuertes como lo sea nuestra capacidad de colaboración y apoyo mutuo. Seremos legión.

Javier Jiménez, Presidente de Corduba Tech
Short: Este servidor está mantenido por la comunidad Corduba Tech. Su objetivo servir de foro abierto y punto de encuentro para las personas que formen o quieran formar parte de nuestro ecosistema.

Description:
Introduction

We're all part of the atheist and skeptic community, on the social justice side of the deep rift. We're worried about religion and pseudo-science, but we're also worried about climate change, fascism, and bigotry in all its forms. We rarely agree on things, but we try to focus our anger on social institutions rather than people.

Does that sound like you? Then come join us! Not sure? Most of us come from Freethought Blogs, so by browsing there you can get a feel for what we're like here. However, Mastodon is not a blog, nor even Twitter without Nazis; don't worry, we have some reading material available to help explain what it is.

Just like our other site, there are no ads here. We do not sell your data to third-party brokers, either. This instance is made by the community, for the community, and runs on volunteers and donations. Conversely, be mindful of that; running this server is not our job, and we have lives and time commitments elsewhere.

Code of Conduct

The server rules do a pretty good job of explaining what's acceptable or otherwise here. Still, a few points are worth elaborating on.

... filling up the local timeline with posts.

Many people catch up on what's new by scrolling through the local timeline. If you post your twenty-post-long magnum opus all at once, you're forcing others to scroll past twenty consecutive posts if they're not interested. Putting a content warning on them doesn't help, as most clients don't shrink the post down to the content warning, so you've just exchanged a wall of text for a wall of blank space.

The recommended approach is to make the first post relatively short, add either a content warning or description stating it's part of a long thread, then setting the visibility of the remaining posts to Unlisted instead of Public.

Incidentally, this is why we don't recommend you use the official Mastodon phone app; for some bizarre reason, it prevents you from using the Unlisted visibility. If you have an iPhone, Metatext does not have this problem plus it has a threaded view, and last time we looked it was free. There are other choices for iOS, as well as for Android.

... excessive private messages ...

This is a bit of a tangent, but worth mentioning. Private visibility means your posts can only be seen by the people mentioned in them. Twitter, in contrast, keeps direct messages private even when they mention another person's handle. This has lead to more than a few people being surprised their private gripes about That User are visible to said user.

... "just asking questions" ...

The devil doesn't need an advocate. If I had a nickel for every time someone asked me how we can be evolved from monkeys because monkeys still exist, or pointed out the high level of black-on-black crime, or gestured vaguely at Hannah Mouncey, I'd have maybe two nickels. That's because I avoid conversations where one side hasn't done the bare minimum of research necessary to become informed, and are likely just trying to feed a martyr complex. If you try to engage in sealioning, don't be shocked when you're banned or blocked from this instance.

No feds.

The police have not been kind to LGBT people. Within living memory, they have gone out of their way to harass and ruin them financially. This is just one of the many, many, many problems with law enforcement. Excluding them makes our community friendly and safer, without causing a public safety issue. Other branches of the state have their own issues, hence why they're included as well.

No short links.

Having said that about short links, Mastodon can create huge spikes in network traffic due to its decentralized nature. If you're linking to a small Mastodon instance in a post, consider using a proxy like jort.link to soften the traffic spike.

No stereotyping.

Consider this asshole.

What will we do if an Islamist regime, which grows dewy-eyed at the mere mention of paradise, ever acquires long-range nuclear weaponry? If history is any guide, we will not be sure about where the offending warheads are or what their state of readiness is, and so we will be unable to rely on targeted, conventional weapons to destroy them. In such a situation, the only thing likely to ensure our survival may be a nuclear first strike of our own. Needless to say, this would be an unthinkable crime—as it would kill tens of millions of innocent civilians in a single day — but it may be the only course of action available to us, given what Islamists believe.
Sam Harris, The End of Faith: Religion, Terror, and the Future of Reason. (2004)

His hypothetical future scenario was not hypothetical when he wrote it. The Islamic Republic of Pakistan performed their first nuclear weapons tests in 1998, and claims to have been capable of detonating a nuke since 1984. Yet despite being an active sponsor of terrorism and engaging in occasional small wars with neighboring India, we're far more concerned about Russia dropping a nuclear bomb nowadays. Sam Harris holds a wildly stereotyped view of religious terrorists, at odds with reality.

This tendency to stereotype is shockingly common. Think all Buddhists are pacifists? In reality, Buddhists have found ways to justify violence and war. Ever shake your head at how bigoted Floridians are against gay people? Support for gay rights in Florida is on par with Minnesota, Hawaii, and Pennsylvania, plus not too far behind New York, Maine, or California. Argued that all Texans are gun nuts? A majority favour stricter gun laws, they're just stuck in a state that allows minority rule. In sum, critique the actual views of specific people, rather than assume an entire group is homogeneous in how they think.

But seriously, First Nations people are l33t gamerz.

Use content warnings so that other people won't see things they don't want to, but don't force others to use content warnings they don't think are appropriate.

Mastodon has a culture of putting content warnings on pretty much everything. Think of it as a subject line for what follows, allowing you to skip reading something you don't care about. There's also the argument that something you find bland, such as a photo of your meal, might be annoying to someone else, say those with an eating disorder. Why risk making someone's day worse, when all you have to do is type a few words in the "content warning" box?

Thanks to the recent influx of Twitter users, there's been quite a bit of push-back on that culture. The two best counter-arguments are that if you put content warnings on everything, you're arguing that everything is equally triggering. "Hair woes" and "sexual assault" are clearly not. It's also tough to scrub out your unconscious sexism/racism/etc. if you can easily ignore posts on sexism/racism/etc.

In practice, both posting styles coexist quite peacefully. Those who must have a content warning can add filters as insurance, and if someone is egregious about not using them you can mute or block that user, or report the post to a mod. In case the implication isn't clear, let's be explicit: refusing to put content warnings on posts that need them are a violation of the rules and can get you kicked off this instance. Trolling people with misleading content warnings is also a violation of the rules.

Avoid replying to a post with an request for a content warning, that rarely works unless you're a moderator.

Description:
אודות ההנהלה

שלום,

קוראים לי עידו אמין,
ואני לא מפוזר - אני מבוזר.
אני מהדינוזאורים של הרשת (האזינו כאן).

רבים שואלים אותי: האם קהילה מסטודונית עשויה להיות אלטרנטיבה לפלטפורמות החברתיות הרעילות הקורסות לאיטן?
כדי לבדוק, פתחתי את השרת הזה.
כרגע, אני מזמין רק קהילה קרובה שאני מכיר אישית. בהמשך, אולי ארחיב; אולי לא; ואם בסוף אסגור את השרת, תהיה הודעה ואפשרות לייצא רשימת עוקבים לשרת אחר. אבל נתמקד בחיובי.

מי מוזמן לפה

כמוני, אתם בוגרים ואחראים, נפגשנו פעם, עבדנו יחד, אכלנו משהו, שתינו משהו, עישנו במדרגות של מערכת תוכן כלשהי, באתם לאירוע שהופעתי בו, השתתפתם בסרט שהופעתי בו, הקלטתם אותי, ערכתם אותי, אצרתם אותי, הייתם מנויים של הניוזלטר שלי, הופעתם ב"דפי רשת" המקורי, או שקלתם השקעה במיזם שלי – ומעונינים להתנסות במסטודון בקהילה שיש בה עוד מכרים שלי? הרשמו/הרשמנה, והזכירו/הזכרנה לי מאיפה אתם מכירים/ות אותי (או את אחד האדמינים האחרים). אם יתאים לשני הצדדים, אני מצפה מתישהו לתרומה באמצעות פטראון (לינק פלייסהולדר).

ילדותנו השניה

השרת הזה לא נוצר כבסיס אנדרגראונד שירים את נס המרד במלכות רשעה. השרת הזה הוא בסך הכל אחד מכ-20 אלף שרתים/קהילות שמהווים את הפדרציה. כל שטות שתעשו פה, תשליך על הקהילה הזו, רשת.סושיאל, ועל האחראי על הרשת.סושיאל... שזה אני. חלק מהניסוי זה לבדוק את התרבות החדשה-ישנה של הפדרציה: התנהגות בוגרת, דיבור בגובה העיניים, ללא אלגוריתם, ללא קידום מניפולטיבי, ללא חיפוש טקסט חופשי, עם פרטיות (אך ללא הצפנה). טעם של פעם! כמעט כמו בפורומים, ביוזנט, בפידונט ... האם זו ילדותנו השניה, רק בלי הדרמה, ההטרלות והקטטות?

יש כמה מדריכים לא רעים, ואני מפרסם טיפים ביוזר שפתחתי פה ושנקרא... דוח אמין.
Short: שרת "רשת" המיתולוגי מהניינטיז התגלגל ל"רשת.סושיאל" ומופעל בשידורי נסיון ע"י עידו אמין עם עזרה מידידים.

Description:
Welcome to devtools.social, an instance for those interested in devtools. We hope you'll have a nice time here.

About

Many mastodon instances are built around communities, with various subspecializations of software and tech having instances, such as infosec, SRE, open source, etc. So this one is for devtools.

We intend this to be broad and inclusive. Folks who don't work in devtools are welcome, and obviously this is social media, so post about whatever.

Accounts for companies and projects are explicitly allowed. Please try to keep the accounts authentic, reasonable volume, and don't post on a "content schedule". The bio should include the handles of the people running the accounts.

Volunteers to help moderate are appreciated, email me!

Why devtools.social

The main reason to pick this instance is if you want your "local" feed (one of the three ways to see content) to have people talking about devtools in it. We also intend this community to be kind and inclusive, though most mastodon communities are also like that ☺️

Getting started

  • sign up using the "Create account" button on the right

  • to add your follows, go to fedifinder which provides a list that you can upload via Preferences -> Import and export. I recommend also following the people who followed you.

  • for iOS, I recommend Tooot

  • when posting, think Twitter 2009, not Twitter 2022. Less thought-leadership and hot takes, and much more mundane things. Less self-promotion, more interesting work. Just consider the bar for posting way way lower.

  • Retweet ("boost") anything you find interesting - there is no algorithm to surface content, and "likes" are not shared, so people rely on this.

To migrate here

You can migrate from other instances to this one, keeping all your followers.

  • create your account here
  • On devtools.social, go to Account -> Moving From another account and add your old username@instance.name
  • On you old instance, go to Account -> Moving To another account and enter username@devtools.social. Press enter.
  • Your followers will start following you here, and will typically all have moved within 12 hours

Other

This instance is run by Paul Biggar. If you have any questions, DM or email me.
Short: A place for those interested in devtools. Anyone is welcome to join, especially folks in tech who build, work on, or are simply interested, in tools for building software.

Description:
Se hieman savolaisempi vaihtoehto.

Täällä voi tuutata Suomea, Savoa, hilijoo ja kovvoo. Käy toki myös ne vieraat kieletkin.

Tänne on tervetulleita myös muut kuin savolaiset!

Ylläpitäjät

Tätä palvelinta ylläpitää Marko

Instanssin ylläpitoon ja moderointitiimiin haetaan aina vapaaehtoisia ja halukkaita. Tule mukaan kehittämään instanssia lähettämällä sähköpostia osoitteeseen halloota@kalakukko.social

Kenelle tämä on?

Kuten osoitteesta ja kielestä voi päätellä niin suomalaisille. Hieman ehkä haetaan savolaisia ja savolaishenkisiä tänne jäseneksi. Mutta ee oo pakko olla jos ei taho!

Botteja saa tänne luoda, mutta hyvä pyytää ylläpidon hyväksyntä sille toiminnalle!

Rekisteröityminen on hyväksynnän takana toistaiseksi ja tämä voi muuttua tulevaisuudessa. Ylläpito siis hyväksyy rekisteröitymisen!

Organisaatiot ja yhdistykset ovat myös tervetulleita ja jakaa sisältöä sääntöjen rajoissa. Kaupallisen toiminnan säännöt koskevat kuitenkin myös näitä toimijoita, mutta kaikenlainen voittoa tavoittelematon ja yleishyödyllinen toiminta on sallittua.

Ylläpitäjät voivat tarvittaessa milloin tahansa sulkea yksittäisen käyttäjän tilin, jos hän poikkeaa ratkaisevalla tavalla instanssin säännöistä. Lopullisen tulkinnan sääntörikkomuksista tekevät moderaattorit sekä sivuston ylläpitäjä.

Rekisteröitymällä tänne hyväksyt säännöt!

Säännöt

Ei pornografista, seksuaalista tai ylettömän väkivaltaista sisältöä.

Pornografinen ja seksuaalinen sisältö on kielletty. Alastomuus on sallittu, mutta se tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Liiallinen väkivaltainen sisältö on kielletty. Esimerkiksi: todellisia terroritekoja kuvaava väkivaltainen sisältö, teloitusvideot yms. Moderaattorit arvioivat tarvittaessa, mikä on liiallista.

Tämän lisäksi muu väkivaltainen sisältö tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Ei rasismia, seksismiä, transfobiaa, tai muuta vähemmistöihin kohdistuvaa syrjintää

Rasismi, seksismi, transfobia, antisemitismi tai muu vähemmistöön kohdistuva syrjintä on kielletty ja voi johtaa tilin pysyvään sulkemiseen.

Ei laittomuuksia

Kaikki Suomen lakeja rikkova sisältö on palvelimella kielletty ja johtaa tilin sulkemiseen ja käyttäjän raportointiin poliisille.

Ei häirintää, doksausta, valheellisen tiedon levittämistä tai muina esiintymistä

Muiden käyttäjien häirintä, palvelun toimintaa häiritsevä käytös, ja muu toiminta joka haittaa muiden käyttäjien käyttökokemusta on kielletty. Tällaisia asioita ovat muun muassa:

  • Viestien lähettäminen käyttäjälle sen jälkeen, kun tämä on pyytänyt keskustelun lopettamista tai muiden käyttäjien kehottaminen tällaiseen käytökseen.
  • Muiden käyttäjien yksityistietojen levittäminen.
  • Salaliittoteorioiden, disinformaation tai muun valheellisen tiedon levittäminen.
  • Esiintyminen jonain muuna henkilönä, jos kyse ei ole parodiasta. Parodiatilit tulee merkitä selvästi ja yksiselitteisesti sellaisiksi.
  • Kuvakaappauksien levittäminen muiden käyttäjien viesteistä ilman, että merkitsee kyseistä käyttäjää viestiin, tai muuten häiritsemistarkoituksessa.

Ei roskapostia

Älä ole roskapostittaja ja täytä muiden syötettä turhalla spämmäämisellä.

Ei kaupallista toimintaa

kalakukko.social ei ole tarkoitettu influenssereille, tuotteille tai yrityksille. Viestien lähettäminen korvausta vastaan (ns. kaupallinen yhteistyö) on kielletty.

Tämä ei tarkoita, etteikö keskustelussa saisi mainita yrityksiä tai tuotteita, kunhan siitä ei saa korvausta. Oman yrityksensä tai omien tuotteiden maininta on sallittua, kunhan se ei ole tilin ainoa tarkoitus. Tarvittaessa moderaattorit arvioivat tämän.

Mikä ihmeen Mastodontti?

Ei kyse ei ole Veetistä vaan Mastodon nimisestä palvelusta.

Mittee tämä maksoopi?

Ei niin mitään. Mastodon on ilmainen käyttää tämä palvelin on ilmainen käyttäjille.

Palvelimen ylläpito kuitenkin maksaa ja jos haluat siinä mahdollisesti auttaa niin ota yhteyttä halloota@kalakukko.social sähköpostin kautta.

Käytössä:

  • VPS: Hetzner (Suomi / Helsinki)
  • Media: UpCloud (Suomi / Helsinki)
  • E-mail: Amazon SES
  • DNS: Cloudflare
  • Emojit: Suomi emojit

Linkkejä:

  • Instanssin tila: status.kalakukko.social
Short: Se hieman savolaisempi vaihtoehto Mastodon instanssille.
