IMPRESSUM:

troet.church

Postfach 22

85396 Hallbergmoos

E-Mail: admin(at)troet.church

ZWECK:

Troet.Church ist eine deutschsprachige, Mastodon Instanz mit dem Schwerpunkt christlicher Themen. Die Instanz dient dem Austausch von Born Again Christen. Die Registrierung ist geschlossen und eine Mitgliedschaft ist nur via Einladung eines Mitglieds möglich. Du hast Interesse? Wende dich per E-Mail an "admin(at)troet.church".

VERHALTENSREGELN:

Wir haben für die Nutzung gewisse Serverregeln erstellt, die Ihr etwas weiter unten auf dieser Seite findet und die Ihr mit der Erstellung eines Accounts akzeptiert.

MODERATION:

Wir überwachen keine Nutzerkonten, Beiträge und Nutzerinteraktionen. Gemäß §§ 8-10 Telemediengesetz sind wir nicht für fremde Informationen verantwortlich, solange wir keine Kenntnis davon haben. Wir werden aber sofort und tatkräftig tätig, sobald wir Kenntnis von Informationen erlangen, die gegen unsere Regeln / Verhaltenskodex, geltendes Recht oder gegen Gesetze der Bundesrepublik Deutschland verstoßen.

SERVER:

Der Server hat seinen Standort in Deutschland und wird mit 100% Ökostrom betrieben.

BACKUPS:

Es wird 1x täglich, mit wöchentlicher Rotation ein Backup erstellt.
Short: Troet.Church ist eine christliche Mastodon Instanz mit dem Schwerpunkt christlicher Themen. Born Again Christen, Gemeinden und Kirchen sind herzlich Willkommen hier ein Konto zu eröffnen.

Description:
About

This instance is invite-only for tech-professionals, coders, hackers, open-source enthusiasts and alike.

We like to build a curated community of nice people that love to nerd out about tech stuff or just need a safe home or a fresh start. But everyone is welcome as long as they follow the rules.

We deeply believe in life, respect, peace, human- and digital rights. We also talk about gaming, music, hobbies, pets and LGTBQIA+ stuff.

Bums... what?

"Bums" is German colloquial speech. It's literal meaning is something like "loud bang" or "loud pop". It's often used by younger people to devalue things, so "bumscode" means something along the lines of "shitcode" or "crapcode". Think of "bums" like the "f" in "wtf".

The origin of "bumscode" is not 100% clear, but a group of coders at the company kris is working at, has been using it consistently in code reviews and meetings to refer to bad or not working code. So it's kind of an in-joke.

Moderation

We do not federate with facist instances or instances that promote or tolerate harassment, transphobia, homophobia, racism, sexism, doxxing, stalking, hate-speech, conspiracy theories, religious extremism, white supremacy, nationalism, colonialism or things that are illegal in Germany (like nazi-symbols and slogans).

If you see something that doesn't comply with our rules, just report it. If it's really really urgent, feel free to DM one of our moderators:

@maybeanerd, @kris ... (more to come)

Imprint / legal notice

You can read the full legal notice here. This instance is maintained by kris in his spare time and nerves. Don't push either of those.
Short: bumscode.com - an invite-only Fediverse instance for tech-professionals, coders, hackers, open-source enthusiasts and alike

This is a tiny, general interest instance hooked up to a bunch of relays for interesting content. It’s located on a server in a house in the Rocky Mountains of Colorado and the network connection is a fairly narrow, low latency, rural wireless connection. No fiber here! Just mountains, snow, deer, and my dog companions.

If you want to join for some reason, message me and we can talk.

Because of our unusual network connection this instance is susceptible to extreme weather interruptions and the occasional hardware maintenance by the ISP. So, we don’t have the best uptime, but we’re up 90% at a bare minimum.

System Status

Description: A small little place with too many open kassas

What is this?

Rathe Social is an unofficial Mastodon instance for people interested in Flesh and Blood TCG. This site was set up to be a great place for FaB fans to get together and discuss the game, life, or anything really, while also being a jump-off point to other Mastodon instances.

Disclaimer

Rathe Social is in no way affiliated with Legend Story Studios. Legend Story Studios®, Flesh and Blood™, and set names are trademarks of Legend Story Studios. Flesh and Blood characters, cards, logos, and art are property of Legend Story Studios.

Why?

The recent changes at Twitter have caused a surge in hate speech directed at many marginalized groups. This has led to a lot of people wanting to abandon Twitter and move to other platforms to avoid harassment. Mastodon is uniquely structured to prevent this by allowing us to block any instance that allow that kind of behavior. If you see an instance that's continually posting harmful content with no moderation, let an admin or moderator know so we can decide whether to block the instance.

Twitter has also recently banned posting links to other social media or linktrees, trying to halt the flow of users out of its site. This may seriously impact many FaB content creators who won't be able to advertise their content on Twitter anymore. While Mastodon isn't as great at discovery beyond the local timeline as Twitter, FaB content creators and players here are free to link to their content and other social media.

What is Mastodon?

Mastodon is similar to Twitter, and you can get a quick understanding by reading these tips, or for a bit more depth, you can read this article to get a good understanding. The core difference with Mastodon is that, unlike Twitter, content is spread across a web of instances. In order for a post from another instance to get to your local instance, you need to be following the author, or someone you follow needs to boost the post.

One way I've found for discovering content you like is to browse the federated timeline, find an account/post you like, then visit their mastodon instance (click the three dot menu -> "View original page" on a post/account) and check out their local timeline to find similar accounts. You can also go to the larger mastodon instances and search hashtags for topics you're interested to find accounts to follow. Once you've found one or a few accounts, come back here and paste their account in the search bar to follow them.

Code of Conduct

Please follow the Server Rules in the section lower down on this page. If you do not, your posts will be subject to moderation. If you continually disregard the rules, your account may be suspended. I will try my best to moderate things fairly, but I am only human. Some general guidelines for posting (borrowed from mastodon.world):

  • Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning. Ideally, you would not post about inflammatory subjects at all. However, it may be acceptable to do so in some cases, but it is never acceptable to post inflammatory content without hiding the content behind an appropriate Content Warning.
  • Do not post any type of nudity without a Content Warning.
  • Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour. Criticize ideas, never people.
  • Do not report every post that upsets you. Please report posts that violate our rules but for others that you may find distasteful, or just don’t like, use the tools available to you. You can block the user or mute the conversation.

Staff

Admin: @jeff

Moderators: None. While I'm not currently looking to add moderators, if you are interested in joining the moderation team, feel free to reach out and I'll keep you in mind for when I need some extra moderation help.

Status

Status page is here.
Short: An unofficial Mastodon instance for people interested in Flesh and Blood TCG.

A Mastodon server about technology and infrastructure in Europe. Software development, infrastructure (Internet, Energy, transport), engineering

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

This server is manage by BERMINGHAM CAPITAL SAS - RCS 884 861 600 - 26 rue d'Edimbourg 75008 PARIS France

Description: PixelFed ist eine Open-Source-Plattform für soziale Netzwerke, die es Nutzern ermöglicht, Fotos und Videos mit ihren Followern zu teilen. Sie ähnelt anderen Social-Networking-Plattformen wie Instagram und Twitter, ist aber dezentralisiert und läuft auf dem ActivityPub-Federated-Protokoll, was bedeutet, dass sie selbst gehostet werden kann und die NutzerInnen Nutzern auf anderen Instanzen der Plattform folgen und mit ihnen interagieren können.

Description:
Welcome to our Mastodon server! If you're an FPV drone enthusiast, you're in the right place. We are a community of people who are passionate about all things quadcopters and the lifestyle that comes with it. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, you'll find others here who share your interests and can offer valuable advice.

On our server, you can connect with others who are into building and flying FPV drones. Share your builds, ask for tips and tricks, and show off your latest creations. You can also participate in discussions about the latest gear, techniques, and events in the FPV community.

In addition to connecting with other FPV enthusiasts, our server is also a great place to learn more about the hobby. With a wide range of users who have varying levels of experience, you can find the guidance and support you need to get started or take your skills to the next level.

So come join us and be a part of the FPV community! We can't wait to meet you and see you in the skies.
Short: Welcome to FPV.Social! Join us to share builds, ask for advice, and connect with others passionate about all things FPV. Seasoned pros and beginners welcome. See you in the skies!

Description:
What is the Woke Institute?

There are diverse opinions on this matter:

  1. We are a think-tank for progressive, post-capitalist ideas. We focus on the intersection of the spiritual, the political, and the social.

  2. We are a disorganization (distributed network) of artists, occultists, scientists, philosophers, crackpots and weirdos of the highest order.

  3. We are a platform for the exploration of radical, revolutionary, and progressive ideas.

  4. We "getting way too high on these THC gummies".

  5. We are a collective of folks that believe in autonomy, creativity and freedom of expression. Just don't be a dick about it.

  6. We are a secret cabal of witches, Marxists, and deviants dedicated to training the next generation of hot Satanic genderqueer assassins. (Who want to keep their conversations in plain view for some reason).

  7. We are a forum for discussion, debate, weird memes, weirder art, and activism.

  8. We are a source of information and inspiration for individuals looking to better understand the world around them.

  9. We are a platform formed to create a society of chronic role-players, neurodivergent savant, and autodidactic drug fiends.

  10. We are the creators of a line of purely theoretical ergonomic chairs.

With so many opinions, you might even ask what isn't the Woke Institute? And that would be a good question.

Whatever we are, we want to create an environment of acceptance as well as irreverence, and to promote meaningful dialogue between our members.

We encourage people to learn through collaboration and experimentation. However, please don't do anything on our servers that is against the laws of nature.
Short: Wake from the deep slumber of history.

Description:
Welcome to is-a.horse!

A fresh, new instance for horses on the internet! Are you a horse on the internet, or want to be a horse on the internet? Come on in!

Why join us?

The future of this server, such as it is, is likely to be shaped more than its users than by me, assuming we get any at all, that is. There's a few reasons you might want to join in though, in no particular order: - The domain name will let everyone know that you're a horse! - I will not let this server go unmoderated, rule one is clear and easy to understand. - I know the blocklist is short, we haven't had many problems yet, fortunately. - This instance is set up to be easy to scale, once we get that far. - I'm not planning to let this setup buckle under load - Nightly backups, as well as backups before any upgrade or major change. - I'm not letting this instance disappear without a trace, either - I'm also considering more frequent backups, depending on how rebuilding the media cache works.

Why not to join us?

Frankly, this instance is teeny tiny, and currently run and moderated by one person. There are a lot of other instances that fit that description, and I know we haven't been around long enough to really prove that we're going to stick. I'm also inexperienced with the fediverse as a whole, though that will hopefully change over time. There are other pony focused instances to try (Thanks for including me, LittleshyFiM!) if you don't feel comfortable taking a chance on this instance!

Infrequently Asked Questions

Why is approval needed for signups?

I just want to know who's joining in! I can remove the restriction if there is demand, but I don't think we're big enough for it to be an issue yet. Alternatively, you can also invite your friends directly with invite links.

Who even are you?

I'm just some Canadian horse on the internet that likes hosting servers as a hobby, and that also does it for work. I'm just happy to see something I'm hosting being used!

Is this an instance for bronies or furries?

It's an instance for whoever wants to join it, regardless of which label you prefer, or both, or neither! Anyone who wants to be a horse on the internet is welcome here.
Short: On the internet, nobody knows you're a horse. Unless you tell them, I guess.

Description:
This instance is physically located in Germany. To prevent bots, all new signups must be manually approved. This does not apply if you are invited by an existing user.

If you're an instance admin reading this, please reach out to me (admin@pixeloasis.eu)[mailto:admin@pixeloasis.eu] || @admin@mastodon.pixeloasis.eu || @admin:matrix.pixeloasis.eu before blocking this instance. We can probably come to an agreement.

Be warned! this Server may be unstable at times. Statistics about our uptime are available here.

Our Mozilla-Observatory scan can be found here and our Google CSP evaluator scan can be found here

This instance has no specific theme and will not block any other instance unless they spam or use bots. All blocked instances are listed publicly. Note: Users can still choose to block an instance on their own account.

This instance uses S3 storage to host content(media attachments). User content is not stored locally. As an end-user, you should not notice this.

If you want to join please write how you found this instance and why you want to join.
Short:
mastodon server (new signups require manual approval)
Languages are: En/De
View our uptime at https://status.pixeloasis.eu/status/mastodon

Description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

Fouroclockfarms.club is a small instance run by a couple queer farmers.

TL;DR

  • Be cool to each other.
  • No Nazis. No TERFs. No Harassment.
  • This server is an 18+ server. Nudity, sexuality, and strong language are recognized as a normal part of the human experience. Please use appropriate content warnings.
  • FourOclockFarms.club is privacy focused and does not allow full text search, public viewing of timelines, or indexing.

Code of Conduct:

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of fouroclockfarms.club:

Please use content warnings liberally for: Nudity/Sexual Content, Drugs/Alcohol, Mental Health, Violence, Injuries/Wounds/Hospitalization/etc, Food/Dieting, Politics/World Events/etc

The following types of content (text, media), behaviors, or rationalizations of, will be removed from the public timeline, and users posting or promoting the following types of content will have their access revoked:

  • Sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions
  • Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Nazism, Alt-Right, Right Wing Extremism, Christian Nationalism, Zionism, Tankies, Free Speech Extremists,
  • Racism, Xenophobia, Antisemitism, Islamophobia, Bigotry, Transphobia, Gender-critical
  • Sexism, Misogyny, Sex and/or Gender Discrimination
  • Image bots posting non-original or stolen content
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content
  • Mass following and aggregation of content
  • Trolling, insulting, and derogatory comments, bullying, harassment, dog piling, stalking, impeding or interfering with service,
  • Spreading falsehoods, alternative facts, anecdotal evidence, prejudice or bias towards a social group, inciting violence, circular reporting, shock-provoking content, conspiracy theories, dark patterns, deepfakes, disinformation, misinformation, sensationalism, truthiness, propaganda, rumours, hoaxes, urban myths, pseudoscience, post-truth and opinion pieces or interviews that convey any of the previous.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason.

Admin
Short: A small, highly moderated, private server run by some wheat growing queers on the plains.

Description:
Some background on MudHut.social

I found myself (I am sure I am not alone) saying "What the heck is going on with Twitter? Is now the time to jump to something better?" And here we are...

This server is a place for me (as well as Family/Friends) to have some sort of social media presence, while still allowing me to control what is show and where it is stored.

I don't really care what happens here as far as the type of content (use common sense here, nothing extreme), all types of folks are welcome! If you have a passion for something (legal), please share it! That is why this platform is so successful.

I reserve the right to remove any content I find: offensive, inappropriate, or of questionable legality. Violators will be banned from the platform. Lets keep this server clean please, and thank you.

Please be Kind :)

Remember that I am providing this for free, so please forgive little blips here and there. I also use this instance and would like to keep it up just as much as you, but I am a single dude just doing this for the community. If you have any issues, feel free to DM me @muddy@mudhut.social

Facts for Nerds like me :)

This server is hosted in my Home Lab (with Cloudflare for Caching, Firewall, ect). It is backed by a 5 node K3s cluster, on 3 Physical Proxmox Nodes. Minio is used for Block Storage. Storage is backed up every 24 hours to a NAS. My Bandwidth here is roughly 400/400Mb/s, but traffic from the Nodes goes through a VPN for privacy reasons, which makes it a bit closer to 100/100Mb/s.

I have the ability to have a virtual node failure, multiple node failures, multiple physical failures before there is an outage, but keep in mind that this is hosted on residential internet and there is a potential for an outage there. Other than that, I have designed this such that it can survive upgrades to hardware in the future without having an outage.

Additional Services

Open to anyone, please be kind about it though and message me if you need something

Elk is also running on this domain, feel free to use it. I build from GitHub every 24 hours. Elk is an alternative frontend that looks a lot like Twitter

Elk Instance

GitHub
Short: Open community, anyone is welcome. There is also an Elk instance https://elk.mudhut.social. Run by @muddy@mudhut.social

The world should reject the notion that debate and seeking common ground are weaknesses or treasonous. They are at the core of democracy and our existence.

Description:
gratefuldread.masto.host is a mastodon instance serving news, culture, and kindness to peace and love people.

Launched by Grateful Dread Peace Media in the public interest. This instance is intended to be as safe a space as possible for peace-loving, Green-focused, woke AF, kindness-elevating leftist and left-curious humans who are done tolerating the supremacist status quo, prepared to learn a better way, and ready to take positive action for a green new world. As part of GDPM's evolving Verdant Square independent media project, this instance is the Mastodon plank. Here, we bring you curated and aggregated leftist news and commentary; interesting tidbits on activism, lifestyle, arts, and culture; warm and kind conversation. Looking for a fedi instance you can call home? Let's talk: gratefuldread@verdantsquare.net.

WE STAND AGAINST DISINFORMATION AND FOR FACTS. WE SUPPORT PUBLIC HEALTH. WE WEAR MASKS. WE STAND AGAINST WAR AND WHITE SUPREMACY. WE STAND FOR #REVOLUTIONARYLOVE AND WE THE PEOPLE. WE BELIEVE IN THE POWER OF COMMUNITY, ART. AND MUSIC TO HEAL SOULS. AND EDUCATION AND COMPASSION ARE THE KEYS TO A BETTER WORLD AND SOCIETY.

Editorial questions? Contact Editor in Chief Natalie Davis at editor@verdantsquare.net.

Want to support our work? https://cutt.ly/pr6A2Rw

NOTE: Posts and boosts from the gratefuldread.masto.host feed or those of instance users do not necessarily reflect or represent the views of Grateful Dread Peace Media, its affiliates, or its staff. Vet everything you read. You own your own words.

Reporting and moderation

You can report directly from an individual posting, image, or profile for certain violations, including: spam, abusive or harmful content, inappropriate ads, self-harm, and impersonation. You'll also find you have the capability to mute and/or block any user or fediverse domain.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a moderation or other action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses. Zero tolerance policy for hate speech, MAGA promotion, etc.

Be sure to check the Terms of Service and privacy policy.
Short: Operated by Grateful Dread Peace Media for people who love peace and love.

Description:
Impressum:

Impressum

KAELIN MarketingServices®

Huebwiesenstrasse 22

CH-8954 Geroldswil

E-Mail: info@chkms.ch

Telefon: +41(0)43 536 20 91 KEIN SUPPORT!

Verhaltensregeln

Wir haben für die Nutzung gewisse Serverregeln erstellt, die Ihr etwas weiter unten auf dieser Seite findet und die Ihr mit der Erstellung eines Kontos bei amateurfunk.social akzeptiert. Bitte beachtet, andere Instanzen haben andere Regeln. Was hier erlaubt ist, kann dort verboten sein und umgekehrt. Wenn Ihr Verstöße erkennt, könnt Ihr diese über das Meldesystem melden. Bitte seid dort so genau wie möglich und gebt uns ggf. Zusatzinformationen, damit wir den Vorfall besser (und schneller) einordnen können. Damit helft Ihr uns. Bei Verstößen gegen die Serverregeln kann es zu einer Löschung der Beiträge und auch zur Löschung des verursachenden Kontos kommen. Bitte beachtet, dass es keine Rückmeldung gibt, was mit Eurer Meldung geschieht.

Relaying

Es besteht ein aktives Relay mit der Instanz fediverse.radio

Was bedeutet Relaying?

Alle Nachrichten (Toots), die öffentlich markiert sind und auf der lokalen Zeitleiste erscheinen, werden zusätzlich auf den o.g. Relay übergeben und somit zusätzlich in den lokalen Zeitleiste auf den teilnehmenden anderen Instanzen eingeblendet. Dies fördert kleinere Instanzen um mehr Inhalte in der lokalen Zeitleiste angezeigt zu bekommen. Ihr müsst hierzu selbst nichts machen, dies geschieht automatisch.

Server

Der Standort aller benötigten Server für amateurfunk.social ist in Deutschland.

Serverstatus

Über HetrixTools könnt Ihr einsehen, ob die Server derzeit erreichbar sind.

Spenden

amateurfunk.social wird privat betrieben und es gibt weder Werbung noch Tracking, noch findet ein Verkauf Eurer Daten statt. Deswegen würde ich mich freuen, wenn Ihr Euch in Form einer Spende beteiligen könnt. Auch kleine Beträge helfen. Unter Patreon erfahrt Ihr, wie Ihr spenden könnt.
Short: Hallo auf amateurfunk.social Dies ist eine deutschsprachige Mastodon-Instanz für Funk- und Technikbegeisterte zum tröten, neue Leute kennenlernen, sich auszutauschen und Spass zu haben.

Description:
Dies ist eine Mastodon-Instanz in erster Linie von und für Journalisten. Sie ist Teil der Community-Plattform medienweb.de.

Im medienweb treffen sich derzeit überwiegend freie Journalistinnen und Journalisten, die für den öffentlich-rechtlichen Rundfunk tätig sind. Aber auch aus anderen Bereichen sind Kolleginnen und Kollegen herzlich willkommen. Das medienweb ist ein offenes Gemeinschaftsprojekt, das zum Austausch und zur Vernetzung gegründet wurde - jenseits von Facebook & Co. Jede und jeder kann sich dort einbringen und die Plattform so auch mitgestalten.

Um Spammer und Fake-Accounts hier möglichst fernzuhalten, bieten wir diese Mastodon-Instanz aktuell nur medienweb-Benutzerinnen und -Benutzern an. Bitte gib hier bei der Konto-Erstellung im Feld "Warum möchtest du beitreten?" einfach Deinen medienweb-Benutzernamen an - und schon bist Du drin :-)

Du hast noch keinen medienweb-Account? Eine Registrierung ist schnell und einfach hier möglich: https://medienweb.de/benutzer-registrierung/

This is snailhuddle’s BookWyrm site.

Its logo depicts printed matter which has been subjected to a voracious readership of actual snails.

The title We Loved Your Book So Much We Ate It refers to an anecdote of Maurice Sendak’s, from an interview with Terry Gross — ‘Sendak on Childhood.’, Fresh Air, 15 April 1986. The story comes towards the end of the recording, between 26:50–27:48.

To those of you signing up ⸺

Please set your password with great care, and keep a dependable record of it. The system cannot actually send you assistance in the event of a forgotten password (even if it claims that it does). However, if you get in touch and ask for help, admins can (slowly).

Invite codes to WLYBSMWAI are typically issued with one month’s validity, for registering a single account. If your registration link has expired or otherwise does not seem to work, please request another.
Short: A snailhuddle freestyle bookclub.

Description:
What are our goals? In the broadest sense Apricot Systematic is devoted towards communication, human communication. We believe that machines are simply a form of mirror or lens that people can use between themselves and on themselves. Every program, every machine, no matter how abstract, arcane, or seemingly removed from the common nature of human existence was created to serve as a conduit for human interaction. Even if it is an old archaic COBOL program written to count the number of checks written on a bank in a month it shares this purpose.

We want to help bring together book lovers, food enthusiasts, world event followers, Japan aficionados, and individuals of diverse orientations, cultures, and backgrounds. The platform offers a space for members to share their passions, connect with like-minded individuals, and engage in meaningful conversations in a supportive and inclusive environment.

Code of Conduct:

Our community is dedicated to providing a respectful, inclusive, and harassment-free environment for all participants, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

We do not tolerate hate speech, discrimination, or harassment of any kind. This includes, but is not limited to, behavior that targets or disparages any individual or group based on their identity or characteristics, as well as any behaviors that create an unsafe or hostile environment.

If you witness or experience any form of hate speech, discrimination, or harassment, please report it immediately to @admin@apricot.social. All reports will be treated with confidentiality and respect, and will be promptly addressed.

We expect all members of our community to follow this code of conduct at all times, both online and in person. By participating in our community, you are agreeing to abide by these standards.

We appreciate your commitment to creating a welcoming and inclusive environment for all.
Short: This instance is for book lovers, food enthusiasts, world event followers, Japan aficionados, and individuals of diverse orientations (LGBTQ+, ND, etc), cultures, and backgrounds.

Description:
Welcome to Mast-Brigade, an instance for PhiliFur, Furry Brigade, and the general Philippine furry stuff!

Y tho?

We aim for PhiliFur to be fueled by the inputs of the community and as such we are opening this instance for everyone to share their ideas (or any general furry stuff too!).

What could I post here?

Primarily the instance focuses on PhiliFur, so any ideas on how to improve the convention are welcome (as long as they're respectful and constructive). We also might post stuff the team is currently working on, so that's that.

Administration

The instance is being maintained by Jethro (@jetburr | fa/jetbear | jethro.parker@furrybrigade.net). Any issues and request can be sent my way.
Short: Furry Brigade and PhiliFUR instance of Mastodon

Description:
Welcome to mastd.dev, a community for developers!

At mastd.dev, we understand the importance of having a space where developers can connect and collaborate. That's why we've created a Mastodon server specifically for developers, where you can engage in discussions, share your projects, and connect with like-minded individuals.

Our server is based in the US, ensuring fast and reliable connections for our members. We believe in creating a supportive and inclusive environment where everyone can freely share their thoughts and ideas. Whether you're just starting or are an experienced developer, mastd.dev is the perfect place to network and connect with others.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at hello@mastd.dev. Our team is always here to help and support you. So, why wait? Join us today and become a part of our thriving community of developers!
Short: mastd.dev is for developers and friends of developers.

Description:
A random corner of the social network.

O0O Social (hereinafter called the instance) is a multilingual Mastodon instance. This is a project belonging to WE. Studio, previously being Pigeons On Trees (https://tree.pigeons.cloud, link expired at January 29th, 2023, hereinafter called the old instance) which is a part of the service Pigeons' Cloud (link expired at January 29th, 2023)

Registration

The instance is open for registration with sufficient reasons. You should include the following information in your registration request:

  1. really short introduction of yourself (e.g. like whether you are a person or an organization, your location, etc.)
  2. What you are going to do on the instance (e.g. what are you going to post about, etc.)

Why is my email disallowed?

Most of the email providers from Mainland China are blocked by the instance. This is not only to protect the instance itself, but also the protect the user that is registering. Due to the Data Security Law of the People's Republic of China, data of the user will have potential of being requested by the Chinese government. This allows the instance to protect the privacy of the user.

Why is my registration request rejected?

it is possible that your registration request is rejected due to the following reasons:

  1. Your email address is from Mainland China;
  2. Your registration request is not detailed enough;
  3. Your registration request is not in English or Chinese.

Announcements

For global announcements for the instance (like Server Maintenance), they will be both published on the @admin account with tag #o0oSocial and #ServerAnnouncements and the announcement section (See picture here); For announcements that applies to the instance only (like Emoji Update), they will be only published on the announcement section.

Inactive accounts

Inactive account will be taken certain actions:

  • For accounts that are inactive for 1 month, your account will be frozen ( Prevent any interaction from or to this account but not delete or hide its contents );
  • For account that is inactive for 3 months, the account will be suspended( Prevent any interaction from or to this account and delete its contents );
  • After 30 days of suspension without appeal, your account will be completely deleted.

For appeal, please send to o0o@wedotstud.io.

Why the Migration?

The instance is an new setup for the old instance.

The migration is caused by two major reasons:

  1. Previously, the old instance is installed using Yunohost. Although Yunohost is really easy to help deploy complicated services like Mastodon, its customized installation of Mastodon caused some problem for me, such as editing configuration and set up account migration.

  2. Hong Kong's Largest ISP, PCCW, blocked the IP that *.pigeons.cloud is used. This caused the entire service being not accessible under the network that uses PCCW's service, which covers a large part of Hong Kong. I had to do visit the server with VPN at all times, which is not the optimal solution.

社交網路中一個隨意的角落。

本內容如與英文版有衝突，請以英文版為準。

柯嶺澳社交（下稱“本伺服器“）為一個多語言 Mastodon 伺服器。此伺服器為 WE. Studio 的其中一個項目，前身為屬於項目鴿雲（Pigeons' Cloud）（鏈接於 2023年1月23日過期）的其中一項服務樹中鴿（https://tree.pigeons.cloud，鏈接於 2023年1月23日過期，下稱 舊伺服器）。

註冊

本伺服器開放註冊，但需要提供充分的理由。您應該在註冊請求中包含以下信息：

  1. 您自己的簡短介紹（如您是個人還是組織，您的位置等等）
  2. 您將在本伺服器上做什麼（如您將發佈什麼內容等等）

為何我的電子郵箱被拒絕？

大部分來自中國大陸的郵箱服務商都被本伺服器封鎖。這不僅是為了保護本伺服器本身，也是為了保護註冊用戶的隱私。由於中國大陸《數據安全法》，用戶的數據可能會被中國政府請求。此措施允許本伺服器保護用戶的隱私。

為何我的註冊請求被拒絕？

您的註冊請求可能因為以下原因被拒絕：

  1. 您的電子郵箱來自中國大陸；
  2. 您的註冊請求不夠詳細；
  3. 您的註冊請求不是英文或中文。

公告

對於本伺服器的公開公告（如伺服器維護），內容會發於公告欄 （如圖 ） 以及 @patrick 下以 #o0oSocial 及 #伺服器公告 進行標注；對限於本伺服器的公告（如表情更新），內容只會發於公告欄 。

不活躍的帳號

本伺服器會對不活躍的帳號進行處理：

  • 如帳號超過 1 個月未有登入，你的帳號將會被停用；
  • 如帳號超過 3 個月未有登入，你的帳號將會被停權。
  • 停權後30天內如果未申請恢復帳號，你的帳號將會被徹底刪除。

如需申請恢復帳號，請要發送電郵至 o0o@wedotstud.io。

為何遷移？

本伺服器從舊伺服器遷移而來。

本次遷移有以下兩個原因導致：

  1. 就伺服器通過使用 Yunohost 完成安裝。縱然 Yunohost 在部署如 Mastodon 此類部署複雜的服務時很方便，但 Yunohost 定製版的 Mastodon 總是有很多問題，譬如編輯設定和配置賬號轉移；
  3. 香港本土的 ISP 「PCCW」 封鎖了本站的 IP， 導致全站（*.pigeons.cloud）服務都受到影響。由於此舉導致本人訪問舊伺服器也需要使用 VPN 服務，極大的影響了我對伺服器的維護。
Short: A most random corner of the social network | 社交網路最隨意的角落

Description:
The Vortex Night Club

One of the longest running clubs in Second Life, The Vortex Night Club first opened on 3rd March 2006. It has a crew of dedicated and seasoned DJs, playing a good cross-section of music covering many genres.

The Vortex is a friendly welcoming venue, open to all Second Life residents, regardless of the type of avatar they choose to don. There is a strong community spirit amongst the members who are always keen to welcome new visitors.

Drama is very rare and not tolerated. It is the first rule of The Vortex. In fact, there are only 2 rules: No drama and have fun! Everything else is covered by adherance to the Second Life ToS and Community Standards,

The Vortex design has changed five times in it’s long history. Three versions were designed by Loki Eliot, including the current version, commonly referred to as V6.
Short:
This server is for friends and members of The Vortex Night Club, one of the oldest clubs in Second Life.

The Vortex Official Website:  https://vortexclub.co.uk/

Description:
dimension.host

규칙

타인을 괴롭히거나 사칭할 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 특정 혹은 다수의 사용자를 대상으로 공격적인 행동을 반복할 경우 침묵 또는 정지 처리가 될 수 있습니다.

장애, 인종, 성별, 성 지향성, 정체성, 나이 등에 대한 혐오발언을 금지합니다.

전체 공개로 민감한 내용을 올릴 때는 CW(내용 경고)기능을 사용하여 접어 주세요. 신체 노출도가 높거나 폭력적인 내용, 심한 욕설, 과하게 반짝이는 이미지, 최신 스포일러 등이 이에 해당합니다.

타인의 저작물을 올릴 경우 원 출처를 꼭 밝혀 주세요. 재업로드가 금지된 저작물을 가져오지 마세요.

Ai를 사용해서 만들어진 내용은 Ai를 사용했음을 본문에 밝혀 주세요. 타인의 저작물을 무단으로 사용한 소스로 만들어진 Ai 결과물을 업로드하거나 프로필로 사용하지 마세요

학대나 범죄를 유도·옹호하는 글, 자살 및 자해 조장, 그 외 대한민국 국법에 어긋나는 내용을 올리지 마세요.

자동화된 수단(bot)으로 작성된 글, 트위터 등 타 플랫폼과 크로스 포스팅으로 작성된 글이 일일 3개 까지만 전체 공개로 작성할 수 있습니다. 초과시 공개 범위를 비표시 또는 비공개로 해 주세요.

광고 또는 스팸 목적의 계정 생성, 팔로잉, 멘션을 금지합니다.

고의적으로 허위사실을 퍼트리지 마세요.

다른 사용자에게 암묵적인 룰을 강요하지 마세요.

규칙을 위반할 경우 3번 경고 후 정지됩니다. 예외적으로 다음 사항에 대해서는 즉각적으로 정지됩니다: 관리자, 중재자에게 신체적 정신적 피해가 초래될 수 있는 경우 브라우저나 사이트의 약점을 이용한 공격, 악용

이상의 규칙은 dimension.host 내부에 적용됩니다. 다른 서버의 사용자를 신고할 때는 이 점을 유념해 주세요. dimension.host 의 관리자는 타 인스턴스의 사용자를 직접적으로 제재할 수 없으며, 대신 해당 사용자를 볼 수 없도록 침묵·차단하거나 문제되는 내용이 자주 올라오는 인스턴스를 침묵·차단할 수 있습니다.
Short: 서로의 차원을 서로에게 소개해 주세요. 당신이 주최자랍니다.

Description:
What?

I kinda started this as a joke, it still is, but I want to see how far this goes.

For now, it's invite only, for friends I know personally and feel comfortable sharing the instance with.

Operation & Funding

Everything (domain, servers, email, etc.) is operated and owned by me. Thus I'm the only one paying for them.

How to Join?

Want to join? Shoot me an email, and I'll send you an invite, if you're cool enough ;)
Short: Welcome to the Fediverse! Are you a Poyu's Buddy?

Description:
Bienvenue sur notre instance Mastodon NSGN

Notre instance Mastodon NSGN est un espace en ligne personnel et fermé pour une communauté sélectionnée d'utilisateurs. Nous avons mis en place des règles strictes pour maintenir un environnement sain et sûr pour tous les utilisateurs. Les comptes sont vérifiés avant d'être acceptés, ce qui garantit que seuls les membres de notre communauté y ont accès.

Vous pourrez discuter, partager des contenus, des idées et des opinions en toute sécurité. En utilisant notre instance privée, vous aurez la garantie que vos informations personnelles et vos conversations resteront privées et protégées. Nous nous engageons à maintenir un espace en ligne respectueux, amical et inclusif pour tous les utilisateurs.
Short: Notre instance Mastodon privée est un espace en ligne personnel et fermé pour une communauté sélectionnée d'utilisateurs.

Description:
Welcome to connected.so

We're building a community to connect remote workers. Complimenting (but not run by) the work undertaken at Big Orange Heart - a registered charity with a mission to support and promote positive wellbeing and mental health within remote working communities.

Code of Conduct

The code of conduct at Connected can be summarised as "don't be a jerk". However, if you need more detail as to what we consider unacceptable behaviour, please take a look at our code of conduct.

If you find any vulnerabilities, please report them to the admin @danmaby@connected.so. For moderation requests, please get in touch with our moderator @danmaby@connected.so. For requests to become a moderator, please contact @danmaby@connected.so.

Hosting

Connected.so is hosted in London/EU - Local Laws apply!

Servers are hosted at DigitalOcean, and hosting costs, including backup storage, are around $40/month.

Media files are also hosted on DigitalOcean.

Status and issues

Check our instances status, or report issues at status.connected.so.

Supporting

The Connected community is currently funded by @danmaby@connected.so and will remain so for the foreseeable future. If you would like to support the wider remote working community, donations to Big Orange Heart would be greatly appreciated.
Short: We're building a community to connect remote workers. Complimenting (but not run by) the work undertaken at Big Orange Heart (https://bigorangeheart.org) a registered charity supporting mental health.

Moderation is based on a "would you say that out loud into a microphone at your favorite venue" approach. This will evolve as time goes on. Remember to use Content Warnings for sensitive or controversial topics, and show the acceptance and respect you would hope for in return.

19Marbles is paid for out of pocket by the owners. We are not looking for external funding at this time.

Enjoy!

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries about the Old Catholic Churches International, please contact bishopgodsey@myocci.org.

Funding This server is owned and run by the Old Catholic Churches International.

Reporting and moderation When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behavior, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

We have a team of volunteer moderators. If you would like to become a moderator, get in touch with us through the e-mail address above.

Description:
Welcome to Page.LGBT!

Page.LGBT is an inclusive Mastodon instance, primarily (but not exclusively) for members of the LGBTQ+ community. Our doors are open to anyone who would like to join - so if you're looking for a small, friendly community, we'd love to welcome you!

Inclusivity and Moderation

We are open and welcoming to anybody who wishes to join, but ask that you return the favour by being friendly and polite to everybody else whilst you are here. We do not tolerate any form of discrimination, intolerance or harassment, neither towards users of Page.LGBT, nor towards anybody outside of Page.LGBT.

If you see anything on Page.LGBT which you believe may break our rules, please let us know by using Mastodon's reporting functionality. We aim to review all reports within 24 hours of receiving them.

All of our rules apply both to users registered on Page.LGBT, and to external users elsewhere in the Fediverse. If an external user is found to be breaking our rules, we may restrict or block their content from appearing to our users. Similarly, if a user from Page.LGBT is found to be breaking our rules whilst interacting with an external user, we will enforce the rules equally to how we would between two local users. The Fediverse is still largely a very friendly place - so be nice to our neighbours!

Registration

Registration is open to everyone, but new accounts may sometimes require approval from our staff team before they can start using our website. This is to help prevent abusive registrations from accounts intending to harrass our users.

Approval is not always required - we regularly review whether manual approval is necessary based on the current level of rule-breaking content from new accounts.

To increase the likelihood of your account being approved, you may want to include links to other social networking profiles in the "Why do you want to join?" section. This is completely optional, and your application will never be rejected solely for not including any links - but being able to show that your other profiles have a clean history allows us to review and approve your application sooner.

Moderated Servers

To help provide a safe and inclusive space for everyone, we limit and/or suspend connections from any Fediverse servers which we believe present a risk of targeting or attacking our users, or posting content which violates our rules. For some servers, this may be because their rules explicitly allow this to occur; for others, it may be because they are not sufficiently well moderated, allowing unwanted content to slip through.

The full list of moderated servers can be viewed in the "Moderated servers" section below.

If you are aware of a server which is not on the list, but you believe that it should be, please let us know by telling us both the server's URL, and the reason you believe it should be restricted.

If you believe that a server has been limited or suspended by mistake, please let us know, so that we can review whether the server is eligible to be removed from the list.

The names of some servers in the list may be partially obscured - this is done for instances hosting the worst kinds of content, to prevent our moderation list from being used as a tool to help nefarious users find unacceptable content.

If you would like a copy of our moderated instance list, in either a human-readable or machine-readable format, please feel free to get in touch and we'd be happy to help.

Acknowledgements and thanks

  • Page.LGBT's core server runs Mastodon Glitch Edition, which is licensed under the GNU AGPL 3.0. A copy of the source code for this software, along with a full copy of its license, can be obtained at https://github.com/glitch-soc/mastodon.
  • Page.LGBT uses custom pride flag emojis from the following repository, which are licensed under a Creative Commons CC-BY-4.0 license: https://github.com/b3yc0d3/twemoji-flags.
  • Page.LGBT uses custom pigeon-based pride emojis released into the public domain by FrazzledBrynn: https://frazzledbrynn.itch.io/pride-pigeons
Short: An inclusive Mastodon instance for members of the LGBTQ+ community.

Description:
Welcome to esoteric.party!

We're a small scale Mastodon server, that blooms from the interests of its community, with an emphasis on art, music, animals, and nature. Since all lives are political so are we, but we are not a political website.

While we welcome like-minded travelers who are interested in a more manageable corner of the Mastodon fediverse, membership primarily by invitation. Our website is actively moderated, with no tolerance for trollish shenanigans.

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact esoteric.support@puffermedia.com.

This server is privately funded. If you'd like to contribute please contact esoteric.support@puffermedia.com.

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behavior, if applicable.

Reports should be handled within 24 hours. Please keep in mind that you will not be notified about any decision made or action taken. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete the offending content and escalate to harsher measures on repeat offenses. Bots

Only news bot type accounts are allowed. No advertising or spamming will be tolerated.
Short: Welcome to our esoteric party! We're a small scale Mastodon server, that blooms from the interests of its community, with an emphasis on art, music, animals, and nature.

Description:
gamedev.berlin is a fresh & still tiny Mastodon instance for the game development community in Berlin and beyond.

Our server is located in Germany and powered by 100% renewable energy.

Q: Is this the instance I am looking for?

A: While you are welcomed to join regardless, here is a list that might help you decide:

  • You work/ed,study/ied or are (professionally or as a hobby) involved in game development or a games related field.
  • You are avid gamer and are interested in game development.
  • You live in Berlin and are looking for a community.

The primary languages in this instance are German and English. Other languages cannot be moderated, as this instance is operated by one person only.

This instance’ admin account is @Prodekan; let them know if you have any issues or suggestions, or see inappropriate activity. Follow @prodekan@gamedev.berlin for announcements/updates and important information regarding this server.

gamedev.berlin is running on a small slice of a bigger Server called a VPS. This means it shares resources with other VPS, but it also means it can be scaled up as needed. Scaling up requires money. If you'd like to help support the growth of this instance, any small contribution via Ko-fi.com would be appreciated.
Short: A fresh & still tiny Mastodon instance for the game development community in Berlin and elsewhere.

Description:
君たちは三里塚の真実を知っているか？

「真・三里塚闘争研究会」は三里塚闘争における数々の国家権力による違法行為を新たな見地から糾弾することを目的として2004年に設立された。本サーバーは三里塚解放区における当研究会会員間、特に国家権力に対する戦いの姿勢を崩さぬことを誓った者のために用意されたサーバーである。

我々は自由を重んじる。自由主義を治安維持の名の下に蹂躙する国家権力は、これゆえに断罪されねばならない。今こそ同志諸君と共に立ち上がろうではないか！
Short: 三里塚解放区専用サーバー

Description:
(formerly nopasaran.red)

a server for people on the far left who just wanna relax and have a nice time together while doing their thing.

you know the crash at crush? when that dude (his last name was crush, i remember this much) crashed two steam locomotives into each other at a town built special for the occasion? a town named crush? probably named after him, tbh. kinda feels like that when you look around you sometimes, though, doesn't it? and sometimes you just wanna hang out with people in that crowd of 19th century rubberneckers who KNOW this is going to end in probably tragic ways, with train parts taking out limbs.

call it a cassandra syndrome support group. this is all horrifically pretentious. i don't care.

for help signing up, check out this page or join the matrix chat here
Short:
formerly nopasaran.red until a massive db crash made it die :(
a server for people on the far left who just wanna be cool and have a nice time.

Description:
Actors’ Social Network’s primary focus is on encouraging and supporting actors, worldwide. This includes stage, voice, film, and TV actors, both professional and amateur. Anyone may join.

Funding

We survive only by crowdfunding donations. Please help cover our expenses through donations at Patreon and tips at Ko-fi.

Our commitment to our operation

We intend for this server to be a safe space, and we actively moderate activity to protect against racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. We are LGBTQIA+ friendly!

We expect to primarily attract people in and around the acting industry: actors (of course), talent agents, casting directors, and producers. We also welcome and expect to attract acting-industry fans.

We intend to provide reliable service over the long term. We back up our systems, daily, to offsite storage. If for any reason we are unable to continue service, we promise to give our users at least three months advance notice before shutting our servers down.

We intend to be completely non-commercial, unsponsored, and non-profit, wholly reliant on donations for income in order to purchase Internet resources and online services and to pay people reasonable rates for their technical, artistic, and organizational talent.

We are committed to being a good member of the collection of all Fediverse servers, worldwide, which collaborate and cooperate to share operational information among themselves. We are specifically committed to adhere to the Mastodon Server Covenant.

Languages

Due to practical limitations, we restrict languages to those understood by our moderators, currently English and Spanish. When we are able, we are committed to add support for all spoken, written, and signed languages.

Site use by children

Our site, products and services are all directed at people who are at least 13 years old. If you are under the age of 13, per the requirements of U.S. COPPA Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act do not use this site.

Impressum

Daniel Norton
2124 Burton Dr Unit 121
Austin, TX 78741-4153
United States of America
Email: daniel@danielnorton.com (PGP public key)

Fediverse: @daniel@danielnorton.com

US DMCA registered agent: Daniel A. Norton

History

This Mastodon instance was created in November 2022 by Austin-based actor Daniel Norton @danielnortonactor@actors.social.
Short: Actors’ Social Network focuses on encouraging and supporting actors, worldwide. This includes stage, voice, film, and TV actors, both professional and amateur. Anyone may join this Mastodon service.

Description:
Code of Conduct

Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment include:

  • Using welcoming and inclusive language
  • Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
  • Gracefully accepting constructive criticism
  • Focusing on what is best for the community
  • Showing empathy towards other community members

Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

  • The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
  • Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
  • Public or private harassment
  • Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
  • Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

Our Responsibilities

Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

Scope

This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

Enforcement

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at eugen@zeonfederated.com. The project team will review and investigate all complaints, and will respond in a way that it deems appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the project's leadership.

Attribution

This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, available at https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4
Short: Welcome to the community. Hopeful that this project can be useful to others in time. Supported through the work of Sterling Solutions LLC.

Description:
Calamity.world is a private server for wonderful folks.

Created out of the demise of Mastodon.lol, and meant as an invite-only place for friends, family, and trusted others.

Why Calamity.world?

Let's face it, the world is kind of a mess at the best of times. But that's okay, because we can learn to live within the chaos of daily life, and find joy and fun in our own little ways. Calamity.world exists because no matter how crazy things get, we know that deep down, it's going to be fine.

Mastodon Server Covenant

This server agrees to follow the principles of the Mastodon Server Covenant. This means we adhere to the following rules and statements:

1. Active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia

This server supports the 2SLGBTQIA+ community, feminists, activists, tinkerers, philosophers, and everyone in between. Fascists, Nazis, MAGAts, TERFs, and conspiracy-theorists are not welcome, and will be defederated.

2. Daily backups

This server, its configuration, database, and all uploaded media, is backed up daily both on-premises, and to AWS Cloud Storage (S3).

3. At least one other person with emergency access to the server infrastructure

This server is owned and operated by @t3rminus. Additionally @loginerror has emergency access to moderation tools, as well as the entire hosting platform and all related network services (including backups) remotely, and, if necessary, physically.

4. Commitment to give users at least 3 months of advance warning in case of shutting down.

If it ever becomes necessary to take this server offline, calamity.world pledges to provide 3 months of warning to allow users to backup their data, and migrate it to another server, if desired.

Trending Posts, Links, and Hashtags Policy

Trending content is manually reviewed, and will be featured subject to the following conditions:

  • They don't break any of the server rules.
  • They are written in, or are about topics in English. The server moderation is multilingual, but may lack regional context to make informed decisions about topics in other languages or from other countries.
  • They are primarily safe-for-work. Unfortunately some innocuous-seeming hashtags may lead to a considerable amount of not-safe-for-work content, and we cannot guarantee all included content will be posted with appropriate content warnings. We stand by our moderators' judgment on what constitutes "primarily safe-for-work".

Law Enforcement

This server is located and operated in Canada, and is subject to relevant laws and law-enforcement actions. While we take measures to protect user data and our users' right to privacy, we will cooperate with copyright holders and law enforcement should it ever become necessary.

Land Acknowledgement

We respectfully acknowledge that this server and its staff live and operate on the traditional and unceded territories of the Halkomelem speaking peoples, including the Qayqayt Nation, as well as the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam), Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), and səlilwətaɬ (Tsleil-Waututh) Nations. We pledge to continue to recognize, support, and protect the heritage and history of these peoples that had been suppressed through the horrific acts of colonialism.

Credits

This server uses the following custom emoji:

  • Neocats by @volpeon@is-a.wyvern.rip – Partial set; Modified to correct hand colors by @t3rminus@calamity.world.
  • Mutant Standard by @dzuk@weirder.earth – Partial set; Modified to add updated polyamory and progress pride flags by @t3rminus@calamity.world.
Short: A private server for wonderful folks. We support the 2SLGBTQIA+ community, feminists, activists, tinkerers, philosophers, and everyone in between.

We center and serve the City of New York, but comrades from anywhere in the world are welcome here.

Be respectful and shitpost with love <3

Description:

Цей Mastodon сервер є частиною мережі Fediverse.

Ми намагаємося збудувати невелику україномовну спільноту. Головна наша мета — дружнє спілкування в межах та поза межами цього інстансу.

Як зареєструватися

Є два варіанти реєстрації:

  • Ви можете залишити запит на реєстрацію. Будь ласка, обов'язково заповніть поле "Чому ви хочете приєднатися?", напишіть нам декілька слів про себе, щоб ми могли познайомитися.

  • Ви можете попросити запрошення особисто в будь-якого учасника нашого серверу.

Description:
Bienvenue sur toot.beep.computer,

Nous nous efforçons d'être une petite communauté bienveillante et de bons voisin⋅es des autres instances.

Inscriptions

À l'heure actuelle, les inscriptions ne sont possibles que par invitation. Certain⋅es utilisateur⋅ices ont la possibilité de vous envoyer un lien d'invitation.

Hébergement

  • Serveur : Hetzner (Allemagne)
  • Médias : Hetzner (Allemagne)
  • DNS : Infomaniak (Suisse)
  • Emails transactionnels : Scaleway (France)
  • Emails entrants (admin@beep.computer) : Infomaniak (Suisse)

Administration et modération

L'instance est administrée techniquement par Coco et modérée par Lio. Vous pouvez contacter les admins en passant par le compte @lioverse ou par mail (en haut de la page).

Autres services

  • Sur demande, il peut également être créé un compte Matrix.
  • Il y a également une instance FreshRSS que vous pouvez trouver juste ici (les inscriptions sont ouvertes).

Ces services sont hébergés sur le même serveur que l'instance Mastodon.

Relais

beep.computer propose aussi un relais, qui permet aux plus petites instances (comme celle-ci) de recevoir plus de contenu et d'être mieux connectées avec les autres instances. Plus d'informations ici.

État des services

En cas de problème (pannes, lenteurs, etc), n'hésitez pas à nous contacter via les moyens de contact évoqués plus haut.

Financement

Le serveur (15€/mois) est actuellement financé en partie par des dons et par Coco. Il est possible de participer à son financement sur cette page.

Bisous, Coco et Lio ❤️
Short: Instance francophone généraliste toute rikiki, uniquement sur invitation.

Description:
Membership

We aim to build inclusive communities that are sustainable for the long term, both for our users and our operators, and to that end, we have chosen an invite-only subscription model with a user cap that will only be increased if we are certain that it does not threaten said sustainability. Our initial launch cap is around one hundred (100) active users, and we will not grow this instance beyond a thousand (1000) active users at the most.

We are aware that, especially among marginalised people, not everyone will be able to afford a recurring fee, and thus members can sponsor an invite for anyone who wishes to join without being burdened by the recurring cost.

If you are a BIPOC citizen of the constituent countries or special municipalities of the Kingdom of the Netherlands, its former colonies, or if your ancestors were trafficked and/or enslaved in any way by the predecessors of the Dutch state, we humbly extend an invitation to join us at no cost, as our way of paying reparations for the sins of our ancestors.

Please note that our resources are limited, however, and that we will not be able to host everyone. For further details, contact @custodian.

Federation

We are currently using the Oliphant T0 and Birdsite blocklists, and will upgrade to a higher tier if it proves to be necessary. Any changes to our federation policy, as well as any manual #FediBlock actions, will be announced via the @custodian account, which is a default follow for all members upon joining.

Bill Of Materials (BOM)

Stock Mastodon, but with 640 characters per post instead of 500. Blocks all robots, and opts every user out of indexing by default. No search yet, but will implement the default search as soon as we can.

This instance currently runs on a single VM, but can be scaled up or out as needed. Our upstream is TransIP, which is part of team.blue, and our CDN, used for static files only, is currently hosted on Cloudflare's free tier. We are aware of Cloudflare's reputation, and will move to a different configuration that no longer uses their network once a sustainable alternative can be provided.

This bill of materials is provided for the sake of transparency, and does not imply any form of endorsement. We do not accept corporate sponsorship, and if that ever changes, we will seek input from members first.

Legal

This instance is operated by a legal entity located in the Netherlands, and Dutch and/or European law applies. If you intend to get into good trouble, keep this in mind. Up till now, in more than twenty years of existence, we have never had to, but there are firm limits to how much we can resist legitimate requests from law enforcement.

For all written correspondence, contact us via email at legal@ngmx.com, or, if you absolutely must send hard copy, via snail mail;

UR Communications BV
Olympia 2D
1213 NT Hilversum
The Netherlands

--

Please note that this is a living document, and as such will be adjusted over time. If you feel something is missing, let us know, or use the wildcard rule to report it.

Description:
Below, please find our Code of Conduct. Also on this page is information about the TMI Community.

Generally, our focus is #education, #teaching, #assessment and all manner of #learning and fostering collaboration aligned to #AcademicMastodon.

About TMI Community

The TMI Community is a dynamic social, professional network comprising educational organizations, schools, districts, and dedicated educational professionals united in the common goal of advancing professional learning and development.

The TMI Community aims to serve as the ultimate social platform for educators to safely engage, innovate, comfortably exchange individual thoughts, opinions, ideas, knowledge, and cutting-edge practices, collaboratively tackle the challenges of their profession, and bolster their collective expertise and competencies. It's a hub for individual and organizational growth, enabling educators to enhance their perspective and professional skills and stay informed about the latest trends and advancements in education.

The TMI Community experience fosters a collegial culture, promoting empathetic and thought-provoking collegial discourse, objective examination of practice, lively exchange of innovative ideas and strategies, and enthusiastic engagement in collaborative projects. Our platform empowers members to work together on pedagogical research initiatives, curriculum development, and educational programs, all aimed at optimizing student outcomes.

The TMI Community serves as a conduit to tap into a rich network of seasoned educators and subject matter experts. Members of our Community willingly offer each other mentorship and guidance to better navigate their professional journeys with greater confidence and further broaden their horizons in the education landscape. It's a platform for advocating for effective professional learning practices and raising a collective voice for positive change in the education sector.

On this Mastodon instance and beyond, the TMI Community cultivates a culture of continuous learning and professional growth, ensuring educators are up-to-date with the latest research and best practices. It fosters collaboration and networking opportunities among education professionals, amplifying the impact of education on learners and society as a whole.

Code of Conduct

Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

  • Using welcoming and inclusive language

Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

  • The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
  • Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
  • Public or private harassment
  • Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
  • Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

Our Responsibilities

Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

Scope

This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

Enforcement

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at tmicommunity@sterlingsolved.com. The project team will review and investigate all complaints, and will respond in a way that it deems appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the project's leadership.

Attribution

Description:
mastodon.miri.site 是 Mastodon 的一个中文实例。Mastodon 是一个开源的去中心化社交网络，整个 Mastodon 社区是由无数实例组成的。注册本实例后你不仅可以与本实例内的用户互动，并且可以与来自世界各地的其他实例中的用户无缝连接。

Mastodon 的去中心化设计防止了社交数据被少数公司或团体垄断的风险，也大大增加了屏蔽及过滤的难度。如果你有兴趣动手搭建一个实例，请参考官方文档。你可以随时导出备份自己的数据并申请转移到其他实例中而无需担心因为实例运营者的问题导致的数据丢失。

本实例不以任何形式做出 SLA（Service Level Agreement，服务等级协议）承诺。

你可以在爱发电支援我们运营本实例。
Social media owned by COMPANION CUBES
Short: COMPANION CUBES

Description: Welcome to Sim City’s Community Mastodon! We are a decentralized social network built on the Mastodon platform, where members of our community can connect and share content with each other. Our goal is to provide a positive and inclusive space for residents of all neighborhoods to engage with one another and stay informed about local events and happenings. Whether you're looking to meet new people, share your latest creative endeavors, or stay up-to-date on city news, you'll find it all here. So come join us and be a part of the conversation!
Short: Maladai is a decentralized social network built on the Mastodon platform, where members of all neighborhoods in Sim City can connect and share content with each other.

Description:
個人で管理している小規模なマストドンサーバーです。ホスティングサービス(hostdon)を利用しています。

テーマフリーになっています。良識の範囲内で好きに投稿していただいて構いません。 また管理者を筆頭にアニメや漫画、ゲームが好き、理解があるユーザーが大半です。 他のサーバーにメインのアカウントがあるユーザーが多いので、ホームタイムライン中心での利用を推奨しています。

基本的に知り合いを招待していますが、余裕があるため現在は承認制で新規ユーザーの登録を受け付けています。意気込みはスパム除けなので軽くで構いません。
Short:
話題フリーの小規模サーバーです。
基本的に知り合いを招待しています。登録自体は承認制にしているので気になる方はお気軽にどうぞ。元々管理者自身の壁打ち用にたてたサーバーなので投稿内容にも縛りはなく、サーバーのルール内で好きに使っていただいて構いません。

Description:
Aktuell sind alle großen Player im Bereich der Social Media extrem angespannt, wenn es um das Thema Cannabis geht. Account-Sperrungen, Löschen von Posts und Löschen von Accounts sind an der Tagesordnung, obwohl diese Accounts zum Großteil legal handeln.

Hier möchte wir einen Gegenpunkt setzen. Aktuell gibt es keine vergleichbare Plattform, daher besteht die Option First Mover in diesem Bereich zu werden.

Der Vorteil von Mastodon liegt dabei auf der Hand. Man versteht sich als dezentrales Twitter. Heißt, jede Community kann sich mit anderen Communitys verbinden. So können, aus Sicht der User, stabil Follower aufgebaut werden.

Brokkoli ist aktuell, dank der letzten Bundesdrogenbeauftragten, ein Synonym für Cannabis geworden und wir aktuell in der deutschen Community aktiv genutzt um den Regularien der Netzwerkbetreiber, wie META, aus dem Weg zugehen.
Short: Der Mastodon-Server von der Brokkoli-Community für die Brokkoli-Community.

Description:
Toot Foundation doesn't have one specific topic, but it is meant as a home for LGBTQIA people, anti-fascists, intersectional feminists, activists and social movements, and anyone who wants to make the world a better place and values kindness and respect.

This instance is not hosted in the US, the administrator doesn't live in the US, is not a US citizen and has no affiliation with the US government. This means, if you're a "free speech absolutist" or otherwise believe you can say anything you want without consideration for others, this is not the instance for you.

Some of the rules are purposefully left vague. We don't want to have arguments about whether or not someone violated the letter of the rules, we are more concerned with the spirit of the rules. Don't be a dick.

Cover art featuring our mascot Melon Tusk, by Puka Muriska.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Mastodon?

This video has a pretty good general explanation.

The Compassionate User's Guide to Mastodon goes more in depth into how to use it. Note that it says in order to join you should first go to the "main Mastodon page", that page is just a tool to help you choose your instance from a very small list; you don't need to do that if you have already decided where you want to join.

I also recommend checking out the Fedi Tips guide and following their Mastodon account.

Should I be taking special considerations for accessibility when posting?

Yes! I'm so glad you asked :)

  • When posting an image or video, please add an Alt Text description for those who are blind or visually impaired. Here is a good explanation of how you do it, and here some very good tips on how to write a good description. If you're accessing Mastodon on a browser and post an image without an Alt Text, there will be a red outline to remind you. If you use a mobile client, you can follow the Please Caption Bot to get a reminder. If for whatever reason you have a hard time writing Alt Texts, tag your post with #Alt4Me and a volunteer will help you.
  • Alt Texts on video or audio clips, describing the sound, are also very helpful for Deaf people.
  • When you write hashtags, please use CamelCase as opposed to alllowercase, it helps screen reader software properly separate the words.
  • If you post an image of someone making "eye contact" with the camera, or an image of food, please use a Content Warning and mark it as sensitive. It might not be obvious to you, but those are also things that can be anxiety inducing to some users.

Why should I mark NSFW content as sensitive? People shouldn't be browsing social media at work.

Sure, but some still do, and in some workplaces it's even accepted. Some people browse social media while visiting their nanna, or on public transport with somebody's child looking over their shoulder. Even if they're at home all alone, maybe they just don't want to see pictures of your asshole, so just give them the opportunity to consent or not to see it.

This applies to all nudity, including photos of somebody's bare chest. I'm not playing a game of Guess the Gender, trans femmes' breasts become taboo at some point after starting HRT but I don't know when, and pre-op trans mascs' chests come in various sizes, so we are keeping it simple and applying the same criteria across the board.

How can I contribute to supporting toot.foundation?

The instance is still small, but if you would like to help keep it running, you can either make a one time donation or set up a monthly contribution here. And if you would like to help keep the admin clothed and fed, you can give a tip here.

Who are the instance's staff?

At the moment it's just me, Melon Tusk (operated by Promethea), the administrator. As membership grows moderators and co-administrators will be added.
Short: A trans-owned general(ish) instance meant as a home for LGBTQIA people, anti-fascists, feminists, activists, and anyone who wants to make the world a better place and values kindness and respect.

Description: This is a personal instance, used by @xavi to tinker around.

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.
