Description:
Skyhoppers.Club

This instance exists first to give my buddies that listen to my podcast The Skyhoppers Podcast place to make their home in the Fediverse. Some patrons had made comments about not quite understanding how Mastodon works, so I took it upon myself to create a space for them and to be their guiding hand through the Fediverse (even though I'm kind of a n00b myself). I'm just starting out on my admin journey, so I'm very open to feedback/helpful tips!

This isn't just an instance for my podcast, though. I've been a huge fan of Star Wars all my life and after I left the internet at large at some point in the last few years, I was really missing a place to talk/post about it and discuss it with other like-minded people. So we'll call that reason Nummer zwei that this instance exists: for Star Wars fans! Hopefully the URL is ambiguous enough to maybe drag in a few stragglers from out there amongst the stars.

Once the podcast Patreon gets started back up (I've had it paused while we've been on break, so our coffers are a little light), I'll be using money from there that doesn't go into hosting the show to host this instance. We had a website for a while, but wouldn't you know that having a website requires a lot of unfun work that I never wanted to do. So hopefully this sticks a little better :)

The rules basically come down to "don't be a dick." I'm not going to tolerate hate of any kind here, and you'll get booted right quick if you start talking shit like that. There's a little more detail in the Rules section below if needed. If you enjoy your time spent here, take a second to consider subbing to our Patreon and supporting my efforts that way. Otherwise, just hang out, be cool, and have fun!
Short: Created as a place for fans of the Star Wars podcast The Skyhoppers Podcast to convene, but any general Star Wars fans or other cool people are also welcome!

Description:
Die Schweizerische Bundeskanzlei betreibt diese Mastodon-Instanz im Rahmen eines Pilotversuchs. Ziel ist es, Erfahrungen zu sammeln mit der Kommunikation in einem dezentral organisierten Netzwerk, das auf offener Software beruht.

Der Bundesrat und die Departemente können diese Instanz für offizielle Accounts nutzen. Privatpersonen, die mit den Accounts und Inhalten dieser Instanz interagieren möchten, brauchen dafür einen Account auf einer anderen Instanz. Eine Liste öffentlich zugänglicher Instanzen gibt es hier: https://joinmastodon.org/de/servers

+

La Chancellerie fédérale suisse exploite cette instance Mastodon dans le cadre d'un essai pilote. L'objectif est d'acquérir de l'expérience en matière de communication dans un réseau organisé de manière décentralisée et basé sur des logiciels ouverts.

Le Conseil fédéral et les départements peuvent utiliser cette instance pour des comptes officiels. Les personnes privées qui souhaitent interagir avec les comptes et les contenus de cette instance ont besoin pour cela d'un compte sur une autre instance. Une liste des instances accessibles au public est disponible ici : https://joinmastodon.org/fr/servers

+

La Cancelleria federale svizzera gestisce questa istanza di Mastodon nell'ambito di un test pilota. L'obiettivo è quello di fare esperienza con la comunicazione in una rete organizzata in modo decentralizzato e basata su un software aperto.

Il Consiglio federale e i dipartimenti possono utilizzare questa istanza per gli account ufficiali. I privati che desiderano interagire con gli account e i contenuti di questa istanza devono avere un account su un'altra istanza. L'elenco delle istanze accessibili al pubblico è disponibile qui: https://joinmastodon.org/it/servers
Short: Die Instanz der Schweizer Regierung. L' instance du gouvenement suisse. L' istanza del governo svizzero. L' istanza de la regenza svizra.
topic: Bundesrat - Conseil fédéral - Consiglio federale - Cussegl federal

Description:
Esper.lol

Esper.lol is a Generalised Anime Mastodon instance which means you can talk about whatever. Other languages are allowed but we ask for Mostly English.

The instance is themed on Mob Psycho 100 but it is not pinned to just the topic of Anime, I just thought the domain would be cool and like the show 📺.

Esper.lol updates and website

You can follow @Esper for instance updates and information.

OH! I also made a website for the Instance: spiritsandsuch.lol

Rules and such

Rules on Esper.lol are pretty light. The only time servers will be de-federated will be due to either being a bot-spammed mess or breaking our small list of rules on a wide scale. Please read the rules section below for a complete list of the server rules!

Moderated servers are only available to logged-in users due to blocked servers attempting to harass esper.lol after being blocked.

Staff

At the moment I, @Arataka am the only staff member.

Learning Mastodon

  • What is Mastodon (Video): Link

  • How to use Mastodon (Video): Link

  • How to move to another Mastodon instance (video): Link

  • Mastodon mobile apps: If you are looking for other ways to access Mastodon this page should help you: Link

  • Mastodon on GitHub: Link

Why does this instance look different than vanilla Mastodon?

Esper.lol uses Bird-like UI as its theme. This instance is 100% vanilla Mastodon directly from the official git repo. If you are interested in the Bird-like UI theme the source code can be found here: Github

DMCA Takedown Requests

Only content posted by users with "@esper.lol" in their username is managed by this server. If you find infringing material from a user on our server, make sure it is not covered by Fair Use, then send your takedown request to this instance's admin email ([hello] @ [spiritsandsuch.lol]).

Instance hosting information

This instance is hosted on Hetzner cloud with 4vCPU and 16GB of RAM.

  • Daily backups of all services

  • Media CDN

  • Status page for uptime tracking

Funding

Hetzner Refferal Link: Ref

Using this link gives you €⁠20 credit on Hetzner! If you spend €⁠10 I get €⁠10 credited for Esper.lol hosting costs!

No other funding source is currently available

Alternative instances!

I also host the instances aincrad.lol and vrparty.social, Aincrad is another anime based instance but running Sharkey instead of Mastodon. VRParty is another Mastodon instance but is instead centered around VR content.

  • Aincrad: Link
  • VRParty: Link

All instances have a shared block list.

More information

You can find more information about Esper.lol on the spiritsandsuch Esper hub. This includes the full block list for Esper.lol: Link

Credit

Emojis:

Neocat: Link

catgirl/distrowos/senko/showbyrock/skil: Link

SAO: Link

Partial credit to urusai.social for some parts of this instances about section/rules.

Banner credit: IMDB

Esper.lol was created on 7/4/23.
Short: Generalized Mastodon instance. Have any evil spirit issues lately?

Description: Akkoma: The cooler fediverse server

The purpose of this server is to give myself and a handful of others a place where we can safely post standard NSFW content without our instance shutting us down without cause. The majority of large Mastodon instances state they tolerate NSFW content when the rules are followed, but in my experience this isn't really true. They may find the occasional NSFW post perfectly acceptable, but NSFW-focused accounts are merely tolerated until one day they aren't. Making my own instance has ensured that we can get content out without bogus reports or shadow admin practices keeping us locked down. - neomobius
Short: This instance is run by NeoMobius for NeoMobius. I got tired of getting limited by other instances and being forced to bounce around, so I made my own home!

Description:
Das Ministerium für Infrastruktur und Digitales des Landes Sachsen-Anhalt (MID) betreibt diese Mastodon-Instanz zum Zwecke der Presse- und Öffentlichkeitsarbeit. Die Instanz ist nicht für die Allgemeinheit zugänglich.

Weiteren Behörden, Institutionen und Vertretern der unmittelbaren und mittelbaren Landesverwaltung und weiteren Organisationen des Landes Sachsen-Anhalt steht es offen, die Instanz für das Betreiben eines eigenen offiziellen Accounts zu nutzen.

Falls Sie Interesse an einer Nutzung der Mastodon-Instanz haben, wenden Sie sich bitte an mastodon-redaktion@sachsen-anhalt.de. Bitte nutzen Sie die Adresse auch für Fragen oder Meldungen zu Inhalten.

Accountbetreiber sind grundsätzlich selbst für ihre Inhalte verantwortlich. Eine jederzeit uneingeschränkte Erreichbarkeit der Instanz kann durch das Ministerium für Infrastruktur und Digitales des Landes Sachsen-Anhalt nicht garantiert werden. Das Ministerium behält sich vor, den Betrieb und die Nutzung der Instanz zu jeder Zeit vorübergehend oder permanent einzuschränken bzw. abzuschalten.

Zur Webseite des Ministeriums

Impressum
Short: Dies ist der Mastodon-Server des Ministeriums für Infrastruktur und Digitales des Landes Sachsen-Anhalt (MID).

Description:
Author Help

This Mastodon instance is provided by Author Help for the benefit of the indie author community.

We adhere to the Mastodon Server Covenant.

We may change the rules occasionally. Any such changes will be announced.

Statement of Principles

This server is operated according to our statement of principles, given below and also at our website

We at Author Help believe that:

  • Every author’s words are their own, and they should retain creative and financial control of their books
  • Free speech and freedom of expression are important
  • Our freedoms are also important. We are not obligated to work with authors whose works contravene laws on hate speech or go against our principles

Further, we believe that:

  • Black lives matter
  • Disabilities do not reduce or negate a person’s validity or value
  • Trans rights are human rights
  • All love based on respect and consent is good
  • Voices of all ages deserve to be heard
  • Freedom of belief is important, but does not extend to oppression of others
  • Human rights apply to all, regardless of a person’s place of birth or the circumstances they find themselves in
  • Caring for the environment is everyone’s responsibility
Short: This Mastodon instance is provided by Author Help for the benefit of the indie author community. All indie authors are welcome to join.

Description:
随心自游，纽村放牛。欢迎访问本人创建的【纽村放牛Mastodon站】！

Mastodon是一个开源的分散和联邦化社交网络平台，提供了一个分散和联邦化的选择，与传统的集中式社交媒体平台有所不同。它允许用户创建账户、发布消息、与他人互动并建立社区。

在这个Mastodon网站上，我们鼓励积极参与、开放的讨论和包容的氛围。我们认为自由和民主是重要的价值观，因为它们可以促进公正、平等和人权。在这个开放的社区中，你可以分享你的想法、兴趣和经验，与其他志同道合的人交流，结识新朋友，并拓展你的知识和视野。

我们欢迎所有对自由、民主和开放价值观抱有共鸣的人加入我们的站点。无论你来自何方、背景如何，只要你尊重他人，愿意参与积极建设性的交流，都将受到热烈欢迎。

如想了解更多关于本人的信息，欢迎访问我的个人博客网站 https://nzcow.com。我也建立了一个基于Matrix协议的分散和联邦化的加密通信平台 https://element.nzcow.com。欢迎大家通过该通信平台与我（@hangfeng:nzcow.com)和他人加密即时通信。该通信平台也为大家提供智能聊天机器人服务，包括ChatGPT、Google Bard、Microsoft Bing Chat、Microsoft Bing Image Creator等。详情见 https://nzcow.com/post/notice-for-paying-users-utilizing-the-robot-service/ 。

Description:
Named after the black rocks at Peggy's Cove, this is a Mastodon instance for rad folk in Mi'kma'ki.

A breakdown of the meaning behind the flag by its designer, Christy Ó Ceallaigh-Bisson (@GarlicBreath@blackrocks.social):

"The bisected flag with a black half is the classical anarchist form. The sky blue symbolizes the South Shore of Mi'kma'ki, and evokes a solar punk orientation to our post-capitalist vision. The red star represents socialism. Most germane to our instance, the blue juxtaposing black represents the dreaded black rocks of our coast line."
Short: Named after the black rocks at Peggy's Cove, this is a Mastodon instance for rad folk in Mi'kma'ki.

Description:
This is a semi-private Mastodon instance for Minecraft fans who do other things, too!

We are seeded from the Existence Community, but don't be afraid to ask to join!

Attributions

Pride flags by Zoë Bijl.

Pride Minecraft bees by moon.

Original text emoji set by SugarCaney.

Other emoji may be dubiously unattributed; please contact hey@igalaxy.dev if there are any issues.

Code of Conduct

In the future, this instance will follow the updated Existence Community Code of Conduct. Until then, it will follow the terms of service/code of conduct of the flagship Mastodon instance. Please read and follow them while participating in this community.

Additional Guidelines

  • Posts containing a piece of art must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
  • Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use NSFW tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
  • Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.
  • Far Lands Cafe is a primarily English-speaking instance, but posts in other languages are allowed.

Operations

Far Lands Cafe is run on a VPS located in Central USA. Media is stored on Cloudflare R2.

Donations

You may support operating costs via Ko-fi.
Short: Semi-private Mastodon instance for Minecraft fans who do other things, too!

Express yourself freely.

Description:
old.sharlayan.city

Ensconced in a lonely northern archipelago and ever blessed by the wise auspices of Thaliak, the gleaming white edifices of this city stand at the center of Sharlayan society. (올드 샬레이안 인게임 영어 설명)

old.sharlayan.city 는 개인 인스턴스입니다. 파이널 판타지 14의 확장팩 '효월의 종언' 에서 등장하는 도시 '올드 샬레이안'의 이름을 땄습니다.

가입 조건

본 서버에 가입하려면:

  1. @revi@old.sharlayan.city 의 지인일 것.
    • (1.1) 본 서버에 계정이 있는 자의 지인의 경우 관리자 승인 하에 초대받을 수도 있음.
  2. 서버 규칙에 동의할 것
  3. (권고 사항) 다른 서버에 계정이 있어 언제든 탈출이 가능할 것

이 목록의 연락처 또는 별도로 알고 있는 연락처를 통해 연락 주시면 계정을 만들어 드릴 수 있습니다. 거절할 수도 있습니다.

규칙

본 서버의 규칙은 기본적으로 본 서버의 사용자와, 타 서버의 사용자로써 본 서버에 접수되는 내용에 대해 모두 적용됩니다. 기술적인 한계로 인해 본 서버의 운영상 결정이 타 서버에까지 적용되지는 않지만, 본 서버에서의 제재 기록은 남습니다.

  1. 개자식처럼 굴지 마세요. 그러니까, 헛소리 하지 마세요. 다만, 헛소리 중에서도 다음 헛소리는 특히 금지됩니다. 헛소리의 판정은 문언 그 자체 뿐만 아니라 그 의도 또한 고려됩니다.
    • 다른 사람에 대한 모욕, 괴롭힘, 사칭, 명예 훼손.
    • 인종, 성정체성, 성지향성, 성별, 장애 여부 등에 관한 비방, 중상.
    • 공개되지 않은 대화를 대화 당사자 전원의 동의 없이 공개하는 행위.
    • 다른 사람이 직접 공개하지 않은 개인 정보를 함부로 떠벌리고 다니는 행위.
  2. 다음 주제에 대한 내용을 (미디어를 포함합니다) 게시하는 경우 다음 제한 사항을 준수하여야 합니다. 위 제한 사항을 준수하지 않는 미디어에는 강제로 민감한 미디어 플래그가 삽입되며, 텍스트의 경우 게시글이 삭제처리됩니다.
    • 정치 또는 종교와 관련된 내용: 다음 조건 중 하나 이상을 준수해야 합니다.
      1. 게시 대상을 공개 (Public)으로 게시하지 않습니다. (이 경우 CW를 걸지 않아도 됩니다.)
      2. CW에 정치 또는 종교와 관련되어 있는 내용이라는 경고문구를 삽입합니다. (이 경우 공개로 게시할 수 있습니다.)
    • 성적인 내용: CW에 성적인 내용이라는 문구를 삽입합니다.
    • 타인에 대한 폭행, 자해, 혈흔이 표시되거나 연상되는 내용: CW에 해당 내용이 포함되거나 연상된다는 내용을 삽입합니다.
    • 게임, 애니메이션, 그 외 문화작품 중 출시된 지 4주, 또는 다음 내용이 공개되기 전의 내용: CW에 해당 작품의 스포일러라는 내용을 삽입합니다. (두 기간 중 더 빨리 도래하는 기간에 제한이 해제됩니다.)
    • 그 외 강남역 1번출구에서 확성기 들고, 마스크 벗고, 주민등록등본을 A1 사이즈로 잘 보이게 출력한 후 목에 걸고 당당하게 말할 수 없는 내용: 적절한 CW를 삽입합니다.
  3. 그 외에도 본 서버에 계정을 가진 사용자는 다음 행위를 해서는 안 됩니다.
    • '특정 성별의 팔로우만 허용'한다는 발언을 공공연히 하는 행위. 팔로우 승인을 선택적으로 하는 것을 막을 수는 없지만, 그것을 떠벌리고 다니지는 마세요.
    • 타 SNS, 타 서버의 게시글을 이 서버로 릴레이하는 경우 관리자의 명시적인 사전 승인이 있는 경우를 제외하고 '공개' 게시대상으로 게시하면 안 됩니다.
    • 이용자, 운영자, 서버 소재지의 관할권에서 불법인 행위. 운영자의 관할권은 '대한민국', 서버 소재지의 관할권은 '아메리카합중국' (United States of America)의 연방법과 '뉴저지 주' (State of New Jersey)법으로 정의됩니다.
    • 일회용 이메일을 사용하는 행위. 일회용 이메일을 사용하는 것이 적발되는 경우 계정은 즉시 정지되며, 이의제기는 인정되지 않습니다. Fastmail Masked Email, SimpleLogin 등과 같이 계정 소유자의 메일함으로 직송되는 메일 포워딩 서비스는 메일이 배달되는 한 '일회용 이메일'로 간주하지 않습니다.

운영 기조

연령 제한

관할권과 관련하여 어린이 보호와 관련된 현행법 상 귀찮은 일을 방지하기 위해, 본 서버에는 대한민국 민법상 성년이 되지 않은 사용자는 가입할 수 없습니다.

이의제기

이 서버는 본질적으로 서버 주인의 편의를 위해 운영되는 독재 서버입니다. 다만, 이 서버에는 서버 주인의 지인 등 다른 사용자가 입주할 수 있습니다. 어찌됐던간에, 이 서버에서의 조치에 대한 항고는 로컬 유저에 한해 제한적으로 인정되며, 그 외의 항고는 인정되지 않습니다.

본 서버의 사용자가 제재 조치에 항고하는 경우, 사안에 따라 보조 관리자에 의해 검토될 수 있습니다.

  • 계정 정지와 제재 기한이 60일 미만인 제재의 항고는 1회만 가능합니다.
  • 60일 이상인 제재의 항고는 1회, 후 결론이 통지된 날로부터 60일마다 가능합니다.
  • 기한이 없는 제재의 경우 1회 항고 후, 결론이 통지된 날로부터 180일마다 가능합니다.

마스토돈 시스템 하에서는 항고 (이의제기) 가 1회만 가능하므로, 1회 이후의 이의제기는 마스토돈 계정에 등록된 이메일을 통해 운영자가 지정하는 메일 주소로 이의제기 내용을 전송하는 것으로 접수하며, 그에 대한 통지도 해당 메일로 회신해 드립니다. 계정 정지를 제외하고는, 제재 기한이 종료된 후에도 1회 항고를 할 수 있습니다. 최근 3년간 제재 기록이 9회 이상인 사용자는 계정이 정지됩니다. (이 때 항고가 받아들여진 제재는 제재 횟수에 산입하지 않습니다.)

리모트 서버의 사용자가 본 서버에서 이루어진 제재 조치에 항고하고자 하는 경우 스스로는 할 수 없고, 본 서버에 계정이 존재하는 사용자를 통해서만 대리로 할 수 있습니다.

다중 계정 사용자에 대한 제재 적용

연합우주에서는 동일한 사용자가 여러 서버, 또는 동일 서버에 여러 계정을 가지고 활동하는 일이 흔합니다. 따라서 '3년간 제재 기록 9회' 계산 시 운영자의 판단에 따라 동일한 신원으로 확인되는 다중 계정 사용자의 제재 기록은 합산하여 계산합니다.

수사, 사법기관에 대한 데이터 제공

국가기관 등이 본 서버의 사용자 정보를 득하고자 하는 경우, 대한민국 법원이 발부한 적법한 영장을 통하여야만 가능합니다. 영장의 모사전송 등 방식으로는 영장 집행에 응할 수 없습니다. (대법원 2015도10648 판례 참조) 단, 사용자, 운영자의 생명, 재산 등에 대한 급박한 위험이 도래한 경우 영장 없이도 정보가 제공될 수 있습니다. 법관이 명시적으로 영장 발부 사실을 고지하지 못하도록 한 경우를 제외하고는, 영장의 집행 즉시 영장 집행 사실이 이용자에게 고지됩니다.

If you are law enforcement and would like to obtain user data and/or other data held by this server, you must get a search warrant from the Court of Republic of Korea. We do not respond to request by other jurisdiction unless compelling emergency reason exists. Unless prohibited by the Search Warrant, we will notify the person in the warrant that their data has been provided.

개정

규칙의 개정 역사는 GitHub 에서 확인할 수 있습니다. (이 문단의 내용의 경우 마스토돈에서는 최근 2개의 개정 사항만을 게시합니다.)

  • 2023-07-31: CW 규칙에 폭력성, 자해 관련 내용이 추가되었습니다.
  • 2023-08-03: 1) 가입 조건에 2차지인 가입 조건을 추가하였습니다. 2) 서버 규칙의 적용 대상을 명확히 하였습니다. 3) 스포일러 규정의 해제일자를 명확히 하였습니다. 4) 릴레이 게시물의 경우 관리자의 명시적 승인이 있는 경우 공개 게시물로 발행할 수 있습니다. 5) 본 서버 사용자는 성년이어야 한다는 규정을 추가하였습니다. 6) 3아웃 (9스트라이크) 사형제에 3년 기간 제한을 추가하였습니다. 7) 연합우주에서 여러 계정을 가진 사용자의 경우 3아웃 사형제 기산 시 계정의 스트라이크 수를 합산하여 검토한다는 규정을 추가하였습니다.
Short: Ensconced in a lonely northern archipelago and ever blessed by the wise auspices of Thaliak, the gleaming white edifices of this city stand at the center of Sharlayan society.

Description:
chtn.uk is a network for cross-institutional collaboration on inclusive description issues, including sharing resources, tools, and examples of good praxis across and beyond the UK cultural heritage/GLAM sector.

Formally, you are encouraged to:

  • Introduce yourselves (you can use the hashtag #introduction)
  • Share any resources that you're working on related to inclusive description work (use hashtags like #critcat #metadata #GLAM #UKheritage #inclusivedescription)
  • Share any heritage projects that might be of interest to others
  • Share your thoughts on any resources or projects related to inclusive description work and DEI issues across the heritage sector
  • Ask others for help/advice regarding inclusive description projects
  • Share your queries about terminology choices within the heritage sector (use the hashtag #inclusiveterminologyquery)
  • Share reading suggestions that might be of interest to others, including your own blog posts, articles, books etc.
  • Cite your sources, use Mastodon's "Content Warning" feature as necessary, and add alternative text to any images that you share

    • Informally, you are encouraged to:

  • Use this platform as your personal social media page such as you would use Twitter (you can change the privacy of individual toots if you wish)
  • Share what you're up to
  • Share what you're reading/watching
  • Share photos of yourself/ recent trips /your pets / your friends & family
  • Post or retoot relatable/funny or political content, as long as it is respectful of all peoples and does not violate the server rules

    • Support chtn.uk

    The @chtn.uk Mastodon server is currently self-funded. Any small donations are greatly appreciated. The running costs are currently $20/month, but expected to increase as the server gets larger.
Short: Network for cross-institutional collaboration on inclusive description issues, including sharing resources, tools, and examples of good praxis across and beyond the UK cultural heritage/GLAM sector.
An awesome server ran by alton.cloud.

Description:
The team at BBC Research & Development are researching social technologies and exploring possibilities for the BBC. One part of our work is to establish a BBC presence in the Fediverse.

This is an experiment - we will run it for 6 months, and then look at how much value it has provided, how much work it requires to maintain and then decide whether and how to continue. We're learning as we go, and we'll write about what we discover in the hope that it might be useful for others. The BBC will continue its normal social media activity in the usual places.

We're starting off small with just a handful of accounts from R&D and our colleagues at BBC Radio, but we hope to be adding more accounts from other areas of the BBC soon:

  • @BBCRD
  • @BBC5Live
  • @BBCRadio4
  • @BBC_News_Labs
  • @BBCTaster
  • @Connected_Studio
Short: This is an experimental Mastodon instance run by BBC Research and Development.

Description:
Instanssi blogeille

Instanssi, joka on tarkoitettu blogeille ja jossa blogit voivat jakaa omia artikkeleitaan.

Tai voit jopa halutessasi pitää täällä omaa mikroblogia! Olemmekin nostaneet merkkirajan tätä varten!

Rekisteröityminen vaatii ylläpidon hyväksynnän ja perustelut!

Ohjeita & vinkkejä

Listamme tähän tulevaisuudessa ohjeita ja vinkkejä siitä miten voitte sisältöä jakaa tänne automaattisesti.

Ylläpito

Tätä palvelinta ylläpitää Marko

Instanssin ylläpitoon ja moderointitiimiin haetaan aina vapaaehtoisia ja halukkaita. Tule mukaan kehittämään instanssia lähettämällä sähköpostia osoitteeseen moi@blogi.social

Säännöt

Ei pornografista, seksuaalista tai ylettömän väkivaltaista sisältöä.

Pornografinen ja seksuaalinen sisältö on kielletty. Alastomuus on sallittu, mutta se tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Liiallinen väkivaltainen sisältö on kielletty. Esimerkiksi: todellisia terroritekoja kuvaava väkivaltainen sisältö, teloitusvideot yms. Moderaattorit arvioivat tarvittaessa, mikä on liiallista.

Tämän lisäksi muu väkivaltainen sisältö tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Ei rasismia, seksismiä, transfobiaa, tai muuta vähemmistöihin kohdistuvaa syrjintää

Rasismi, seksismi, transfobia, antisemitismi tai muu vähemmistöön kohdistuva syrjintä on kielletty ja voi johtaa tilin pysyvään sulkemiseen.

Ei laittomuuksia

Kaikki Suomen lakeja rikkova sisältö on palvelimella kielletty ja johtaa tilin sulkemiseen ja käyttäjän raportointiin poliisille.

Ei häirintää, doksausta, valheellisen tiedon levittämistä tai muina esiintymistä

Muiden käyttäjien häirintä, palvelun toimintaa häiritsevä käytös, ja muu toiminta joka haittaa muiden käyttäjien käyttökokemusta on kielletty. Tällaisia asioita ovat muun muassa:

  • Viestien lähettäminen käyttäjälle sen jälkeen, kun tämä on pyytänyt keskustelun lopettamista tai muiden käyttäjien kehottaminen tällaiseen käytökseen.
  • Muiden käyttäjien yksityistietojen levittäminen.
  • Salaliittoteorioiden, disinformaation tai muun valheellisen tiedon levittäminen.
  • Esiintyminen jonain muuna henkilönä, jos kyse ei ole parodiasta. Parodiatilit tulee merkitä selvästi ja yksiselitteisesti sellaisiksi.
  • Kuvakaappauksien levittäminen muiden käyttäjien viesteistä ilman, että merkitsee kyseistä käyttäjää viestiin, tai muuten häiritsemistarkoituksessa.

Ei roskapostia

Älä ole roskapostittaja ja täytä muiden syötettä turhalla spämmäämisellä.
Short:
Blogi.social instanssi on nimensä mukaisesti tarkoitettu blogeille.

Instanssin ajatuksena on tarjota paikka missä blogit voivat linkittää omaan sisältöönsä.

Description:
FOSS Place is a community of open-source advocates and enthusiasts who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and skills with others. We are completely user-funded, which means that we rely on the contributions of our members to keep our community running.

We are a welcoming community that invites everyone to see the power of open-source. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced developer, we have something for you. We offer a variety of services, including tutorials, forums, and social platforms to help you learn and grow.

We believe that open-source software is the future, and we are committed to making it accessible to everyone. We are a diverse community, and we celebrate our differences. We believe that everyone has something to contribute, and we welcome your participation.

Here are some of the things you can do in the FOSS Place community:
* Learn about open-source software
* Find help with open-source projects
* Share your knowledge and skills with others
* Collaborate on open-source projects
* Meet other open-source enthusiasts

If you are interested in learning more about the FOSS Place community, please visit our website. We would be happy to welcome you to our community.

Here are some additional things to mention about the FOSS Place community:
* We are a global community with members from all over the world.
* We are always looking for new ways to improve our community.
* We are committed to making open-source software accessible for everyone.

We hope you will join us in the FOSS Place community!

Quick Links

  • Website

Rules and Policies

  • Community Guidelines
Short: FOSS Place is an open-source community that welcomes new users and advocates, engages, and collaborates with other open-source projects and developers around the globe.

Description:
bynight.cafe - a Fediverse instance for those who are looking for a cozy and safe space. Imagine a rainy evening, a hot drink, people you like and stories both real and fictional.

Language

People are diverse and speak diverse languages, as is to be expected, but we also want to build a shared community. You are invited to use either English or German as our shared language. All official communications will be handled in English.

Attribution

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.
Short: bynight.cafe - a Fediverse instance for those who are looking for a cozy and safe space. Imagine a rainy evening, a hot drink, people you like and stories both real and fictional.

Description:
本站点欢迎你和Fediverse中不同背景，爱好的任何人友好地交流，而免于任何政府或大公司的言论审查。

在这里，你可以：

发布长达5000字符数限制的文本

不用再担心遇到字写不下，不得不开个长串的尴尬境地。

给每条posts附上最高6张媒体图片

不同客户端/网页前端支持显示的媒体数目可能不同；不同实例在接收你的posts时，可接收到的数目也可能不同——在给其他站点的用户分享图片时，还请注意这一点。

选择以纯文本或者是以Markdown格式的富文本发布您的帖子

GoToSocial可以支持完整的Markdown格式的文本输入。

配合支持Markdown渲染输出的网页前端or客户端，你可以获得最佳的刷信息流的体验！

自由地选择适合你的网页前端和客户端

GoToSocial使用了Mastodon的调用API，大多数支援Mastodon的网页前端或客户端也可以兼容GoToSocial，并实现出良好的使用效果。

与全世界绝大多数使用了白名单联通政策的Fediverse站点正确联通

meow.day是无任何不良行为记录的域名，并在本站设立前不久才刚刚被注册。暂时不会遇到因为被block产生的任何ActivityPub协议的连通性问题。

由于每个ActivityPub服务器实现对协议的解释略有不同，因此一些服务器与GoToSocial的联邦功能尚不完全兼容。GoToSocial的开发者正在尽全力保证此服务端的可连通性。

无任何心理负担地刷新你的时间线

GoToSocial不使用算法优化你的时间线信息流，你所能选择的时间线刷新方式就只有按最新发布的时间顺序排列。

与其他实例的不同之处：

相较于Mastodon，

GoToSocial不使用任何算法推荐

Mastodon中使用了推荐算法的探索栏目（包括热门贴文，话题标签，最新消息，推荐关注等）都不会在GoToSocial被实现，也不在开发者的Todolist中。

创立一个新账户后，用户默认的社交状态是”锁推/不开放RSS“；默认的贴文类型是”纯文 本/Unlisted状态“

当然，你可以在用户的设置面板中手动地将其设置为”不锁推/开放RSS/Markdown文本/Public状态“

在Federated时间轴的行为模式上，

不是去拉取一切已结交联邦的实例中的Public Posts (Mastodon的行为)，而是去拉取本站用户的的已 fo 用户的 Public Posts.

但是…

GoToSocial仍处于开发状态，很多功能仍然有待完善，like

  • 无法与版聊账户互动。（ovo.st, a.guppe.pe均暂时与本站处于失联状态）
  • edit功能尚未完善，也无法查看edited posts的edited后的内容。
  • 用户注册系统的Web界面尚未完善，目前仅能由管理员手动通过Linux Shell来操作注册。
  • 浏览器通知功能未完善，客户端对用户的通知只能通过定时拉取来实现。
  • Poll功能尚未完善，你也无法看到其他用户发布的poll.
  • Notification功能尚未完善，只有Tusky, Fedilab两款客户端能正常地给你发送通知。
  • ……
Short:
欢迎来到meow站(meow.day)！

meow.day是一个自由，开放，面向中文用户的GoToSocial实例。在这里你可以和Fediverse中不同背景，爱好的任何人友好地交流，而免于任何政府或大公司的言论审查。

meow.day的运营情况公开，你可以在本站管理员的嘟文列表中看到站点的运营状况的公示。

社区规则/管理公示/使用指南

👇请参考下面的"see more details"页面。

注册要求

本站暂行施行审批注册的方案，你可以在这里填写注册问卷。

已注册的用户便可前往站点主页探索你的Fediverse Timeline。

Description:
어서오세요. 이곳은 어디에나 있고, 어디에도 없는 섬.

영원한 미로에 발을 들이고 만 당신, 나갈 수 없다면 이곳의 생활에 적응하는 게 좋겠지요?

잃어버린 섬에서 지켜야할 것들

배려

  • 잃어버린 섬(Missing Island)은 자유로운 대화와 편안한 일상 공유를 위한 장소입니다. 항상 다른 사람을 배려하는 습관을 몸에 익히도록 합시다.
  • 배려하고 있다면 불특정 다수의 누군가가 자신의 신원으로 인해 불쾌하거나 상처 받는 말은 하지 말아야겠지요? 혐오와 차별이 담긴 발언은 금지됩니다.
  • 특정 대상을 조롱하거나 악성 비난을 하는 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 그럼에도 불구하고 사람은 이따금 화를 낼 필요가 있습니다. 그럴 때는 홈 공개 이하로 대상을 명확히 해주시기 바랍니다. 관련 없는 사람이 지나가다 뭇매 맞는 일이 없게 해주세요.
  • 내 글을 모두에게 보여주고 싶지 않을 수 있습니다. 그러나 나의 사생활이 타인을 재단하는 기준이 되어서는 곤란합니다. 일종의 차별이 될 수 있기 때문입니다. 팔로우 대상을 '명시적으로' 제한하는 것을 금지합니다.

안전

  • 타인의 정보를 수집하거나 감시하는 행위 혹은 이를 고지하는 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 협박, 상해, 자살, 테러 등을 예고하는 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 타인의 신상을 공개하거나 이를 빌미로 공격하는 모든 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • 그 외의 불법적인 활동 및 내용 게시는 금지됩니다. 문제가 발생할 경우 정부 기관에게 게시자의 정보가 전달될 수 있습니다.

스팸 정책

  • 불법 성인 광고 등의 스팸 계정 및 게시글을 제한합니다.
  • 아티스트의 홍보를 환영합니다. 그러나 공개글 빈도가 지나칠 경우 제한될 수 있습니다.
  • 비상업성 홍보글의 경우 상기된 배려 및 안전 규칙에 어긋나지 않을 경우 제한되지 않습니다.

저작권 및 지적 재산권

  • 모든 게시글 및 첨부파일은 게시자에게 귀속됩니다.
  • 타인의 저작물을 무단 전재하는 것이 발각될 경우 게시글이 삭제될 수 있습니다.

MISSING ISLAND

  • 일회용 이메일을 사용한 가입을 금지합니다. 해당 사용자에게는 규칙 위반에 의한 조치가 전달되지 않기 때문에 운영상의 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  • 위 사항을 따르지 않을 경우 게시글 삭제, 공개범위 제한, 계정 정지 등의 제한 조치가 이뤄질 수 있습니다. 이의제기가 필요한 경우 메일로 연락주세요.
Short: 스스로 꿈꾸고, 어딘가로 떠날 수 있는 사람을 위한 장소입니다.

Description:
asso•lgbt

asso•lgbt est une instance Mastodon hébergeant des collectifs et associations LGBTQIA+ et féministes en France. 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️

Qui peut s'inscrire sur asso•lgbt ?

Vous représentez une association ou un collectif LGBTQIA+ et/ou féministe ? L'inscription vous est ouverte :)
À noter :

  • Nous approuvons manuellement chaque inscription. N'hésitez pas à indiquer en quelques mots au nom de quelle association ou quel collectif vous désirez créer un compte.
  • Sauf exception, la création de compte sur asso•lgbt est réservée aux associations et aux collectifs, nous n'accueillons pas de comptes personnels.
  • Si votre association ou collectif n'est pas une association LGBTQIA+ ou féministe, nous pouvons refuser votre demande d'inscription — ce n'est pas contre vous :)
  • Absolument aucune association ou collectif se revendiquant d'un féminisme qui excluerait les personnes trans n'est la bienvenue sur cette instance. Aucune.

Pourquoi asso•lgbt ?

Avoir une présence sur Mastodon et le Fédiverse en tant qu'association ou collectif LGBTQIA+ et féministe, ce n'est pas forcément simple. asso•lgbt est née de 2 constats :

  1. le choix de l'instance est bien souvent un point bloquant dans la décision de créer un compte sur le Fédiverse.
  2. s'inscrire sur une instance généraliste peut poser un problème de visibilité.

L'objectif d'asso•lgbt est d'accueillir ces associations et collectifs, et ce sur un domaine immédiatement identifiable, asso.lgbt.

Aussi et surtout, contrairement à certaines instances généralistes, une instance Mastodon dédiée à l'hébergement d'associations et collectifs LGBTQIA+ et féministes serait une instance qui :

  1. s'attacherait à assurer une modération stricte concernant les discours de haine, homophobes, transphobes, sexistes, misogynes, validistes et racistes.
  2. s'attacherait à préserver au mieux la sécurité des associations et de leurs représentant·es.

L'objectif d'asso•lgbt est donc aussi de faire de ces 2 principes une priorité.

Qui est derrière asso•lgbt ?

  • Niléane Dorffer, militante féministe et trans, est fondatrice et administratrice de l'instance.
  • Merry Portenseigne est co-administratrice et modératrice de l'instance.

Pour toutes questions relatives à l'administration et à la modération de l'instance, vous pouvez contacter @staff, ou écrire un e-mail à contact@asso.lgbt

Si vous souhaitez participer aux frais d'hébergement de l'instance, vous pouvez faire un don ponctuel ou mensuel. 💜
Short: est une instance Mastodon hébergeant des collectifs et associations LGBTQIA+ et féministes en France.

Description:
This is a mastodon instance created to give nonprofit organizations a voice in the fediverse. This is a professional oriented instance and all posts or other content originating from this instance must be appropriate to a casually professional environment. Hateful, lude, overly vulgar, abusive, misleading or threatening content is not permitted here, even when content warned.

Be sure to read the rules for more info on some of this. Moderation will be handled based on both the list of rules and this description.

At the time of this writing, I am the sole owner and administrator of the server, handling all costs involved. I do this in my free time and have a full time job, so responses may be delayed. If the server becomes large enough to justify it, I may ask for moderation assistance, and possibly financial though that is unlikely. I run this instance as a service to nonprofits who may wish to have a presence on Mastodon, but are daunted by the number of possible instances and/or the rules regarding organizations, advertisement, and things like that.

To avoid the need for personally keeping up with technical maintenance, I have chosen to run this instance through masto.host, which is itself a one person owned company. There are pros and cons to such an arrangement, and it is quite different from large social media. Should there be any lengthy interruption to the instance for any reason, I will do my best to contact users with what information I have. Decentralization has its risks, but it also has the advantage of more control. Should your organization at any point decide to move instances, including setting up your own, there are migration tools available.
Short: This is a mastodon instance created to give nonprofit organizations a voice in the fediverse. This is a professional oriented instance.

Description:
Instance Mastodon dédiée aux Toulousain·es (bien sûr vous pouvez vous inscrire si vous n'êtes pas de Toulouse).

L'instance est entièrement hébergée en France à Gravelines (chez OVH).

Pensez à lire les quelques règles avant de vous inscrire.

Pour toute question ou sugestion pour pouvez envoyer un message privé à Robin.

Modération

La liste des instances bloquées est directement issue de cette liste.

Financement

L'instance est intégralement financée par moi-même. N'hésitez pas à me soutenir sur cette page pour m'aider à payer les frais d'hébergement.

Voilà le détail des frais d'hébergement:

  • VPS chez OVH: 12€/mois
  • option de sauvegarde automatique: 7€/mois
  • nom de domaine: 10€/ans

Relais

L'instance est reliée aux relais suivants:

  • relay.universeodon
  • bigrelay.social
  • activityrelay.beep.computer
  • relay.pourparlers.social

Emojis

Les emojis disponibles sont les suivants lien. N'hésitez pas à m'en proposer d'autres.

Plus d'informations

Vous trouverez plus d'information concernant l'instance sur cette page
Short: Instance Mastodon dédiée aux Toulousain·es.

Description:
一次創作なりきり専用インスタンス。

PBTの避難場所として作成されました。故の小規模です。ゆるっと身内向けの感覚で作られています。

固定の世界観等はありません。

創作C(版権作品の世界観内でのオリジナルキャラクターを除く)であれば、現代/ファンタジー/別の街・世界を問わず個々人の世界観にてご自由に交流ができます。

お好きに遊んで頂けますが、楽しく遊ぶ為に最低限のルールがあります。

そちらはお守り頂けますようお願いします。


About Non-entity
アナウンス・詳細・問合せページはこちらから。




Note

  • 【サーバー全体の画像総容量が10GBまで】の制限があります。

    画像の投稿にはご注意ください。これにはアイコン・ヘッダー等も全て含まれます。

    ご要望が多ければ画像倉庫を用意するかもしれません。

  • 当インスタンスはホスティングサービスHostdonを利用した個人運営インスタンスです。

    その為、Hostdonに準じて以下の影響があります。

    • 利用プランによる各種制限
    • 利用規約による当インスタンスのルール(変更含)
    • 障害があった際のインスタンスの動作




【アカウントの作成は承認制となっています】

現在承認制としています。人選の為ではありません。
申請理由の欄に簡単で構わないのでジャンルを入れて申請してください
（例：現代創作、現代ファンタジー、創作人外…等）

Description: We're back and we're about to make it everyone's problem
Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

About

This Mastodon server is dedicated to MastoAdmins from other instances.
Accounts here serve as a backup method to reach out to your Instance should it go down.

Special thanks to @macbiff for the idea!

Instructions

  1. Create an account with the Username similar to your Instance, eg. https://mastodon.sg will be @mastodonsg
  2. Provide your Instance URL as the reason to join, wait for approval.
  3. Setup your Profile, ie. Display Name, BIO, Avatar and Header
  4. Ensure that the first Label links back to your Instance Contact Username that is shown in the /about page.
  5. Also ensure that the URL is verified, any accounts which is not verified with the link back will be suspended.

    6. Server Info

    This server is hosted in Singapore.
    • 4 vCPU
    • 4GB Memory
    • BackBlaze B2 Media Storage
    • Cloudflare CDN, DDOS & WAF Protection
    • SMTP2GO Email Delivery
    • Hourly Backups locally and remotely

    Moderation

    Moderators reserve the right to suspend/restrict Users who go against the rules of this server.
    Please report any wrongdoings and we’ll do our best to investigate.

    Mastodon Covenant

    Our server meets the Mastodon Server Covenant.

    Community Support & Sponsor(s)

    We do not serve Ads or sell your data, we rely solely on your support and our Sponsor(s). You can support us by donating to Ko-Fi.

    We would like to thank our sponsor(s) for keeping the lights running.

    • Sohwatt LLP
Short: Members are MastoAdmins of other instances.

Description:
리데아 - 현실적 이상주의자들의 소셜 네트워크

리데아(RLidea)라는 표현은 현실적 이상주의(Realistic Idealism)의 줄임말로, 이상적인 가치나 목표를 추구하면서도 현실적인 조건과 제약을 고려하여 실제로 실행 가능한 방법을 모색하고 실현하려는 태도를 나타냅니다.

이 공간은 이와 같은 삶의 태도를 가진 사람들이 모이는 자유 주제 소셜 네트워크입니다.

Description:
Experience the Bay Area like never before with our Pixelfed instance. It's more than just a photo-sharing platform; it's a visual journey through every street, skyline, and sunset of our beloved Bay. Capture the moments that define your Bay Area - from its iconic landmarks to its hidden alleys - and share them with a community that cherishes every snapshot. Join us in weaving a vibrant tapestry of images that brings the Bay's story to life, one photo at a time.

Our full terms of use, policies, and code of conduct are available on the Community Hub. There you can read about corporate and organization accounts, updates from the team, and find instructions for filing DMCA Requests
Short: Discover and share the Bay Area's essence through your lens on our Pixelfed platform, where every photo tells a story of our vibrant community.

Description:
Welcome to Silicorn.social

Props to whoever made the joke first. Silicorn Valley is way better than "Silicon Heartland."

About

A Fediverse home for the Ohio Tech Community. If you're wondering if you belong in a tech community, you definitely do here! Not limited to Ohio residents or anything, but that's our core demographic.

Help Wanted

This instance was launched in September 2023 by one gal sitting on her couch. If you're interested in any of the following, reach out to @jess@silicorn.social

  • Helping to moderate the Silicorn.social community
  • Administration of a Mastodon server
  • Helping to craft rules / privacy policies / etc.

A quick note about NSFW content

We don't disallow it, but keep it under a Content Warning and don't make it the sole thing your account posts.

Logo

Our logo was graciously provided by @tarajdactyl@tech.lgbt under a CC BY-SA license.
Short: An instance for the Ohio Tech Community! Coders, ops, infosec, support, or anyone just kinda interested in tech is welcome here. A connection to Ohio (tech or otherwise) is ideal, not required.

Description:
Mise à jour le 18 août 2023.

ShoniTown sert des gens qui vivent et/ou travaillent dans le village Shaughnessy et ses environs, un quartier multiculturel et dense situé au centre-ville ouest de Montréal. Le village se trouve à l'est de la rue Atwater et à l'ouest de Guy, entre l'autoroute et la montagne.

La plupart d'entre nous dans le quartier utilisent des applis comme Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook (tous propriétés de la société états-unien Meta), WeChat (propriété de la société chinoise Tencent) et Telegram (propriété de deux frères billionaires cachottiers d'origine russe) pour parler à nos ami·e·s et à notre famille, s'informer sur ce qui se passe dans le monde et dans notre ville, et simplement se détendre en regardant des photos de chats. Mais ces services corporatifs, et d'autres, nous espionnent ; ils vendent les informations qu'ils obtiennent sur nous à des annonceurs, à des gouvernements et à quiconque peut payer. Ces applis sont conçues pour nous rendre dépendants d'elles, que ce soit pour les infos ou pour nos salaires---ce qui signifie également qu'il est déstabilisant de les voir s'effondrer ou choisir de se retirer du marché canadien en réponse à la législation issu d'Ottawa ou Québec.

ShoniTown éxecute avec Hometown, une version modifiée de Mastodon, que certain·e·s connaissent peut-être déjà. L'opérateur du serveur habite dans le quartier (et si tu apprécie ce plateforme, tu peux lui aider payer les factures). Il n'y a pas d'algorithme pour te faire regarder ton écran le plus longtemps possible, et tes données ne seront vendues à personne.

Bien que ShoniTown ne soit qu'un petit serveur, il est connecté à un réseau beaucoup plus vaste d'autres serveurs nommé « le fédivers ». La plupart de ces serveurs sont également gérés par des gens qui souhaitent que des nouvelles (et des photos de chats) puissent circuler librement, et de manière fiable, parmi les membres de leurs communautés.

English. Updated August 7, 2023.

ShoniTown is for people who live and/or work in and around Shaughnessy Village (east of Atwater and west of Guy, north of the highway and south of the mountain), a diverse and dense neighbourhood at the western end of downtown Montréal.

Most of us in the neighbourhood use applications like Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook (all owned by the U.S.-based corporation Meta), WeChat (owned by China-based Tencent), and Telegram (owned by two secretive billionaires of Russian origin) to talk to our friends and family, learn about what's happening in the world and in our neighbourhoods, and just relax and look at pictures of cats. But these corporate services, and others, spy on us; they sell the information they learn about us to advertisers, to governments, and to anyone else who can pay. These applications are designed to addict us and to make us dependent on them, whether for news or for business---which also means it's destabilizing when they fall apart or when they choose to pull out of the Canadian market in response to laws passed by Ottawa or Québec City.

ShoniTown runs on Hometown, a modified version of Mastodon, which some people may know about already. The server is owned and controlled by someone who lives in your neighbourhood (and if you like this service, you can help him pay the bills). There is no algorithm to keep you staring at your phone for as long as possible, and your information will not be sold to anyone.

Although ShoniTown is just one small server, it is connected to a much larger network of other servers called "the fediverse"; most of these servers are also run by people who want information (and cat photos) to be able to circulate freely, and reliably, among the members of their communities.

Legal stuff: The rules, written in French only, are definitive. Don't do anything fucked up.

2023年18月7日撰写、翻译并出版。译者：DeepL。您可以帮助改进本翻译！

ShoniTown是为居住和/或工作在（Shaughnessy Village）及其周边地区的人们而设的。该社区位于阿特沃特（Atwater）以东、盖伊（Guy）以西、高速公路以北、山以南。它是蒙特利尔市中心西端一个多样化的密集社区。

我们社区的大多数人都使用Instagram、WhatsApp、Facebook（均为美国 Meta 公司所有）、微信（为中国腾讯公司所有）和Telegram（为两位神秘的俄罗斯裔亿万富翁所有）等应用程序与亲朋好友聊天，了解世界和社区发生的事情，或者只是放松一下，看看猫咪的照片。但是，这些企业服务和其他服务都在监视我们；它们把了解到的我们的信息卖给广告商、政府和其他任何可以付钱的人。这些应用程序的目的是让我们上瘾，让我们依赖它们，无论是获取新闻还是开展业务--这也意味着，当它们分崩离析，或因渥太华或魁北克市通过的法律而选择退出加拿大市场时，就会造成不稳定。

ShoniTown在Hometown上运行，Hometown是Mastodon的改良版，有些人可能已经知道了。服务器的所有者和控制者都是住在你附近的人（如果你喜欢这项服务，你可以帮他付账单）。没有算法让你盯着手机看多久，就看多久。

虽然ShoniTown只是一个小服务器，但它与一个更大的由其他服务器组成的网络“联邦宇宙”相连；这些服务器大多也是由那些希望信息（和猫咪照片）能够在其社区成员之间自由、可靠地流通的人们运营的。
Short: ShoniTown est une instance Hometown pour le village Shaughnessy et ses environs au centre-ville ouest de Montréal.

Description:
Encuentra tu hogar en Social Cibernautas, una instancia de Mastodon creada y moderada por un grupo de amigos unidos por su pasión por los videojuegos, los memes y el arte. Aquí nos reunimos para compartir intereses, organizar eventos y disfrutar juntos. Un refugio seguro y respetuoso para todos, donde celebramos y valoramos la diversidad en todas sus formas.

Ayudas y donaciones

Social Cibernautas se ofrece sin ánimo de lucro. Eso no quita que mantener un servidor conlleve unos costes de mantenimiento, como la electricidad consumida o el pago de los dominios.

Si estás encantado con tu experiencia en la instancia y con los servicios que ofrece el equipo de soporte, puedes mostrar tu satisfacción por medio de una donación por Ko-fi y así ayudar a mantener y mejorar el servidor.

Ten en cuenta, todas las donaciones van destinadas exclusivamente a cubrir gastos de mantenimiento y mejora del servidor.

Contenido para Adultos (NSFW)

Los avatares de perfil y las imágenes de encabezado no pueden ser sexualmente explícitos, mostrar violencia ni contener imágenes de ese tipo.

El material sexualmente explícito debe tener una advertencia de contenido aplicada para marcarlo como sensible, de modo que la línea de tiempo local sea segura para el trabajo.

Accesibilidad

La única forma de ser una comunidad acogedora es siendo considerados con las personas que requieren herramientas como lectores de pantalla. Por esa razón:

  • Todos los toots de medios deben incluir texto alternativo (alt text).
  • Todas las hashtags de varias palabras deben de ir en formato #CamelCase.

Retención de Cuentas

En caso de que Social Cibernautas anuncie que planea dejar de operar el servidor, se cerrarán las inscripciones de nuevas cuentas y a los titulares de cuentas actuales se les darán seis meses de aviso anticipado para que puedan recibir ayuda para migrar sus cuentas a otro proveedor.

Equipo de Moderación

@lucasam - Administrador

Soporte

Puedes comunicarte con nosotros mencionando a @control o enviando un correo electrónico a soporte@cibernautas.club.

Estado del Servicio

En caso de problemas con el servidor, se proporcionarán actualizaciones aquí: cibernautas.instatus.com.
Short: Tu cosmos conectado en español, donde brilla la creatividad y crecen las conexiones. Un espacio seguro y respetuoso para todos, donde se celebra la diversidad.

Description:
2024/2/17　スパム対策のため、現在一時的に新規アカウント登録を制限し、連絡先メールアドレスを非公開にしております。 スパムが落ち着き次第新規登録の受け入れを再開いたしますのでお待ちください。 また、何かご連絡がある場合は@kokko1kg@umaikebab.xyzまでメンションしてください。

ケバブドンってなんぞ？

こんにちは。ケバブドン管理者のポメリと申します。
ケバブドンは「好きなことを好きなように話せる場所」を方針としたオタク向け汎用ゆるゆるサーバーです。
話題のテーマはございません。推しの話から今朝食べたビリヤニの話まで、利用規約の範囲内でなんでも自由に投稿することができます。

そもそもマストドンがよくわからないんだけど？

以下の記事が参考になります。
Mastodonを始めた人に贈る使い方と歩き方
筆者はおたどんというサーバーを運営されているもりかぷさんです。
おたどんには私もアカウントを持ってます。とてもとてもお世話になっている方です。

誰が登録できるの？

日本に住む18歳以上の良識のある方なら誰でも登録可能です。オタクじゃなくても大丈夫です。
Fediverseに興味はあるけどサーバーのルールとか色々あってどこにすればいいかわからん人、他のユーザーを気にせず喋り倒したい人、ポメリと同じサーバーにアカウントが欲しい人（いてくれ）などなど色んな方にご利用いただければ幸いです。

どんなことを投稿できるの？

基本的に「法律に触れなければなんでもオッケー」です。ただしケバブドンに限った話ではございませんが、自分の投稿が全世界に向けて発信されていることと一度投稿したものはインターネット上から完全に削除することは不可能であることを頭の片隅に置いておくといいですよ。
発言側の自由を尊重するため、閲覧者側は苦手な話題やユーザーに対して黙ってブロック・ミュートで対処をしてください。
また、発言者側も表立って言うのはアレな内容だと感じた際は公開範囲を限定したりNSFW・CWを設定すると良いと思います。

NSFWを設定しなきゃいけないときは？

次の要素を含む画像を投稿する際はNSFWを設定した上で、添付画像が成人向けコンテンツである旨及び含まれている要素について本文中に記載してください。
①全裸の人物
②女性もしくは女性に見える人物の上半身ヌード
③性器の露出
④四肢切断
⑤臓器の露出
また、性器の露出がある場合はモザイクやベタ塗り処理を施し該当箇所が隠れるようにしてください。
当サーバーのルールとしては上記のみの最低限なものとなっていますが、水着などの露出の多い服装や、性行為を連想させる表現（表情や体液など）を含む場合はNFSWを設定することを推奨しています。迷ったらつけましょう。

CWを設定しなきゃいけないときは？

小説など物語性のある（読み手が光景を詳しく想像することが可能と思われる）文章において、性描写や過度な暴力表現が含まれる場合はCWを設定した上で、本文が成人向けコンテンツである旨及び含まれている要素について注意書きに記載してください。

ルール違反しちゃったらどうなるの？

管理者がこっそり教えるので次回以降気をつけてください。
何度注意しても改善されず故意にルールを守っていないと感じたらアカウント停止の措置を取る場合もございます。

登録したらやることはある？

池袋駅に立ち寄る機会がございましたら北口エリアにあるナイスケバブでケバブを食べてください。
おすすめはケバブサンド辛口ソースです。ケバブ丼もあります。なお管理者の周りには辛口ソースを食べれない人が多いのでご自身の好みで選んでください。
管理者はナイスケバブと一切関係のないただの客です。

Description:
Welcome to Tulpa.Social!

This is a tulpa-friendly social network using mastodon.

Whether you are a tulpa, host, or other system, you're welcomed on this server.

If you like this site, please consider donating so we can keep the lights on 💡

(It costs $348/year to run)

What is a Tulpa?

A tulpa is an entity created in the mind, acting independently of, and parallel to your own consciousness. They are able to think, and have their own free will, emotions, and memories. In short, a tulpa is like a sentient person living in your head, separate from you. It’s currently unproven whether or not tulpas are truly sentient, but in this community, we treat them as such. It takes time for a tulpa to develop a convincing and complex personality; as they grow older, your attention and their life experiences will shape them into a person with their own hopes, dreams and beliefs.

From Tulpa.info
Short: Tulpa-friendly mastodon server

Description:
WAF.social

Über Uns

Dies ist eine Mastodoninstanz für alle Menschen, die sich verbunden mit dem Kreis Warendorf fühlen. Ob ansässig oder Sympathisant - jeder ist herzlich willkommen!

Verhaltensreglen

Auf nrw.social ist unsere Hauptrichtlinie: - "Seid nett zueinander und behandelt andere so wie ihr behandelt werden wollt"

Da das nicht immer funktioniert, haben wir einige Punkte zusammengestellt, die euch helfen unsere Moderationsrichtlinien zu verstehen. Wie schlussendlich entschieden und wie die Regeln endgültig ausgelegt werden ist Sache des WAF.social Teams! Sollte es zu Verstößen kommen behalten wir uns vor Toots, in schlimmen Fällen auch Accounts, zu löschen.

Wir tolerieren insbesondere nicht:

  • Belästigungen, Stalking, Doxing oder Dogpiling
  • Hassrede, Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Befürwortung
  • Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten
  • Gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
  • Verbreiten von Falschinformationen
  • Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten
  • In Deutschland illegale Inhalte
  • Sexueller Inhalt oder Gewaltdarstellungen
  • Nicht markierter Sexueller Inhalt von fremden Instanzen
  • Nicht markierte, automatisierte oder übermäßige Werbung und reine Werbe-Accounts
  • Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzern interagieren

Wenn du nicht mit jemandem interagieren möchtest oder einen seiner Beiträge nicht sehen möchtest, stehen dir Tools wie die Mute- und Blockfunktionen zur Verfügung. Bitte melde Verhalten, von dem du glaubst, dass es die Regeln verletzt. Das schließt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein. Achte auch darauf was du postest. Toots auf Mastodon sind erst einmal öffentlich und das Internet vergisst nie! Wenn du nicht möchtest, dass jeder deine Beiträge lesen kann, verwende die Privatsphäre-Einstellungen.

Föderation

WAF.social glaubt nicht an Zensur. Fediverse ist ein Netzwerkdienst und die Aussetzung der Fediverse mit einem anderen Server wird nur als letztes Mittel durchgeführt. Sollten aber einzelne Instanzen dauerhaft entgegen unserer Regeln handeln, können diese durch uns stummgeschaltet oder gesperrt werden. Haben wir deiner Meinung nach eine falsche Entscheidung getroffen? Dann kontaktiere uns!

Backups und Verfügbarkeit

Es werden tägliche Backups der Instanz angelegt. WAF.social wird privat in unserer Freizeit betrieben. Wir behalten uns vor, den Dienst jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gründen einzuschränken oder zu beenden. Sollte dies der Fall sein, geben wir uns Mühe, dies mindestens 3 Monate im Voraus bekannt zu geben.

Basierend auf

  • dem "About" von nrw.social
Short: Dies ist eine Mastodoninstanz für alle Menschen, die sich verbunden mit dem Kreis Warendorf im schönen Münsterland fühlen. Ob ansässig oder Sympathisant - jeder ist herzlich willkommen!

Description: the church of meow

Welcome to cyber.ms - the Mastodon instance for all Cyberpunks and Edgerunners out there!

cyber.ms is a partner instance of CORTEX IMPLANT, NIGHT CITY BAR, and TOTENTANZ, and is part of the OBEY THE SYSTEM network.

At cyber.ms, you'll find a home for all things related to the digital underground life, cyberculture, technology, privacy, hacking, and everything that makes the heart of a cyber-oriented individual beat faster.

Join our community, connect with like-minded individuals, and share your thoughts, projects, and discoveries in a safe and private environment. cyber.ms is the place where you can exchange freely and generate new ideas without compromising.

Check out the cool features of our instance, cyber.ms:

  • 🔍 Elasticsearch for enhanced search functionality
  • 💬 Translation via self-hosted LibreTranslate for seamless communication
  • 🐘 Mastodon with glitch-soc for a unique user experience
  • 💜 Self-hosted platform for increased control and privacy
  • 💾 Daily backups to ensure data security
  • 💎 Cybertoot-Button for quick and easy sharing
  • 📟 Cyberware compatible to enhance your digital experience
  • ⛔ Meta/Instagram blocked for a more focused and advertisement-free environment

Join cyber.ms and experience a truly cutting-edge Mastodon instance tailored for Cyberpunks and Edgerunners like you!

At cyber.ms, we embrace the spirit of cyberpunk and welcome all who identify with this vibrant and diverse culture. Our server thrives on the principles of innovation, privacy, and freedom – values that define the cyberpunk ethos.

However, in keeping with our commitment to create a secure and trusted environment for all members, access to cyber.ms is invitation-based. This approach ensures that our community remains cohesive, respectful, and in line with our shared cyberpunk values.

To join us, one needs to receive an invitation from an existing member. This process allows us to maintain a close-knit community where every member has been vouched for, fostering a secure space where ideas and conversations can flow freely without compromise.

We believe this method enhances the quality of interactions and strengthens the bonds within our community, making cyber.ms a unique and vibrant space for all cyberpunk enthusiasts.

If you see yourself as part of this digital frontier and are keen to join our ranks, we encourage you to connect with current members and express your interest. We look forward to potentially welcoming you into our midst and together pushing the boundaries of the cyberpunk realm.

The following is an essential, though not exhaustive, guide that outlines the behaviors contributing to an inclusive and safe environment for everyone. Failure to comply may lead to content removal, silencing, or suspension of accounts, strictly at the discretion of our instance administrators as outlined in our terms.

If someone's behavior is troubling you, please let us know. Your report will be treated with confidentiality.

  • Discriminatory behavior and content advocating oppression or hatred against marginalized groups are unacceptable. This includes targeting based on ethnicity, gender identity or expression, sexual identity or expression, physical characteristics or age, disability or illness, nationality, socio-economic status, or religious beliefs (to name some, but not limited to these).
  • Threatening behavior, stalking, and doxxing will not be tolerated.
  • Harassment in any form, including brigading, dogpiling, or unsolicited contact with a user who has requested disengagement, is prohibited.
  • Mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming of individuals, is forbidden.
  • Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism, or the promotion of National Socialism ideology is strictly banned.
  • Conspiracy narratives or reactionary myths condoning or leading to any of the aforementioned behaviors are not welcome.
  • Actions aimed at damaging this instance or its performance may result in immediate suspension.
  • Content deemed illegal in Germany will be expunged and could result in immediate account suspension.
  • We are committed to maintaining a spam-free environment. Spam, fraud, or theft, including undue cross-posts, unwanted commercial content, and crypto/NFT projects unaligned with our community ethos, is unwelcome. AI Art is permitted under specific conditions: it must be marked "unlisted," clearly labeled as AI Art, and non-commercial.

Any user found in violation of these rules may face a range of consequences, from a formal warning to account suspension or limited access. Our priority is to ensure a safe, spam-free environment for all members, and we are dedicated to upholding these standards diligently.

Here at cyber.ms, our digital commune thrives on respect, inclusivity, and mutual support. It is our collective responsibility to ensure that racism, discrimination, doxing, hate speech, and raids find no harbor in our space. Consequently, we have put measures in place, including blocking or muting certain instances, to preserve the integrity of our environment.

For legal and ethical reasons, we do not publish a list of blocked or limited instances. The decision to block or mute is carefully considered, largely because the block list may contain links to content that contravenes German and European law.

If you find yourself unable to connect with a friend and discover they are muted or blocked, and you believe this might be an oversight or unjust, we encourage open dialogue. Please reach out to @lyra with your concerns.

Description:
About Us

We're a (chosen) family of queer people: artists, nerds, philosophers, and lovers.

I'm new to this Mastodon thing. Help me!

Go check out fedi.tips and follow @feditips@mstdn.social - it's a great resource for finding your bearings.

If you're still confused, ask @amras! They'll be happy to show you around!

Timelines & Visibility

Here's how Mastodon timelines work:
TimelineWhat you see
HomeAny post from any user or hashtag you follow
LocalPublic posts from people on this server
FederatedPublic posts from outside this server - if someone on this server follows or boosts them.

Here's a flowchart that goes into more detail.

Local-only Posting

If you click the chain-link icon below your post, you'll be able to set it to "local-only". This means that your post will only be visible to other users on this server; it won't show up for anyone else.

If your mastodon client that doesn't have that option, you can add the :local_only: emoji to your post instead.

This is possible because we run the Hometown flavor of Mastodon.

Filters & Comfort

If you want to hide a post from your timeline, you can always select "Filter this post". If you'd like to hide all posts containing a specific phrase, you can go into Preferences>Filters to set up custom rules.

Searchability

Mastodon posts won't show up in search results, unless you use #hashtags.

Lists

A good strategy for using mastodon is to follow as many people as you can. Then, find special groups (like close friends, or writers, or photographers) and put them in custom Lists.

Donations

We don't have anything set up, but get in touch if you want to help cover hosting costs.

Emoji

This server uses selected emoji from these sources:

  • Blobhaj emoji, by heatherhorns, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
  • Meowmoji, licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
  • Pride Hearts by Maeve, licensed under the Basic License
  • The wrapped heart polyamorous pride flag, licensed under CC0
  • Pridemoji cats - shape licensed under Apache License 2.0; code licensed under the MIT License

and a small number of others, whose creator & licenses are difficult to track down.
Short: An invite-only server for a chosen family of queer people.

Description: Mastodon instance for the Damp gang. Currently running on a sad little server and funded by @_. If you want more performance/storage/toys, ask how you can help.

Impressum

Die Sächsische Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragte (SDTB) betreibt diese Mastodon-Instanz zum Zwecke der eigenen Presse- und Öffentlichkeitsarbeit. Andere öffentliche Stellen aus Sachsen können ebenfalls einen offiziellen Behörden-Account auf diesem Server erhalten. Sonstige öffentliche Stellen sind aufgrund der begrenzten Ressourcen der SDTB von dem Angebot vorerst noch ausgenommen.

Bitte berücksichtigen Sie außerdem, dass die SDTB keine Hochverfügbarkeit der Instanz garantiert und Nutzende selbst für ihre Inhalte verantwortlich sind.

Bei Interesse an der Einrichtung eines Zugangs oder Fragen/Meldungen zu Inhalten wenden Sie sich bitte an socialmedia@sdtb.sachsen.de.

Information gemäß § 5 Telemediengesetz und § 18 Medienstaatsvertrag

Sächsische Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragte
Dr. Juliane Hundert

Besucheradresse:
Sächsische Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragte
Devrientstraße 5
01067 Dresden

Postanschrift:
Sächsische Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragte
Postfach 11 01 32
01330 Dresden

Bitte verwenden Sie für Ihren Schriftwechsel nur die Postanschrift.

Telefon: +49 351 85471-101
Webseite: www.datenschutz.sachsen.de

E-Mail: post@sdtb.sachsen.de
Bei Fragen zu dieser Mastodon-Instanz können Sie sich auch per E-Mail an socialmedia@sdtb.sachsen.de wenden.

Öffentlicher Schlüssel (PGP) der Sächsischen Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragten (*.asc, 3,13 KB)

Hinweis zur E-Mail-Verschlüsselung:
Der Schlüssel der Sächsischen Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragten wurde am 20.04.2023 erneuert. Falls Sie bereits den vorherigen Schlüssel benutzt bzw. abgespeichert haben, ersetzen Sie diesen bitte.

Fingerabdruck: E208 1C36 DCFC F7AB AEF7 335A 617F 849E 63C3 BB05

Wenn Sie eine Antwort per verschlüsselter E-Mail wünschen, fügen Sie bitte Ihrer E-Mail Ihren öffentlichen Schlüssel bei. Alternativ können Sie eine Antwort auf dem Postweg erhalten. Dann geben Sie bitte Ihre postalische Adresse an.

Vertretungsberechtigter

Bernhard Bannasch, Stellvertreter der Sächsischen Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragten

Hinweis zur Finanzierung

Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird mitfinanziert durch Steuermittel auf der Grundlage des vom Sächsischen Landtag beschlossenen Haushaltes.

Netiquette – Verhaltensregeln auf social.sachsen.de

Selbstverständlich müssen auch auf der Mastodon-Instanz der SDTB die gesetzlichen Vorschriften und allgemeinen Nutzungsbedingungen eingehalten werden. Das Diskutieren und der Austausch mit anderen Nutzerinnen und Nutzern klappt am besten mit einem freundlichen und respektvollen Umgangston. Nicht erwünscht sind deshalb Beiträge, die den nachfolgenden Grundsätzen nicht genügen:

  • Beleidigungen, Verleumdungen und üble Nachrede
  • Provokationen sowie Beiträge mit vulgären, gewaltverherrlichenden, diskriminierenden, rassistischen, antisemitischen, sexistischen, hasserfüllten und/oder gesetzeswidrigen Äußerungen oder Inhalten
  • Werbung, kommerzielle Beiträge und Spam
  • Aufrufe zu Kampagnen, Kundgebungen oder Spenden
  • Beiträge mit fehlerhaften oder fehlenden Quellen- oder Urheberangaben, sofern diese im Zuge eines sachgerechten Beitrags geboten sind
  • Beiträge mit Verletzung der Rechte Dritter
  • Drohungen, und Aufrufe zu Gewalt
  • Pornografie und Obszönitäten
  • Kommentare und Links zu externen Websites, die sich nicht mit dem Thema des ursprünglichen Beitrags beschäftigen
  • Beiträge mit schutzwürdigen personenbezogenen Daten
  • Beiträge in anderer als deutscher oder englischer Sprache, da die SDTB sonst deren erforderliche inhaltliche Kontrolle nicht möglich ist

Alle Beiträge, die die Netiquette verletzen, werden gegebenenfalls auch ohne Angabe von Gründen verborgen oder gelöscht. Personen können auch dauerhaft aus der Diskussion ausgeschlossen bzw. blockiert werden.
Short: Dies ist die Mastodon-Instanz der Sächsischen Datenschutz- und Transparenzbeauftragten (SDTB).

Description:
The (unofficial) Atheopagan Network is a service for atheopagans, and other science-based pagan naturalists to share information, resource,and memes, with the larger community.

atheopagan.net is a gift and act of love to the community as a space to connect free of corporate surveillance. There are no marketing algorithms on Mastodon. Content is curated, distributed, moderated, and maintain by participants of the Fediverse, an organic network of independent interconnected opensource systems.

This instance is not officially affiliated, managed, or administrated by The Atheopagan Society. All views and opinions expressed are those of individuals and do not reflect the views and opinions of The Atheopagan Society.

What is Atheopaganism?

Atheopaganism is a naturalistic religion comprised of principles, practices and observances celebrating life and the passage of the seasons in fun, creative, and meaningful ways. Our path is free of belief in literal personal gods, the supernatural, or other scientifically unsupported concepts.

You can learn more here:
The Atheopagan Society
Mark Green's Blog

Mastodon & The Fediverse

Mastodon's interface is clean and elegant with functions similar to other popular social media platforms. Unlike other platforms, it does not harvest or sell your data to companies for feeding marketing algorithms that push content they want you to see. Instead your feed grows as you follow others, and expands based on the interests of those you follow. This makes it more private and secure than other social networks.

Those new to Mastodon often comment about the difference in overall culture as compared to the big name platforms. Even though there is problematic behavior as is found on any social media platform, Mastodon allows more flexibility for community moderation. There is a cross instance culture of moderation that acts quickly to questionable content such as pedophiles, fascism, racism, and down right bigoted nasty people.

Why the atheopagn.net instance?

People are becoming more suspicious and hesitant to interact on popular platforms because of increased global legal scrutiny of these platform's privacy practices. Atheopagan.net was created as a place for atheopagans & pagan naturalists to be in community without having to compromise their digital privacy.

This is not intended to replace the communities that have grown and thrived on other platforms, but to provide an alternative space away from those platforms. Thus, it intended to be a small group. However, a smaller group can foster more meaningful social media experience, which is why many people have made the switch to Mastodon and other federated services.

Who's on Mastodon?

You can find a variety of interesting people and content to follow on Mastodon. There are entertainers like George Take and Stephen Fry; Activists like Greta Thunberg; and many scientists, artists, journalists, academics, and all walks of life including pagans and witches. The list grows daily!

How it works and how to use it

Mastodon is a microblog where you make short posts of text limited to 500 characters, upload pictures, and share videos from places like YouTube, PeerTube, and Dailymotion. Like other social media, you can share posts (boosting), like content, (favorites), and save content to read later (bookmarks).

An instance, like this one, is an independent server, and there is no central company directing development. Instead many people across the globe work on the program. Anyone can take that code and create a variation (called a fork).

This means there are many instances you can choose to join. Some are focused on specific topics, and others are more general. You can share and follow content from any instance and view it from your account. This means individuals and communities have more control over the content that is circulated. Check out the following links to learn more.

Fedi.Tips An Unofficial Guide to Mastodon & The Fediverse
fediverse.info The bespoke fediverse guide
video@TILvids Mastodon in 180 Seconds

Advantages

  • The volume of content is less overwhelming then on other platforms.
  • You can fine tune the type and amount of content on your personal feed.
  • Content is presented in a linear timeline
  • You have more anonymity and control over you personal data
  • Communal moderation minimizes bad actors and spam
  • Free of advertisement
  • The platform does not fallow you around the internet.
  • Decentralized

Disadvantages

  • Userbase is not as large as other platforms
  • Sharing and following content across instances works a little differently
  • Requires you to find interesting content on your own
  • Slightly different lingo than other platforms
  • Decentralized

Browser Extensions

StreetPass Firefox | Chrome
discover who has a Mastodon account when surfing the web

Simplified Federation Firefox
simplifies following Mastodon accounts across The Fediverse

Share to Mastodon Firefox
easy way to share links and tabs on Mastodon

Mastodon Link Chrome
like Share to Mastodon but for Chrome

Graze Firefox | Chrome
link sharing for both Firefox and Chrome

Description:
Last updated Oct 10, 2023

Terms of Service

This document lays out the ground rules for participating in the opensocial.media community. It is intended to protect all members of our community from harassment and to ensure that our community is as welcoming and inclusive as possible. This is a working document, so opensocial.media may amend this ToS to better meet these goals in the future.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of opensocial.media; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Fake news, anti-vaccination spam

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Casteism or advocation of casteism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism or White Nationalism

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person’s demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user’s access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Goals

  • Provide a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, political affiliation, or other similar characteristic.
  • Create a supportive community, where people freely share their passions and are excited and positive about each other’s successes.

Non-Goals

While it’s important to know what opensocial.media is, it’s just as important to understand what we’re not. opensocial.media is not:

  • A free speech zone. mastaudon.org is a community with specific — and high — standards of behavior. If you would like to exercise your full free speech rights, you can do so somewhere else; while on mastaudon.org, you should agree to follow the community rules set out in this ToS.
  • An advocacy space. There are many important, controversial and political issues; and advocating for what you believe is important. However, opensocial.media is not the place for that advocacy. Even correct views can violate our ToS.

Reporting Violations

If you notice a toot that violates this code of conduct, please report it. It is easy to assume that someone else has already reported a toot, but it is easy for everyone to feel that way and no one to report the toot.

Catch-all

The moderation team will always take a pragmatic approach to every report they receive - if they feel that a problematic Toot isn’t explicitly called out in this ToS, yet is inappropriate for opensocial.media, the Toot will likely be removed and the member will be dealt with appropriately

Description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server
bite the pillow

About Pubble

Pubble is an esteemed platform that streamlines and optimizes the publishing process, offering a unified system for editorial, sales, design, and administration, accessible anytime and anywhere. We facilitate the creation of a broad array of publications, including newspapers, magazines, websites, and apps, embracing both print and online mediums. Pubble takes pride in supporting publishers of all sizes, and now, we’re taking a step further into the fediverse with Pubble.Social.

Pubble.Social is dedicated to creating a respectful and inclusive environment where publishers and their readers can interact, share, and explore the federated space of Mastodon.

Funding and Support

Pubble.Social is funded and supported by Pubble. We aim to keep access to the platform as barrier-free as possible for publishers of all sizes.

Welcome to Pubble.Social: Streamlining Publishing in the Fediverse!
Pubble simplifies, enhances, and streamlines publishing with a unified system for editorial, sales, design, and administration.

Description:
FreeSewing is an open source library for parametric design, with a specific focus on sewing patterns. It is maintained by Joost De Cock (that's me, FreeSewing's benevolent dictator) with contributions from various people, and financially supported by the FreeSewing patrons.

Community Standards

When you engage with the FreeSewing community, please remember the following simple rules:

Be nice

We will not accept comments that are either offensive in themselves or clearly offensive to others.

Please avoid obscenities and other insulting language, and show respect for fellow users, public figures and the fundamental principles we hopefully all share.

Without wanting to be exhaustive, that means no racism, xenophobia, calls to violence, discrimination based on religion, ethnic origin, gender, age, body shape, language, ….

Don’t spam

You are free to use freesewing.social for your personal account on the fediverse and talk about things that are not related to FreeSewing. However, we would appreciate it if you refrain from posting advertisements or spam.

(I appreciate that this is open to interpretation, so as a guiding principle steer clear of anything that reeks of an effort at bulk monetization)

Don’t get us in trouble

Content that is defamatory, unlawful, or puts us in legal jeopardy is also against the rules.

Moderation

This Mastodon instance is managed by joost, and a small number of trusted friends help with moderation. This is the moderation team and we will enforce the rules as outlined in our code of conduct.

We rely on the community to report content or behaviour that goes against our values.

Thanks in advance for helping us make this a place where everyone can feel welcome.
Short: The home of FreeSewing on the fediverse. Open to the wider FreeSewing community.

Description:
Contact Us

  • Technical Support: help@social.example
  • Press/Media Enquiries: media@social.example
  • Legal/Regulatory/Compliance: legal@toot.wales

Welcome to Example.Social!

To ensure a safe environment for all, we've established some key rules and guidelines, especially around content moderation.

Content Moderation Policies

Our instance prohibits:

  • Illegal content as per EU laws and local regulations.
  • Infringement of intellectual property rights or personal privacy.

Moderation Tools and Measures:

  • Content Warnings (CW): Users must apply CWs to sensitive content to inform others before viewing.
  • Account Isolation: In cases of severe rule violations, we may isolate accounts. Isolation means that your ability to interact with others on the platform will be restricted.
  • Suspension: Accounts that repeatedly or severely violate our rules may be suspended from our service. We reserve the right to apply a temporary or permanent suspension

Changes to Terms and Conditions

We commit to notifying you of any significant changes to these rules. Updates may be communicated through platform announcements or in our Notice Updates.

Fair and Objective Enforcement

We aspire to make all content moderation decisions diligently and objectively. To this end, we have regard to the fundamental rights of our users (such as the right to free expression and media pluralism) and the principle of proportionality.

We rely on community moderation and human review.

Language Availability

These rules are published in [languages offered], ensuring accessibility for all users across the Member States we serve.

Contact and Feedback

For questions, clarifications, or to report violations, please reach out to us at [contact information]. We're dedicated to maintaining a positive and respectful space for everyone in our community.

About This Sandbox

A sandbox service for content moderation and trust & safety experiments. Members can interact with fictional accounts to practice moderation and management activities.

If you are a current moderator and would like an account on this server to play in the sandbox, please register and tell us your existing account with moderator privileges in the "Reason to join".

All incoming reports are assumed to be tests and are ignored.

If you need to reach someone regarding this service please contact @jaz@mastodon.iftas.org

Join the IFTAS chat: https://matrix.to/#/#space:matrix.iftas.org

Learn more about IFTAS: https://about.iftas.org
Short: A free sandbox service for content moderation and trust & safety experiments.
