Description:
the what and the who?

"diaspora.im" is glitch-soc (a mastodon fork) fediverse server, envisioned as a space for the diaspora - the displaced - the sidelined - the marginalised.

the name of the server is a reference to the dictionary meaning of 'diaspora':

diaspora | dʌɪˈasp(ə)rə | noun the dispersion or spread of a folks from their original homeland

it is also a riff on the notion that non-white folks are necessarily displaced from the "common" or "dominant" culture. and while we prioritise the comfort and safety of black, disabled, queer folk, we welcome all of you here.

the why

the online digital community is a hostile place for us. the fediverse is a constant hotbed of bigotry at any given moment. my goal with this space is to provide an option for us. an option that is not white-centric, not cis- or hetero- centric, and not abled-centric. i am black, queer, and disabled myself so feel comforted in the fact that out of my own sense of self-preservation will come an approach to managing this server with sanity, safety, accessibility, and comfort at the forefront. we do not have enough options. diaspora.im is one more option.

how do i join?

click the "Create account" button and enter your sign-in details. you will be asked to confirm your account via email. please use a valid email address that you will continue to have access to. this is the primary way that you will retain access to your account.

once you have confirmed you email address, you will be asked to enter a reason for joining. all accounts require approval on this server and a reason is required. let us know a little about you and why you want to be here. be aware that there will be a waiting period while we process your join request and allow for some time for that process to complete.

note that we prioritise black, disabled, queer folk here. (see "the what and the who" above.)

moderation policies

we are a proactively moderated server. we take swift and decisive action with reports and pre-emptively issue blocks and suspensions liberally to ensure a minimal amount of the harassment we often get from the rest of the world.

here on diaspora.im, we are explicitly anti-imperialist, anti-fascist, and anti-capitalist and we subscribe to the following political philosophies:

  • Black liberation
  • gender expansiveness
  • disability justice
  • fat liberation
  • class warfare
  • prison abolition

any actions taken by users that align with white supremacy, antiblackness, colorism, ableism, transmisia, misogyny, fat hate, gender binarism, or cissexism/heterosexism will be addressed. warnings, post deletion, silencing, and suspension are all on the table when it comes to moderation.

we started out with thebad.space blocklist export at heat rating 50% because we wanted to make sure we filter out the problematic instances right off the bat. i ( @fyrfli ) personally vetted the list before importing it to confirm the domains on the list were domains we wanted blocked.

our blocklist will be maintained by hand in the immediate future by making instance block decisions on a case by case basis. that might change once thebad.space has matured fully.

whole instance blocks will be communicated to the community with at least 30 days notice.

sibling instances!

these are instances whose mod/admin teams we work very closely with, given our shared vision and goals for building a safer fediverse for marginalised groups and oppressed peoples. think of us as different houses in the same neighbourhood.

if you've used akkoma, you would recognise this as a kind of similar to bubble instances.

these instances are as follows:

  • artcrimes.gay - donate here
  • h-i.social - donate here
  • blackqueer.life - donate here

best practices for accessibility

some of our users are disabled (for example, 1 in 4 black american adults), and to make sure that everyone is provided with the tools they need to participate fully in our community, here are some collective habits that we should adopt:

  • alt-text your images. if you are not in a position to do so, please use #AltTextHelp and someone from the community should be able to help and provide it. another tag you can use,#ALT4me, lets you ask for an alt text for your image and #ALT4you or #ALT4U can be used in the comments to indicate to the op that you've written an alt text for them to add to their image
  • avoid using too many emojis in a row. example: putting 3 smiley faces in a row, or 60 red flags. screen readers do not handle them well
  • use PascalCase for hashtags e.g. #AltTextHelp
  • when sharing a link, provide a brief description of where the link directs to
  • use captions in uploaded videos

(these best practices were inspired by disabled.social via bql)

a note on privacy and security

the privacy policy is the stock one that comes with glitch, so here is a bit of additional info:

  • we only retain data that we absolutely need to log you in and let you post and interact
  • we will not retain anything if you delete your account outside of details that may linger as a result of filing a report. the internal moderation page will show your username but crossed out
  • we don't control other servers however so we can't control or even know if they're not doing iffy shit, whether they mean to or not - one of the downsides of federation is that once it leaves our server, it's pretty much out of our hands.
  • we do not allow scraping or archiving, however we have little power to stop such things. remember, this is the internet. nothing is private really.

(this section shamelessly adapted from the artcrimes.gay code of conduct - thanks evel)

server details

this server is running glitch-soc, a fork of mastodon, using the managed hosting provider, fedi monster. you can see more information by going to their page, but daily backups and regular updates are included.

if you would like to help sustain the server, you can donate via liberapay or ko-fi or contribute to the collective.

at the moment, i ( @fyrfli ) am the only person on the administration team but that will change in the near future as we grow.

final thoughts

i am an open book. you can ask me anything. i try to think of myself as approachable and i expend extra effort to address any and all concerns in a measured manner. please feel free to @ me, dm me, email me, or whatever if you have any concerns, feedback, questions, etc.

(adapted from bql - thanks eva)
Short: this space is envisioned as a space for the diaspora ... the displaced; the sidelined; the marginalised. an option for BiPOC folks on the fediverse to move out of wholly white-controlled instances.

Description:
Header image: Saabe Dream by Mishiikenh Kwe Used with permission ©Mishiikenh Kwe https://www.instagram.com/mishiikenhkwe

This instance is for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only. To register here you MUST enter a reason at the 'Reason to register' prompt. Failure to do this WILL result in your registration rejection. You MUST read and agree to this entire document.

Mvskoke Nation citizens own, administer and moderate TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances. Allies also moderate Allies.* instances

If you have any official questions, reach out to one of the admins:
@Yehuda@TurtleIsland.social or @Tzipporah@TurtleIsland.social.

Welcome to Allies.social!

TurtleIsland.* instances are for North American Native/Indigenous only
  • TurtleIsland.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Dec 2022.
  • TurtleIsland.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • TurtleIsland.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • TurtleIsland.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Sep 2023.
Allies.* instances are for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only
  • Allies.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Oct 2023.
  • Allies.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • Allies.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • Allies.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Jan 2024.

Fediverse?

The Fediverse is a social media network that uses the ActivityPub protocol. TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances, as well as other applications/network nodes (instances) are connected and communicate with each other via the Fediverse (ActivityPub) network. You only need to join one instance to like, follow, post, view and share content with the thousands of other instances in the Fediverse.

Why?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful environments for North American Native/Indigenous people and their allies to be in community and safe spaces.

  • Ultimately, we are helping to build an Indigenized social network.
  • We stand with our people.
  • We know and support their struggles.
  • We moderate to Indigenous standards not colonial standards.

Who? Where?

TurtleIsland.* instances accept user registrations from North American Native/Indigenous people only.

  • TurtleIsland.social user registrations are available through the 'Create Account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.social/about
  • TurtleIsland.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://TurtleIsland.rocks/registration
  • TurtleIsland.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://TurtleIsland.buzz
  • TurtleIsland.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.video

Allies.* instances accept user registrations from allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only.

  • Allies.social user registrations are available through the 'Create account' portal at https://Allies.social/about
  • Allies.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://Allies.rocks/registration
  • Allies.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://Allies.buzz
  • Allies.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://Allies.video

How much?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are 100% free. We will never charge fees or pressure anyone for donations. All expenses are paid for by the administrators and donations.

If you'd like to help with Turtle Island expenses:

  • https://ko-fi.com/TurtleIsland
  • https://cash.app/$Yehuda1491
  • https://venmo.com/Yehuda1491

If you receive Pension/Social Security/Disability or less please don't. But if you can help Native/Indigenous Fediverse instances thrive and grow, it would be much appreciated.

What?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are small/medium sized instances due to our specialized nature.

  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances will never be large general purpose instances and will be Indigenized as much as possible.
  • We are federated with 99% of the Fediverse but use no relays in order to maximize content relevant to our users.

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances believe 100% in true Native/Indigenous Nation sovereignty, physical and digital LandBack. We reject calls to assimilate into the nearly all white culture Fediverse. The whole ghettoization theory is white supremacy garbage.

Blocked instances

We use the Oliphant Tier 0 blocklist, which blocks the majority of the bad actors without getting crazy aggressive. If you see anything blocked or not blocked that you believe is in error, let us know.

  • All TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances block Threads.

Commitment

TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social are committed to 3 months notice in the extremely unlikely event we should decide to pull the plug. All other instances are committed to 30 days notice.

Backup and Maintenence

  • TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social configuration files, media and database storage are backed up daily to a remote secure object storage. All other instances are backed up weekly with a full virtual server snapshot.
  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances may have unscheduled maintenance or upgrade events. We have over 99% uptime availability.

Data, Image and File Warranties/Guarantees

Even though there are regular backup procedures, there are no data, image and file warranties/guarantees. Images may be compressed or resized. It is user responsibility to keep copies of all data, images and files uploaded to or created on Turtle Island instances.

Turtle Island Rules

1. These are Indigenous instances.

  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account(s) termination.
  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

2. We can't stress this enough - Absolutely no racism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, pro-genocide, pro-ethnic cleansing, pro-terrorism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. 95%+ of our issues fall in this category; we take this seriously.

  • Any infraction of this category from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account termination.
  • Any infraction of this category from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

Extra clarity current events note:

River to Sea is ethnic cleansing and anti-Semitic. Promoting settlements in the West Bank is ethnic cleansing and Islamophobic. It doesn't matter how many misinformed or disingenuous articles you read or who counsels you otherwise, these acts cannot be sanitized. The majority of the Jewish population will see River to Sea as ethnic cleansing and very anti-Semitic, and the majority of the Palestinian population will see settlement building in the West Bank as ethnic cleansing and very Islamophobic. These are just a couple examples that come up frequently.

You can criticize the Israeli or Palestinian governments all day and night long if you wish, but the moment you add anti-Semitic or Islamophobic material to your post, the whole post becomes anti-Semitic or Islamophobic.

Turtle Island instances officially support a two state solution in Israel/Palestine as the only realistic and fair solution for the Israeli and Palestinian peoples. Both peoples are factually Indigenous to the region by the same standards that apply to North American Indigenous peoples. If this is not clear to you, you need to go back to non-propaganda history study.

If any part of this current events note makes you chafe, Turtle Island may not be the place for you. Peace and co-existence are the only acceptable goals on Turtle Island.

3. Advertising authentic Indigenous products and genuine Indigenous businesses is allowed and encouraged.

  • Advertising fake inspired appropriated products by non-Indigenous businesses is not allowed.

4. We strongly support and encourage Mutual Aid with #IndigenousMutualAid, #SettlerSaturday and #MutualAid hashtags.

  • Requests for mutual aid must be on your original post. Requests cannot be made in unsolicited comments or private messages to other users.
  • Posts cannot tag other users, especially bulk user lists.
  • Inappropriate hashtag bombing is not allowed.
  • Guideline violations could result locally in post deletion or user suspension, or remotely in user or instance defederation.

5. No Native/Indigenous gatekeeping of accounts on Native/Indigenous instances.

  • If you have an issue with the Indigeneity of an account on an Indigenous instance, DM or email the admins and/or moderators of the instance.
  • Regardless of the opinions and seriousness of this subject or what instance a user of questionable Indigeneity may be on, immature and abusive posts, dogpiling, parody or sock puppet accounts, etc. are part of a vibe we do not want coming here from Twitter and are expressly not allowed.
  • None of this is to say the Pretendian subject is forbidden, but keep it mature please.

6. Promotion of Right-Wing, Conservative, Republican, Fascist, Nazi or other equally stupid political views is not allowed.

  • If moral deficiency is your inclination, go somewhere else.

7. This goes against Turtle Island's preferences, but in acquiescence to Fediverse community standards, NSFW content requires Content Warnings (CWs). Nudity, porn or gratuitous violence requires CWs. Turtle Island does not require CWs for other types of content. If you are in doubt, please ask. Generally speaking though, if you are easily offended, Turtle Island may not be the place for you.

8. Any other issues not covered by these rules will be settled by the sole determination of the administrators or moderators.
Short: Native/Indigenous owned and operated for Allies of Native, Indigenous, BIPOC, and other marginalized people. Allies.social is ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful.

Instance Mamutovo byla vytvořena pro běžné uživatele, kteří touží po klidném prostředí, ve kterém mohou svobodně sdílet své myšlenky.

Mamutovo je prostředím, ve kterém není místo pro urážky, hanobení, diskriminaci či šíření lži. To zaručují pravidla naší instance.

Co vám může Mamutovo nabídnout?

  1. prostředí pro vaše myšlenky, nápady či radosti
  2. vždy aktuální verzi Mastodonu
  3. překladač obsahu DeepL
  4. fulltextové vyhledávání
  5. řádný dozor od lidských a rozumných moderátorů
  6. pravidla moderování obsahu vycházející z Netikety a zákonů ČR

Description:
Operated by: Digital Dimension, the driving force behind MI-SOPORTE.online. We are dedicated to building strong digital communities and empowering businesses, professionals, and content creators in the evolving digital landscape.

Moderation: Our server is moderated by a dedicated team that ensures a safe, respectful, and professional environment. We adhere to strict guidelines to maintain the quality and integrity of discussions.

Funding: The server is funded by MI-SOPORTE.online memberships and contributions from Digital Dimension. Our aim is to keep the platform sustainable, ad-free, and focused on providing value to our community.

Welcome to our Mastodon community! 🌐

Community Focus: This platform is an extension of MI-SOPORTE.online, aiming to foster collaboration, learning, and growth. We encourage members to share insights, ask questions, and collaborate on projects.

Tools & Resources: As a member, you have access to a plethora of digital tools and resources from MI-SOPORTE.online. From web3 and blockchain to e-commerce and digital marketing, we've got you covered.

Trusted Integrators: Digital Dimension is one of the trusted integrators, but our community is vast. Connect with experts from various fields and learn from the best.

Academia de Tecnología: We're not just about tools; we're about education. Engage with our academy, learn new skills, and stay ahead in the digital world.

Open to All: Whether you're a business owner, a professional, a content creator, or someone curious about the digital realm, there's a place for you here.

Remember, this is a space for constructive discussions, knowledge sharing, and collaboration. Let's make the digital world more accessible and inclusive for everyone! 🚀
Short: Digital Dimension powers this server, part of MI-SOPORTE.online. A hub for businesses, professionals, and creators in the digital realm. Join our thriving community!

Description:
Welcome to PhotoLovers.net, a vibrant haven within the expansive Fediverse, a network teeming with over 14 million users. Here, the art of photography is not just celebrated but truly lived. In this digital space, every click of the camera is an ode to the magic of capturing moments, transforming fleeting seconds into timeless treasures.

At PhotoLovers.net, we understand that photography is more than just a technical skill—it's a form of art, an avenue of pleasure, and a source of boundless fun. It's about seeing the world not just as it is, but as it could be, through the lens of creativity and passion.

Our community, nestled within the diverse and vibrant ecosystem of the Fediverse, is a mosaic of diverse perspectives, united by a common love for seizing instants and exploring the world. Whether you're an amateur just starting out, a seasoned professional, or simply someone who appreciates the beauty in a well-captured image, you're in the right place.

Here, we encourage you to share your vision, learn from the insights of others, and engage in the joy of photography. From breathtaking landscapes to the subtle nuances of everyday life, each photo tells a story, each shutter click a testament to the power of observation and expression.

Explore galleries filled with stunning visuals, participate in challenges that spark your creativity, and engage in discussions that deepen your understanding and appreciation of this captivating art form.

Being part of the Fediverse, PhotoLovers.net offers the unique opportunity to connect with a vast, decentralized network of photography enthusiasts and creators. Here, every member is both a learner and a teacher, a viewer and a creator. So, whether you're here to capture an instant or to observe the world through the eyes of other enthusiasts, you are not just welcome—you're an integral part of a much larger story.

Dive into the world of PhotoLovers.net, where every photo is an adventure, and every moment is an opportunity to create something eternal. Embrace the vastness of the Fediverse and let your passion for photography soar.
Short: Taking a photo means capturing a moment and making it everlasting. Photography is art, it's enjoyment, it's fun. In the vast network of the Fediverse, this space welcomes everyone who loves to seize an instant and see the world through the eyes of fellow enthusiasts. Welcome to PhotoLovers.net, your gateway to over 14 million users sharing your passion.
Small personal mastodon instance

Description:
Music.Social is for anyone who loves music, or is a musician (or both!).

It's designed as a place to share our passion for music, in a decentralised social media environment which is: -

  • not controlled by big corporations;
  • doesn't make money by harvesting your data;
  • carries no advertising;
  • isn't driven by dodgy algorithms.

The service has been built, and is hosted and paid for, by Amazing, the British company which specialises in finding and promoting new musical talent. Amazing makes no money out of Music.Social and is not controlling the content.

amazing.radio | thisisamazing.tv
Short: Welcome to music.social

Description: Cotton Candy Café

Eimsbüttel.social ist ein hyperlokales soziales Netzwerk. Hier kann es vor allem um Dinge in Eimsbüttel und um Eimsbüttel herum gehen.

Vorläufiger Betrieb

Description:
Welcome!

This is the Mastodon server of the Institute of Nursing Science (INS), Department of Public Health (DPH) at the Medical Faculty of the University of Basel.

https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch is an online community to connect INS staff, students, alumni and collaborators with the fediverse. Registration requires approval by INS admins. If you are unsure whether this applies to you, register here and we will let you know. If you do not belong to the group of people mentioned above and want to join a Mastodon server, here are some common alternatives:

Mastodon Social

Swiss Social

Fedi Science

Visit Join Mastodon to get more suggestions for Mastodon instances to join.

To get started, follow these steps:

Create an account

First you need to register here to get your account. After you agree to some basic rules and you have confirmed your email, you are ready.

Bookmark or get an app

You probably like to make yourself at home with either bookmarking:

https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch

or trying out some apps:

Ice cubes (MaOS/iOS)

Metatext (iOS)

Ivory (iOS)

Tusky (Android)

AndStatus (Android)

Elk (Web client)

Follow others

Thousands of scientists are active on Mastodon, and you can follow all of them. It does not matter which instance (server) they are on. Mastodon has no algorithm that determines what is shown on your home timeline. Follow generously to populate this timeline. The federated timeline shows all posts of people people on https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch are following. This is why it is important to follow others. When you newly follow someone, you will not see any or very few posts. Mastodon does not backtrack past posts of people. They will pop-up if you follow them and they post ('toot') something.

Boosts and #hashtags

Mastodon does not have 'likes', so boosts are a great way to get visibility for a post. Also, remember to use hashtags in your posts, as these also help to increase visibility. You can follow specific #hashtags. If you see a #hashtag in a post you are interested in, click on it and follow the hashtag. This way you find also posts from people you do not follow.

Groups

Similar like #hashtags you can follow groups, which connects posts of people using the group's name. For example, if you follow @nursingresearch@chirp.social and use the hashtags #nursres #nursingresearch, you can easily share your posts with people who follow @nursingresearch@chirp.social. This works for all sorts of topics. Visit chirp.social or https://a.gup.pe/ to find more groups or to create your own.

Relays

As https://mstdn.nursing.unibas.ch is small we use relays to identify interesting posts across the fediverse. Find below a list of #hashtags we currently use. If you feel we need to add others, please let us know.

Currently used hashtags: Science, rstats, phdlife, nursing, impsci, epi, ebm, ScienceMastodon, AcademicMastodon, pflege, pflegewissenschaft, stem, PhD, PublicHealth, NursingHomes, Oncology, PhDChat, AcademicChatter, Implementation, workforce, OlderPeople, ImplementationScience, CH, Schweiz, BL, BS, Basel
Short: Mastodon Server of the Institute of Nursing Science @UNIBAS
topic: Mastodon Server of the Institute of Nursing Science @UNIBAS

Description: Beschreibung

The Digital Pioneers Social Club ist eine Initiative von 12 Gründungsmitgliedern, die in Zeiten einer immer schnelleren, komplexeren und teils auch unfreundlicheren Online-Welt auf die Anfänge des Internets zurückblicken.

Wir gehören zur letzten Generation ohne Internet und zur ersten Generation, die das World Wide Web betreten hat.

Wir haben den Eindruck, dass das Internet irgendwo falsch abgebogen ist. Darüber wollen wir reden und schreiben. Und überlegen, ob und wie wir das nochmal neu machen können.

Wir machen das im Fediverse, weil es dezentral, werbefrei und unabhängig ist. Und ein bisschen kompliziert - und auch irgendwie oldschool.

Wo Ihr uns findet

digitalpioneers.club

Unter der URL digitalpioneers.club findet Ihr unser Blog, The Digital Pioneers Times. Hier erzählen wir uns und Euch Weißt-Du-noch-Geschichten und schreiben auf, welche Ideen und Erkenntnisse uns bei unseren Gesprächen im Fediversum gekommen sind.

digitalpioneers.social

Unter der URL digitalpioneers.social findet Ihr unseren Salon im Fediversum. Stellt Euch einen gemütlichen Raum mit offenem Kamin, kuscheligen Sofas und eine ausgezeichneten Bar vor, und eine illustre plauschende und diskutierende Runde über die Antwort auf das Leben, dem Fediversum und dem ganzen Rest.

Mehr über uns: https://digitalpioneers.club/wer-wir-sind/

Impressum

für das Blog digitalpioneers.club und die Fediversum-Instanz digitalpioneers.social Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG

Sandra Schink Dorfstraße 83A 23881 Niendorf

Kontakt E-Mail: mail@digitalpioneers.club
Short: The Digital Pioneers Social Club ist eine Initiative von 12 Digital Pioneers. Wir wissen, das Internet geht nicht mehr weg. Aber wir können das so auch nicht lassen.

Description:
Welcome to rtsn.dev

Our instance motto is simple:

Let’s leave the internet a little better than we found it. And don’t be a jerk.

Apply for an account

Specifically, we don’t allow:

  • Any form of hate or the advocacy of hate, including but not limited to racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, nationalism, classism, ableism, and antisemitism.
  • Mean-spirited personal attacks, intentional unkindness, or doxxing. That doesn’t mean you have to be polite: in fact, members are encouraged to call out bad behavior. But again, don’t be a jerk.
  • Intentional misinformation.
  • Pornographic images/videos/etc. (This is for practical reasons: we’re not set up to handle the age verification and moderation burden associated with this kind of content).
  • Shilling crypto, gambling, scams, MLMs, etc.
  • Passing off someone else’s work as your own or non-comedic impersonation.
  • Content that has little-to-no value and is designed purely for engagement (see the reddit self-promotion guidelines for a sense of where to draw this line).

Moderation decisions will be made based on the spirit of these rules, not the letter. Extreme, blatant violations may result in an immediate ban. Most violations will be handled privately, and members will have the option to either remove/modify their post or migrate to another instance. If you are acting in good faith, we’ll do our best to help you migrate seamlessly to another instance that better matches your values without any disruption to your access to the fediverse.
Short: A mastodon instance for web artisans. Apply for membership at https://tally.so/r/3xJRGG

Description:
ここは蛸旅のテリオン×サイラスが好きな方が集うサーバーです。 テリサイに関することなら漫画・イラスト・小説・ぬい・ドール・ネタメモ・創作の進捗報告…etcどんな表現でもOK。 X（旧Twitter）のテリサイコミュニティの避難所として開設しました。 Xが使えなくなったり、Xでは呟きにくい際の避難所として利用してもOKです。 規約の範囲内でR18の投稿もOKです。

利用規約・ルール

  1. 法律は守ってください
    日本国内法順守をお願いします。

  2. 閲覧注意はCWやNSFWを使ってください
    ネタバレ、エロ、特殊性癖、その他注意が必要と感じるものにはContent Warning(CW)機能を使ってください。また、NSFW（R18）の画像には、閲覧注意のチェックを設定して下さい。

  3. 他人に迷惑をかけたり、不快にするような行為は禁止です
    楽しくテリサイについておしゃべりをする場です。思いやりを持った行動をお願いします。

  4. 未成年の登録NG
    成人向け表現OKのサーバーです。未成年の登録はできません。

  5. 逆CP・リバの話はNG
    ここはタイムラインをテリサイの話で埋め尽くすのが趣旨のサーバーです。他カプの話題は他のSNSやサーバーでお願いします。

他のMastodonサーバーとの連合は現在していません。 Mastodon.jpやPawoo等に登録しても当サーバーのTLは閲覧できません。 当サーバーにてアカウント登録をお願いします。

スパム防止のため、登録は承認制となっています。 24時間以内に承認いたします。 規約違反とスパム以外を弾くことはないので、お気軽に登録申請どうぞ！
Short: ここは蛸旅のテリオン×サイラスが好きな方が集うサーバーです。

Description:
Impressum

Ich referiere zu unseren Impressum bei lunoxia.net/impressum-datenschutz.html

Custom Webclients

  • Elk: A nimble Mastodon web client

Verhaltensregeln

Wir haben für die Nutzung gewisse Serverregeln erstellt, die Ihr etwas weiter unten auf dieser Seite findet und die Ihr mit der Erstellung eines Accounts bei moe.social akzeptiert. Bitte beachtet, andere Instanzen haben andere Regeln. Was hier erlaubt ist, kann dort verboten sein und umgekehrt. Wenn Ihr Verstöße erkennt, könnt Ihr diese über das Meldesystem melden. Bitte seit dort so genau wie möglich und gebt uns ggf. Zusatzinformationen, damit wir den Vorfall besser (und schneller) einordnen können. Damit helft Ihr uns. Bei Verstößen gegen die Serverregeln kann es zu einer Löschung der Beiträge und auch zur Löschung des verursachenden Accounts kommen. Bitte beachtet, dass es keine Rückmeldung gibt, was mit Eurer Meldung geschieht.

Server

Der Standort aller benötigten Server für moe.social ist in Deutschland bei Frankfurt Am Main.

Serverstatus

Über https://status.lunoxia.net könnt Ihr einsehen, ob es derzeit Probleme gibt.

Backups

Aktuell wird von dem ganzen Server 2x täglich ein Snapshot erstellt. Diese inkrementellen Backups werden für die letzten 7 Tage gespeichert.

Spenden

Unter https://3y.cx/spenden könnt ihr gerne eine Spende an mich richten. Ich betone aber ausdrücklich, dass keine Spenden für den Erhalt meiner Service benötigt werden.
Short: Allgemeine Mastodon-Instanz für jedermann und jedes Thema. Weebs sind jederzeit erwünscht!

Description:
Welcome to JournMe.Social

JournMe.Social is a vibrant Mastodon community where individuals from all walks of life come together to share and celebrate the diverse tapestry of human experiences. Our members are passionate about documenting their life journeys, be it through personal stories, reflective essays, stunning photography, or artistic expressions. Here, you'll find a kaleidoscope of narratives ranging from thrilling adventures and travel escapades to deeply personal growth and transformative experiences.

Whether you're a seasoned traveler, a thoughtful diarist, a creative soul, or just someone who loves to explore the rich complexities of life, JournMe.Social offers a welcoming and supportive space. Our community thrives on empathy, understanding, and the shared joy of discovery. Join us in this unique endeavor to chronicle the myriad paths we tread in the grand adventure of life. Let's inspire and be inspired, as we each contribute our own unique chapter to the grand story of humanity.

Federated Community

Federated social media, exemplified by Mastodon, is akin to a network of interconnected communities. Each 'instance', like our own JournMe.Social, operates independently but is part of a larger, connected network. This structure allows for diverse, self-governed communities while enabling interaction across the entire network.

Mastodon's decentralized nature contrasts with traditional social media's singular, corporate-dominated platforms. It offers a sense of ownership and intimacy, fostering unique community atmospheres. JournMe.Social is one such space, focused on sharing human experiences, and is part of this wider, diverse Mastodon federation.

Security Recommendation: Please enable 2-Factor Authentication in preferences
Short: Share your journey through life with the community on JournMe.Social.

Description:
Welcome to Bongo Social, your friendly regional Mastodon server based in the heart of East Africa, nestled in the vibrant landscapes of Kilimanjaro and Zanzibar.

Created with a passion for fostering local community connections while embracing global interaction, Bongo Social aims to provide a welcoming and inclusive space for users across Tanzania and beyond.

Our instance celebrates the rich cultural diversity, stunning wildlife, and breathtaking landscapes that define Tanzania. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, an artist, an activist, or simply looking to engage in meaningful conversations, Bongo Social offers a platform where you can share experiences, ideas, and discussions with like-minded individuals.

Join us in exploring the wonders of Tanzania, discussing local events, traditions, and societal issues while connecting with users from neighboring East African countries and worldwide. Embracing multiple languages spoken in the region, our instance encourages multilingual conversations, creating a space where everyone feels valued and understood.

At Bongo Social, your privacy and security are of utmost importance. We strive to maintain a safe environment by adhering to strict community guidelines and fostering a respectful atmosphere for all users.

Whether you're passionate about wildlife conservation, eager to share your artistic creations, or seeking meaningful connections within East Africa and beyond, Bongo Social invites you to be part of a vibrant online community, uniting individuals through shared interests and regional connections. Join us on this exciting journey as we celebrate the beauty and diversity of Tanzania while engaging in global discourse. Karibu sana!
Short: Welcome to Bongo Social,friendly regional Mastodon server based in the heart of East Africa,nestled in the landscapes of Tanzania.Aims to provide a welcoming and inclusive space for all users, Karibu!

Description:
The Bar

Social networking, back in your hands

Mastodon gives you the freedom to enjoy content you like. You get to choose who you want to see in your feed, which is non-algorithmic, ad-free, and chronological.

Here are some helpful tidbits for Mstdn newbies.

You can just type @user to specify someone who is on the same server as you, or @user@server to specify someone who is on a different server.
You will receive an alert right here if you are followed or mentioned by anyone on any internet server.
My entire tag is @bartender@mstdn.bar.

Please don't hesitate to Direct Message me ( @bartender@mstdn.bar ) or tag me in Posts if you have any questions or even if you just want to chat.

So let's talk a little bit about the timelines. There are three of them (unlike X, which just has one):
Home, Local, Federated.

Everyone you are following appears on your Home timeline, just like you would expect it to on X.

Every post created on your local server appears in the local timeline.

What is interesting is the federated timeline. It creates a single timeline from all of the servers' timelines.
You can view everyone on the server who has followed them by doing so (assuming the post is public).
As a result, this timeline accurately depicts every Mstdn user online (though not really).

The only other aspect that is distinct is whether a post is listed or not.
You can set a post to be listed or unlisted in addition to the standard privacy settings found on Twitter.

If it's unlisted, it behaves exactly like a regular tweet but doesn't appear anywhere on local or federated timelines.

Special features

👍​

  • Emoji reactions
  • Posts with Markdown and HTML
  • 9,999 character posts and 1200 bios
  • Media improvements
  • Images inside the CW spoiler
  • Fullwidth images
  • Scaling options
  • Formatted posts
  • Reply selection in lists
  • Filter improvements
  • Highlighting of misleading links
  • Hiding follower count
  • App settings modal
  • Collapsible posts
  • Post visibility icons
  • Local-only posts
  • Threaded mode
  • Doodle
  • Tenor GIF picker

Our mission

  • We have a mission to make mstdn.bar a safe and welcoming environment for everyone regardless of their gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, age, mental or physical disability, political views, and personal appearance.
  • We are resolute in protecting the mstdn.bar community from harassment and malicious content from individual members whose goals are to disrupt our community and promote their own self-interest at the expense of the community.

Community guidelines | Our norms

The list below is a collection of norms and behaviors that will help us build a community that we all want to participate in. While these best practices are designed to be guidelines for a good communal instance, repeated malicious unwillingness to follow the best practices will be considered just like breaking a rule (it’s all about intent).

  • We are not an advertising platform. If you are here only to sell your products or services, you will be removed. Occasional posts of commercial links are acceptable, but if the vast majority of a user's posts are commercial in nature, we will regard the account as a spam account. Moderators will evaluate reports of spam on a case-by-case basis.
  • Do not report every post that upsets you. Please report posts that violate our Code of Conduct. For other posts that you find distasteful or don’t like but don’t violate the rules, use the mute, filter, or block functionality. Let the moderation team focus on the real problematic posts.
  • Be considerate. In general, use the tools provided to foster a considerate and accessible atmosphere. This includes the liberal use of:
    • Content warnings (CWs) are a kind way to let people choose to opt-out of potentially disturbing or controversial topics like spoilers or triggering/traumatic posts. CWs are also mandatory on posts containing gore, violence, or NSFW. If in doubt, err on the side of caution. 
    • Alt-text captioning of media files can help our vision-impaired community members join in on the discussion. Alt-text is needed for those who rely upon screen readers to read what's on their screen. Without this, screen readers can't describe images to those who can't see them.
    • #CamelCase use of hashtags can help screen readers read the hashtags properly.

  • Give credit where it’s due. When possible, provide credit for creative works in your posts that are not your own.
  • Don’t be a creep. Uninvited comments about another user's personal choices, lifestyle or family are strongly discouraged and may be considered harassment.
  • Be respectful. In discussions, please remain civil, and do not insult the person you're talking to. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar modes of language don't translate well to written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings. Criticize ideas, not people.
  • Boosts are endorsements. You are responsible for what you boost. If you boost content that doesn't comply with our rules, moderators may take action.

Staff

In addition to the site owner, @bartender mstdn.bar's moderation staff include:

    @skokie

Longevity and Mstdn

A problem with a federated social network like Mastodon is that users must be certain their instance won't vanish over night. We've seen this happen on several occasions, so we want to allay your concerns if you decide to use Mstdn.

We're not planning on going anywhere, however, we have a strategy in place if we do.

What if we do decide to close down?

The Mstdn won't likely close because we have solid staffing and financial standing. However, we promise to provide you at least three months' notice if we do decide to shut down the instance. Our members should have ample time to discover a new instance, migrate, and let their followers know about it.

Cross-posting

The automatic copying of posts from one platform to another is known as "cross-posting." The simultaneous posting to various platforms from the same app, like Twidere, is not included in that description. We consider all posts from Twidere or PostyBirb as originals.

Cross-posting from Mastodon to other social media sites is completely allowed. Cross-posting to Mastodon from another platform is allowed under the following conditions:

  1. The posts do not include platform-specific references, e.g. talking about "here" meaning Twitter, or including text from other non-Mastodon users verbatim (e.g. cross-posted quote tweets)
  2. The account is at least semi-regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored
  3. The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted

Mobile & Desktop Apps

Thanks to Mastodon's open API, you can use it from any of these apps developed by third-party developers.

Android

  • Moshidon for Mastodon - free
  • Mastodon for Android - free
  • Tusky - free
  • Yuito - free
  • Subway Tooter - free
  • FediLab - paid

iOS

  • Metatext - free
  • Mastodon for iOS - free
  • Amarok - free
  • Toot! - paid
  • Mast - paid

Web

  • Pinafore - free
  • Halcyon - free
  • Cuckoo - free
  • HyperSpace - free

Desktop

  • Whalebird - free
  • TheDesk - free
  • HyperSpace - free
  • Sengi - free
  • Mastonaut - paid
  • Mast - paid

Attributions

What to do about self-harm and suicide concerns on Mastodon

If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, you’re not alone. Use the contact info below to get help.

  • United States: Contact the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-TALK (8255). Crisis workers are available 24 hours a day. Calls are free and confidential.
  • Other countries & regions: To find a crisis center near you, visit International Association for Suicide Prevention.

If you or someone you know is thinking about engaging in self-harm or suicidal behavior, you should seek help as soon as possible by contacting services with expertise in crisis intervention and suicide prevention.

Remember, what happens at The Bar stays at The Bar

Your, @bartender

Server rules 👇

Description:
Questa è una piccola istanza. 'Cos'ha in più delle altre?' Niente. 'Di meno?' Sempre niente. 'Quindi?' È Fediverso. 'Cioè?' I numeri stanno a zero, conta la voglia di interagire con gli altri. 'E gli iscritti?' Sono membri di un'istanza e parte di una comunità. 'Qual è la comunità?' Il Fediverso. 'Allora ci ritroviamo tutti se vogliamo?' Sì. 'Quindi i numeri non contano nulla?' Esatto. 'Quindi siamo tutti padroni dei nostri spazi?' Certo. 'Ci vediamo in giro allora!'

Description:
A space for non-tech nerds to nerd out about their favorite topics.

What gives you joy? We want to hear all about it!

  • Learning a language?
  • Hand-making lace?
  • Traditional wood-working hand tools?
  • Mending and altering clothing?
  • Trains?
  • Perfecting a pie crust recipe?
  • Comparing the variations of "Boys Over Flowers" from media to media and country to country?
  • Analyzing the themes used in a Broadway musical against their original source musicals?
  • Speed-running an obby in a video game?
  • The taxonomy of extinct sea fungus?
  • Calculating the air speed velocity of an unladen swallow?

BRING IT!

Of course tech nerds are welcome, but there are already plenty of instances for tech folks. I wanted to create a space for non-tech nerds to nerd out about their favorite topics.

Let's make this a welcoming place.

Server header image by the amazing artist Cab at cabfolio.com
Short: A space for non-tech nerds to nerd out about their favorite topics. What gives you joy?

Description:
MASTODON.ELMOECHO.DE ist die MASTODON-Instanz für Leute, die im Bayerischen Wald leben und sich mit dem Rest der Welt vernetzen möchten.

Diese Instanz wird betrieben von Horst Triebstein. Ich hoste und pflege diese Instanz als Hobby in meiner Freizeit.

Die Instanz verfolgt eine strikte Keine-Toleranz-Regel im Hinblick auf Rassismus und Sexismus. Ich versuche eine gesunde und diversifizierte Kultur zu erhalten und verwalte daher neue Account-Registrierungen entsprechend. Ich verweise an dieser Stelle auf die Server-Regeln im Abschnitt "Über", um zu prüfen, ob dies hier tatsächlich die Gemeinschaft ist, deren Regeln Sie befolgen möchten.

Wenn Sie bereits über einen Mastodon-Account auf einem anderen Server verfügen, benötigen Sie keinen zusätzlichen, um hier mit den Teilnehmern zu kommunizieren. Aus diesem Grund spricht man auch von einem föderierten sozialen Netzwerk. Berücksichtigen Sie dies, bevor Sie um Einladung zu dieser Instanz bitten.

Die hauptsächlichen Sprachen dieser Instanz sind Deutsch und Englisch.

Möge sich das beste Argument durchsetzen!

Impressum

Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG

Horst Triebstein

Telefon: 08585 2779804

E-Mail: info (at) elmoecho (punkt) de

Verantwortlich für den Inhalt nach MStV

Horst Triebstein

Haftung für Inhalte

Als Anbieter bin ich gemäß § 7 Abs. 1 TMG für eigene Inhalte auf dieser Mastodon-Instanz nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen verantwortlich. Nach §§ 8 bis 10 TMG bin ich als Diensteanbieter jedoch nicht verpflichtet, übermittelte oder gespeicherte fremde Informationen (konkret z. B. Posts von Usern) zu überwachen oder nach Umständen zu forschen, die auf eine rechtswidrige Tätigkeit hinweisen. Verpflichtungen zur Entfernung oder Sperrung der Nutzung von Informationen nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen bleiben hiervon unberührt. Eine diesbezügliche Haftung ist jedoch erst ab dem Zeitpunkt der Kenntnis einer konkreten Rechtsverletzung möglich. Bei Bekanntwerden von entsprechenden Rechtsverletzungen werden ich umgehend entsprechende Schritte ergreifen.

Haftung für Links

Diese Instanz enthält Links zu externen Webseiten, auf deren Inhalte ich keinen Einfluss habe. Deshalb kann ich für diese fremden Inhalte auch keine Gewähr übernehmen. Für die verlinkten Inhalte ist stets die jeweilige Anbieterin oder Betreiberin der Seiten verantwortlich. Eine permanente inhaltliche Kontrolle der verlinkten Seiten ist ohne konkrete Anhaltspunkte einer Rechtsverletzung nicht zumutbar. Bei Bekanntwerden von Rechtsverletzungen werde ich umgehend die gebotenen Schritte ergreifen.

Urheberrecht

Die hier durch die Mastodon-User oder mich erstellten Inhalte unterliegen dem Urheberrecht. Die Vervielfältigung, Bearbeitung, Verbreitung und jede Art der Verwertung außerhalb der Grenzen des Urheberrechtes bedürfen in der Regel der schriftlichen Zustimmung der jeweiligen Autorin bzw. Erstellerin. Downloads und Kopien sind grundsätzlich nur für den privaten, nicht kommerziellen Gebrauch gestattet. Sollte eine Urheberrechtsverletzung auffallen, bitte ich um einen entsprechenden Hinweis. Bei Bekanntwerden von Rechtsverletzungen werde ich hinsichtlich derartiger Inhalte umgehend die notwendigen Schritte ergreifen.

Description:
Welcome to ClassicChirp, brought to you by Larsenv, the creator of RiiConnect24. ClassicChirp is based on Mastodon and is intended to bring back the feel of social media back in Twitter's primitive years. In order to achieve that, ClassicChirp is limited to posting with 140 characters, images can not be posted, and toxicity and complaining are prohibited.

I created ClassicChirp as an experiment. Twitter used to be more wholesome and a place where you could post about yourself and what's going on in your life. Now the platform is not the same. It's bloated, has extra features such as location sharing, polls, and other things you don't need, and had been bought out by a well-known billionaire and renamed to X. The platform has lost its original meaning and now is more of a place which is more negative which has lost its core meaning.
Short: ClassicChirp intends to replicate what Twitter used to be like in its early days.

Description:
Benvenuto in RPIGroup Social

Ti diamo il benvenuto a RPIGroup Social, una istanza Italiana di Mastodon dedicata al mondo della musica, e della radiofonia italiana (e non solo).

In questa istanza, parleremo di musica, novità nel mondo dello spettacolo, di radio e della radiofonia italiana, notizie curiose e condivisione di musica tra i nostri iscritti (e non).

RPIGroup Social, come tutti le altre istanze di Mastodon, è un server federizzato con anche tutte le altre piattaforme. Quindi, potrai in tutta tranquillità seguire e farti seguire da altre istanze italiane e non. Inoltre, potrai successivamente seguire i tuoi amici anche da Threads by Instagram.

Chi è RPIGroup?

RPIGroup è un gruppo radiofonico salernitano, di cui gestisce emittenti in frequenza modulata (FM) e emittenti web. Ad oggi, è prorpietaria di due stazioni radiofoniche importanti nel territorio salernitano: Radio Città 105 e RDL Radio Diffusione Libera.

Perché dovrei iscrivermi a questo social?

Se sei un amante della musica, e vuoi condividere senza limitazioni, RPIGroup Social può essere il social network che può fare a caso tuo.

Non siamo gestiti né da Mark Zucherberg (Meta) e né da Elon Musk (X, aka Twitter). Siamo una piattaforma autonoma e libera. Su RPIGroup Social non avrai nessuna pressione sul "cosa dire" o "cosa non dire". Esprimiti liberamente, rimanendo ovviamente sul rispetto delle regole sociali e legali (consula il nostro regolamento per più informazioni).

Iscriviti gratuitamente!

RPIGroup è una piattaforma gratuita e libera. Sentiti libero di iscriverti e di creare nuovi contenuti a tuo piacimento. Condividi i tuoi pensieri e la tua musica preferita.

Informativa su responsabilità e proprietà della piattaforma

RPIGroup Social è una piattaforma creata e gestita dalla A.S.V. Studios, di cui è proprietaria.

L'Associazione Culturale Comunicare, proprietaria del gruppo RPIGroup, non ha alcun potere gestionale su questa piattaforma e, di conseguenza, non è responsabile dei contenuti presenti al suo interno.

La responsabilità di qualsiasi contenuto registrato nella piattaforma è a carico di A.S.V. Studios.
Short: RPIGroup Social. Il primo social network Italiano dedicato al mondo radiofonico e musicale e non solo...

Description: Social media owned by you

In Illinois, property taxes have been a growing burden on taxpayers. Over the past 50 years, property taxes have increased at a rate that far outpaces residents’ ability to pay. They have grown 2.5 times faster than inflation and 14 times faster than the state’s population. Specifically, residential property taxes have risen 76 percent as a percentage of median household income. This trend has resulted in Illinois having the second-highest average effective property-tax rate in the nation, at 2.32 percent.

The complexity arises from the state’s nearly 7,000 local government districts with the power to levy property taxes, which is more than any other state. These entities range from airport authorities to forest preserves to fire-protection districts, and their layered taxes contribute to the overall property-tax bill, making it both more expensive and less transparent for taxpayers.

For Kane County, the situation is also challenging. The county is among the top 25% of counties in the United States ranked by property tax collections. It is ranked 5th in Illinois by median property taxes and 7th by median tax as a percentage of home value. Kane County collects very high property taxes, and the average homeowner pays $6,904 in property taxes, which is higher than the state average of $5,405.

The primary driver of property-tax growth in Illinois, including Kane County, has been the funding of schools, which constituted 63 percent of all property taxes in 2013. This reliance on property taxes for school funding, combined with the complex structure of local government taxing districts, contributes to the complexities and high rates that residents face.

Positive changes in these trends will commence once we master the ability to monitor, record, and disseminate information regarding the approximately 7,000 taxing entities across the state. Please refer to the accompanying TiddlyWiki at

https://theron.kane-il.us
Short: West Dundee, Kane county, Illinois homeowners are invited to detail and document the forces behind property tax increases. Read more at https://theron.kane-il.us

Kittywire Social is a small European LGBTQ+ instance in the Kittywire suite of free (as in freedom and beer) services, moderated and administrated by members of the French collective "Miaoute".

Branding

The Kittywire mascot (also named Kittywire) was made by Riedler and is under CC-BY-SA 4.0 International.

The Kittywire font is Alatsi, under the Open Font License.

Hosting location

Kittywire Social is mainly hosted in France, with backups stored in Germany.

Infrastructure

Our infrastructure will be documented on https://docs.kittywi.re. Until then, here's a sum up of what is being used and what will be used to maintain this Mastodon instance's infrastructure.

System administration

System administration is managed by Miaoute.

Physical Kittywire infrastructure

  • Domain: OVH
  • Main Kittywire server: PulseHeberg PERF-8
    • Intel Xeon E5-2637v4 (4 vCores @ 3.5 Ghz), 8 GB of DDR4 RAM, 80 GB of SSD storage

Future plans

  • Backup storage server: Hetzner Storagebox BX11 - shared with [Miaoute](https://miaoute.net
  • Status page host (https://status.kittywi.re) - hosted on Miaoute infrastructure

Content retention

Media is kept for 7 days, user archives are kept for 7 days, content cache is kept for 10 days.

Log retention

Logs are erased every 14 days.

Read more in the privacy policy.

Funding

Operational costs of the free suite of Kittywire services is around 300 euros yearly. It is entirely paid out of pocket by donations made to maintaining said services as well as membership fees and other donations to Miaoute.

Moderation and governance

The governance and moderation are fully handled by Miaoute participative members, reachable via @kitten@social.kittywi.re - there might be some external assistance once in a while, if needed, specifically for the federation instance moderation list.

The federation instance moderation list is based on CatCatNya's blocklist, with some slight local adjustments. It will not be made public to anyone other than the Kittywire Social users.
Short: Kittywire Social is a small European LGBTQ+ instance in the Kittywire suite of free (as in freedom and beer) services, moderated and administrated by members of the French collective "Miaoute".

Description: Chirpr: Social media for the good of humanity.

Supernormal Reads is a queer-focused instance of Book Wyrm. Anyone can join regardless of their gender and sexual or romantic orientation. We welcome any kind of book: fiction, non-fiction, poetry, comics, cooking books, instruction manuals, etc. Queerness lies in the eyes of the beholder.

You can follow and interact with users on other BookWyrm instances and on Mastodon.

Supernormal Reads is run by Supernormal, a queer literary collective based in Amsterdam. You can find them on Instagram: [@supernormalbooks](https://www.instagram.com/supernormalbooks/?hl=en)
Short: A queer-centred Book Wyrm instance run by Supernormal (contact: supernormalbooks@proton.me)

Description:
Princeton Micro Blogs is the ActivityPub platform for Princeton University. This service enables the Princeton community to share content on decentralized social media, i.e., the Fediverse.

Like the Princeton's blogs service, this service is for University departments, programs, official student organizations, official student publications, faculty, and faculty research groups.

Contact microblogs-admins@princeton.edu for any questions.

This effort is spearheaded by Prof. Andrés Monroy-Hernández (Computer Science) along with Aaron Nathans (School of Engineering), and Willow Dressel (Libraries), with support from Prof. Arvind Narayanan (Computer Science), Prof. Janet Vertesi (Sociology), and Prof Amit Levy (Computer Science).

Graduate students Tolulope Oshinowo and Yuhan Liu are the technical maintainers of the server.
Short: Princeton Micro Blogs is the ActivityPub platform for Princeton University 🐅

Description:
Welcome to VidBin!

VidBin is a mastodon instance for video enthusiasts but we welcome all users.

We are open for signups! When you sign up include a brief blurb about what you are looking forward to most about joining. All registrations are currently manual approval which has no set time limit on when you will be approved. However, it's usually fast!

If your application is not accepted it's usually because we think you're a spam account. You can appeal this decision using the email below.

Emails:

Generalized questions: contact@vidbin.social

Legal, GDPR, DMCA: legal@vidbin.social

Appeals: moderation@vidbin.social

Reporting harassment / content breaking rules / other:

Please report the user by using the ... button and then report. Include posts in it when making the report.

If it's not breaking the server rules or spam do not report the content. If it's something you don't like you can mute or block them.

Expectations of Staff

You can expect the moderators and admins to:

  • Do their best to provide you with a safe heaven. We can't guarantee anything but will try our best!
  • Respond to reports and messages as quickly as possible and provide feedback.

Code of Conduct:

1) The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising.

Untagged sexual images. Including artistic depictions.

Untagged Nudity. Including artistic depictions.

Untagged gore. Including artistic depictions.

Misinformation, disinformation, anti-vaccination spam.

2) Stalking or harassing other users is not allowed.

3) Continuing to engage in conversation with a user who has asked activity to cease and desist will likely be considered harassment.

4) All other rules must be followed.

Other notes

  • vidbin.social does not claim ownership of anything you post. You retain full rights.
  • Staff accounts are:

@vidbin@vidbin.social

@simplycorbett@vidbin.social

Preferably use the vidbin account for issues with the service.

VidBin does not guarantee data protection. While the database (and therefore text of your toots) is backed up regularly we do not make backups of the media content (images/videos). In particular we plan on clearing media content when the storage array becomes full. Please do not use VidBin with long term storage of images/videos in mind and use an alternative media provider for long term storage such as a nextcloud provider and/or a cloud provider like iCloud.
Short: A hub primarily for video enthusiasts and technologists but everyone is welcome.

Description: Social media owned by you

Fedired es una red social que forma parte del Fediverso, un conjunto descentralizado de plataformas interconectadas. En Fedired, los usuarios pueden publicar microblogs, enviar mensajes privados y personalizar sus perfiles. La plataforma está diseñada para fomentar la libre expresión, la conexión entre usuarios y el intercambio de ideas. Además, Fedired se esfuerza por mantener un entorno seguro y respetuoso para todos sus miembros, promoviendo la diversidad y la inclusión en su comunidad. ¡Únete a Fedired y sé parte de esta emocionante red social en constante crecimiento en el Fediverso!

Description:
This is a North American Native/Indigenous only instance. To register here you MUST enter your Native/Indigenous Nation at the 'About yourself and why you'd like to join' prompt. Failure to do this WILL result in your registration rejection. You MUST read and agree to this entire document.

Mvskoke Nation citizens own, administer and moderate TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances. Allies also moderate Allies.* instances

If you have any official questions, reach out to one of the admins:
@Yehuda@TurtleIsland.social or @Tzipporah@TurtleIsland.social.

Welcome to TurtleIsland.buzz!

TurtleIsland.* instances are for North American Native/Indigenous only
  • TurtleIsland.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Dec 2022.
  • TurtleIsland.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • TurtleIsland.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • TurtleIsland.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Sep 2023.
Allies.* instances are for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only
  • Allies.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Oct 2023.
  • Allies.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • Allies.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • Allies.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Jan 2024.

Fediverse?

The Fediverse is a social media network that uses the ActivityPub protocol. TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances, as well as other applications/network nodes (instances) are connected and communicate with each other via the Fediverse (ActivityPub) network. You only need to join one instance to like, follow, post, view and share content with the thousands of other instances in the Fediverse.

Why?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful environments for North American Native/Indigenous people and their allies to be in community and safe spaces.

  • Ultimately, we are helping to build an Indigenized social network.
  • We stand with our people.
  • We know and support their struggles.
  • We moderate to Indigenous standards not colonial standards.

Who? Where?

TurtleIsland.* instances accept user registrations from North American Native/Indigenous people only.

  • TurtleIsland.social user registrations are available through the 'Create Account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.social/about
  • TurtleIsland.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://TurtleIsland.rocks/registration
  • TurtleIsland.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://TurtleIsland.buzz
  • TurtleIsland.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.video

Allies.* instances accept user registrations from allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only.

  • Allies.social user registrations are available through the 'Create account' portal at https://Allies.social/about
  • Allies.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://Allies.rocks/registration
  • Allies.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://Allies.buzz
  • Allies.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://Allies.video

How much?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are 100% free. We will never charge fees or pressure anyone for donations. All expenses are paid for by the administrators and donations.

If you'd like to help with Turtle Island expenses:

  • https://ko-fi.com/TurtleIsland
  • https://cash.app/$Yehuda1491
  • https://venmo.com/Yehuda1491

If you receive Pension/Social Security/Disability or less please don't. But if you can help Native/Indigenous Fediverse instances thrive and grow, it would be much appreciated.

What?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are small/medium sized instances due to our specialized nature.

  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances will never be large general purpose instances and will be Indigenized as much as possible.
  • We are federated with 99% of the Fediverse but use no relays in order to maximize content relevant to our users.

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances believe 100% in true Native/Indigenous Nation sovereignty, physical and digital LandBack. We reject calls to assimilate into the nearly all white culture Fediverse. The whole ghettoization theory is white supremacy garbage.

Blocked instances

We use the Oliphant Tier 0 blocklist, which blocks the majority of the bad actors without getting crazy aggressive. If you see anything blocked or not blocked that you believe is in error, let us know.

  • All TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances block Threads.

Commitment

TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social are committed to 3 months notice in the extremely unlikely event we should decide to pull the plug. All other instances are committed to 30 days notice.

Backup and Maintenence

  • TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social configuration files, media and database storage are backed up daily to a remote secure object storage. All other instances are backed up weekly with a full virtual server snapshot.
  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances may have unscheduled maintenance or upgrade events. We have over 99% uptime availability.

Data, Image and File Warranties/Guarantees

Even though there are regular backup procedures, there are no data, image and file warranties/guarantees. Images may be compressed or resized. It is user responsibility to keep copies of all data, images and files uploaded to or created on Turtle Island instances.

Turtle Island Rules

1. These are Indigenous instances.

  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account(s) termination.
  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

2. We can't stress this enough - Absolutely no racism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, pro-genocide, pro-ethnic cleansing, pro-terrorism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. 95%+ of our issues fall in this category; we take this seriously.

  • Any infraction of this category from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account termination.
  • Any infraction of this category from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

Extra clarity current events note:

River to Sea is ethnic cleansing and anti-Semitic. Promoting settlements in the West Bank is ethnic cleansing and Islamophobic. It doesn't matter how many misinformed or disingenuous articles you read or who counsels you otherwise, these acts cannot be sanitized. The majority of the Jewish population will see River to Sea as ethnic cleansing and very anti-Semitic, and the majority of the Palestinian population will see settlement building in the West Bank as ethnic cleansing and very Islamophobic. These are just a couple examples that come up frequently.

You can criticize the Israeli or Palestinian governments all day and night long if you wish, but the moment you add anti-Semitic or Islamophobic material to your post, the whole post becomes anti-Semitic or Islamophobic.

Turtle Island instances officially support a two state solution in Israel/Palestine as the only realistic and fair solution for the Israeli and Palestinian peoples. Both peoples are factually Indigenous to the region by the same standards that apply to North American Indigenous peoples. If this is not clear to you, you need to go back to non-propaganda history study.

If any part of this current events note makes you chafe, Turtle Island may not be the place for you. Peace and co-existence are the only acceptable goals on Turtle Island.

3. Advertising authentic Indigenous products and genuine Indigenous businesses is allowed and encouraged.

  • Advertising fake inspired appropriated products by non-Indigenous businesses is not allowed.

4. We strongly support and encourage Mutual Aid with #IndigenousMutualAid, #SettlerSaturday and #MutualAid hashtags.

  • Requests for mutual aid must be on your original post. Requests cannot be made in unsolicited comments or private messages to other users.
  • Posts cannot tag other users, especially bulk user lists.
  • Inappropriate hashtag bombing is not allowed.
  • Guideline violations could result locally in post deletion or user suspension, or remotely in user or instance defederation.

5. No Native/Indigenous gatekeeping of accounts on Native/Indigenous instances.

  • If you have an issue with the Indigeneity of an account on an Indigenous instance, DM or email the admins and/or moderators of the instance.
  • Regardless of the opinions and seriousness of this subject or what instance a user of questionable Indigeneity may be on, immature and abusive posts, dogpiling, parody or sock puppet accounts, etc. are part of a vibe we do not want coming here from Twitter and are expressly not allowed.
  • None of this is to say the Pretendian subject is forbidden, but keep it mature please.

6. Promotion of Right-Wing, Conservative, Republican, Fascist, Nazi or other equally stupid political views is not allowed.

  • If moral deficiency is your inclination, go somewhere else.

7. This goes against Turtle Island's preferences, but in acquiescence to Fediverse community standards, NSFW content requires Content Warnings (CWs). Nudity, porn or gratuitous violence requires CWs. Turtle Island does not require CWs for other types of content. If you are in doubt, please ask. Generally speaking though, if you are easily offended, Turtle Island may not be the place for you.

8. Any other issues not covered by these rules will be settled by the sole determination of the administrators or moderators.
Short: Native/Indigenous owned and operated for Native/Indigenous people in North America. TurtleIsland.buzz is ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful.

Description:
This instance is for Allies of Native, Indigenous, BIPOC, and other marginalized people only. To register here you MUST answer the 'About yourself and why you'd like to join' prompt. Failure to do this WILL result in your registration rejection. You MUST read and agree to this entire document.

Mvskoke Nation citizens own, administer and moderate TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances. Allies also moderate Allies.* instances

If you have any official questions, reach out to one of the admins:
@Yehuda@TurtleIsland.social or @Tzipporah@TurtleIsland.social.

Welcome to Allies.buzz!

TurtleIsland.* instances are for North American Native/Indigenous only
  • TurtleIsland.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Dec 2022.
  • TurtleIsland.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • TurtleIsland.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • TurtleIsland.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Sep 2023.
Allies.* instances are for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only
  • Allies.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Oct 2023.
  • Allies.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • Allies.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • Allies.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Jan 2024.

Fediverse?

The Fediverse is a social media network that uses the ActivityPub protocol. TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances, as well as other applications/network nodes (instances) are connected and communicate with each other via the Fediverse (ActivityPub) network. You only need to join one instance to like, follow, post, view and share content with the thousands of other instances in the Fediverse.

Why?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful environments for North American Native/Indigenous people and their allies to be in community and safe spaces.

  • Ultimately, we are helping to build an Indigenized social network.
  • We stand with our people.
  • We know and support their struggles.
  • We moderate to Indigenous standards not colonial standards.

Who? Where?

TurtleIsland.* instances accept user registrations from North American Native/Indigenous people only.

  • TurtleIsland.social user registrations are available through the 'Create Account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.social/about
  • TurtleIsland.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://TurtleIsland.rocks/registration
  • TurtleIsland.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://TurtleIsland.buzz

Allies.* instances accept user registrations from allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only.

  • Allies.social user registrations are available through the 'Create account' portal at https://Allies.social/about
  • Allies.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://Allies.rocks/registration

  • Allies.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://Allies.video

COMPUTEC MEDIA ist nicht verantwortlich für die inhaltliche Richtigkeit der Anzeigen und übernimmt keinerlei Verantwortung für in Anzeigen dargestellte Produkte und Dienstleistungen. Die Veröffentlichung von Anzeigen setzt nicht die Billigung der angebotenen Produkte und Service-Leistungen durch COMPUTEC MEDIA voraus. Sollten Sie Beschwerden zu einem unserer Anzeigenkunden, seinen Produkten oder Dienstleistungen haben, möchten wir Sie bitten, uns dies schriftlich mitzuteilen. Schreiben Sie unter Angabe des Magazins, in dem die Anzeige erschienen ist, inklusive der Ausgabe und der Seitennummer an: CMS Media Services, Franziska Behme, Anschrift s. o.

Linux ist ein eingetragenes Warenzeichen von Linus Torvalds und wird von uns mit seiner freundlichen Genehmigung verwendet. »Unix« wird als Sammelbegriff für die Gruppe der Unix-ähnlichen Betriebssysteme (wie beispielsweise HP/UX, FreeBSD, Solaris, u.a.) verwendet, nicht als Bezeichnung für das Trademark »UNIX« der Open Group. Der Linux-Pinguin wurde von Larry Ewing mit dem Pixelgrafikprogramm »The GIMP« erstellt.

Eine Haftung für die Richtigkeit von Veröffentlichungen kann – trotz sorgfältiger Prüfung durch die Redaktion – vom Verlag nicht übernommen werden. Mit der Einsendung von Manuskripten oder Leserbriefen gibt der Verfasser seine Einwilligung zur Veröffentlichung in einer Publikation der COMPUTEC MEDIA. Für unverlangt eingesandte Manuskripte wird keine Haftung übernommen. Autoreninformationen: Die Redaktion behält sich vor, Einsendungen zu kürzen und zu überarbeiten. Das exklusive Urheber- und Verwertungsrecht für angenommene Manuskripte liegt beim Verlag. Es darf kein Teil des Inhalts ohne schriftliche Genehmigung des Verlags in irgendeiner Form vervielfältigt oder verbreitet werden.

Die Inhalte auf dieser Seite sind urheberrechtlich geschützt. Die Vervielfältigung und/oder Verbreitung – auch in elektronischer Form – bedarf der Zustimmung des Verlages, die gewöhnlich unter Auflagen erteilt wird. Wenden Sie sich dazu bitte an die Redaktion.

Diese Website wurde mit größtmöglicher Sorgfalt zusammengestellt. Trotzdem kann keine Gewähr für die Fehlerfreiheit und Genauigkeit der enthaltenen Informationen übernommen werden. Jegliche Haftung für Schäden, die direkt oder indirekt aus der Benutzung dieser Website entstehen, wird ausgeschlossen, soweit diese nicht auf Vorsatz oder grober Fahrlässigkeit beruhen. Sofern von dieser Website auf Internetseiten verwiesen wird, die von Dritten betrieben werden, übernimmt die COMPUTEC MEDIA keine Verantwortung für deren Inhalte.

EU-Verordnung Nr. 524/2013 Gemäß der EU-Verordnung Nr. 524/2013 sind wir verpflichtet, darauf hinzuweisen, dass die Europäische Kommission unter http://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/ eine Plattform zur außergerichtlichen Online-Streitbeilegung (sog. OS-Plattform) betreibt.

Verbraucherstreitbeilegungsgesetz Wir sind zur Teilnahme an einem Streitbeilegungsverfahren vor einer Verbraucherschlichtungsstelle weder bereit noch verpflichtet.

Description:
Ingwine Heathenship is a modern polytheistic religion based upon the traditions of the ancient Angles, Saxons, Chauci, Frisians, and Jutes. Our faith is life-affirming, and honors the Earth, our ancestors, and the Gods and Goddesses of the pre-Christian North Sea area. This server is geared toward serving this community, and is intended primarily for sharing information about our faith, culture, and communities.

Our Official Website

This server is sponsored by The Ingvaeonic Society (Old English: Ingwina Ferræden), a non-profit organization dedicated to advancing Ingwine Heathenship, analogous to a “Church” in other religions. We are committed to educating, online networking, and above all, building strong local faith communities and Heathen social institutions. To this end, we host a growing library of online resources, and maintain a number of social networks on popular platforms. We also serve as a parent organization for Heathen férscipas (congregations) in the United States, Europe and the United Kingdom.

Welcome to Ingwine Heathenship Community on Mastodon!

We're thrilled to have you join our vibrant and growing community of Heathen practitioners and enthusiasts. To get you started, here's a quick guide to navigating our Mastodon server and making the most of your experience:

Discover the Local Timeline

What It Is: The local timeline is a live feed of public posts from all members of our server. It's a great way to see what's currently happening and to find interesting discussions.

How to Access: Simply Visit the local timeline to dive into the stream of community posts. No need to follow anyone to start seeing content here!

Using Tags to Explore Content

About Tags: Tags (or hashtags) are a way to categorize content and make it discoverable. Using tags in your posts helps others who share your interests find your content.

Following Tags: If there's a particular topic you're interested in, you can follow specific tags. Just click on a tag you like and select the option to follow it. This way, you'll get updates on this topic in your feed.

You might want to consider following these tags to get you started:

  • #ingwine for topics specific to Ingwine practices and community news.
  • #books for sharing and discussing literature related to Heathenry and adjacent subjects.

Following Users

Building Connections: Following other users is the heart of the Mastodon experience. When you follow someone, their posts will appear in your home feed, making it easy to keep up with their updates.

How to Follow: Visit a user's profile and click the "Follow" button. You can find interesting people to follow by checking out posts in the local timeline or by exploring tags related to your interests.

Engage and Participate

Feel free to introduce yourself with a post and some tags like #introduction and #ingwine to let the community know who you are and what your interests are.

Don't hesitate to engage with posts that resonate with you by liking, commenting, or reblogging (boosting).

We hope this guide helps you settle in comfortably. Our community is built on respect, curiosity, and shared interest in Heathen practices and traditions. If you have any questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out to the community or our moderation team.
Short: This server exists to serve the North Sea Heathen spiritual community. You can learn more about our faith at https://ingwine.org
